Our wedding experience was absolutely perfect! Everything was so well organised, and the staff went above and beyond to accommodate us. Communication throughout the entire process was excellent, making the day completely stress-free. Highly recommended!

I cannot recommend the Darenth more. The staff were absolutely incredible, we could not have wanted for more on our day. We were never without a drink, and nothing was too much of an ask. Jason, Kerry, Sarah, Louise and everyone at the Darenth, thank you so much for making our day so special!

We found The Darenth when looking for a venue for our twilight wedding. We wanted our wedding to truly reflect us as a couple and where we could be flexible with how the day would go.

When we went to see The Darenth, not only was the venue stunningly beautiful, inside and out, there was a warmth to the place and the team were so friendly and very helpful. From the moment we contacted the team, Lucy was our main contact and couldn‚Äôt help us enough. Despite the number of weddings held here, we felt special throughout as if our special day was the main focus for them all. Lucy was great with all the details, understanding what we wanted and offering help and support without pushing anything.

On the day, Jason was amazing at managing the day - making sure we had time to ourselves but that the day ran exactly as we wanted. He was also very supportive and did a great job putting us at ease when we were nervous leading up to the ceremony. The whole team were thoughtful and looked after us all day, making sure we had food and drink and anything else we needed. All our guests commented on how wonderful the staff were and it allowed us to truly focus on enjoying our day. Leigh and Kerry were also fantastic on the day, couldn‚Äôt be more helpful.

We had an amazing day, everything went exactly as we hoped and better. A massive part of that was down to The Darenth and their incredible team - we couldn‚Äôt recommend highly enough!

From the moment you walk into The Darenth we were made to feel comfortable. We were taken on a tour of the venue and booked there and then In October 2022 for September 2023. The staff were knowledgable and professional which is what made us book this venue.

Communication was always good throughout, we visited several times with different family members and the staff were alway welcoming. As an older couple we wanted that relaxed but professional day and this is what we got.

The venue is amazedly clean and beautiful with views of the golf course. We was lucky even to get married outside and the outside area is amazing but the staff make this place and your day the best it could be.

We dealt with Kerrie and Jason mainly but everyone we had dealings with were great. Jason ran the day and he was brilliant, I love a bit of banter and he was excellent and even made it fun when I was so nervous üòä there was also a lady that run the evening (sorry I can‚Äôt remember her name) she was also really good making sure everything was ok and stayed until the last guest left. One thing they did do was made sure the bride and groom kept topped up with drinks all day and night again a nice touch, I didn‚Äôt visit the bar once üòÄ

The food was amazing and everyone commenting on how good the food was. We had 9 children and they even did a 3 course for them with milk or lemonade for the toast which was a lovely little touch and made the children part of the day.

The only thing I would have liked would be to have a dressing room on site for the wedding day rather than travelling from elsewhere but that‚Äôs my personal view.

Thank you to everyone involved in our day ‚ù§Ô∏è

We got married at this beautiful venue 11.08.23 and cannot recommend enough!! Everyone commented saying how perfect the day was, and every detail was covered by the amazing staff!! But every member of staff were just amazing and on the ball with everything. Thank you from a very happy couple ü§ç

I couldn‚Äôt recommend this venue enough. From the day we walked into the darenth to view this venue we have always felt so welcomed and wanted. The venue is absolutely stunning from the outside to the inside üíï myself and my husband would like the thank each and everyone of the staff here at the darenth no words can explain how much you made our dream become a reality üíï we shall be booking to come back for our yearly anniversary. Highly recommend this venue*5

My Wife & I would firstly like to thank Jason for his professionalism, humour, and his skill in dealing with things in real time which put both of us at ease as well as all of our guests.

The catering staff on the day were magnificent and very caring towards us all.

Another plus was the generous of food which all guests appreciated, from the Canopes, Wedding Breakfast & Evening Buffet.

The only issue we did have is that it was agreed that we would have Jallof Rice with the Curry Goat & Fried Fish, but ending up having Rice & Peas with the Curry Goat.

The Jallof Rice being an African dish & Curry Goat being Carribean would have been excellent as we had them at our planning meeting 5 weeks before the Wedding.

The big disappointment was the performance of the in house DJ (Chelmer Discos).

The fact that we could not select our own DJ made us nervous about the music, hence we kept confirming whether the DJ had experience of performing for a mainly Afro Caribbean crowd.

We were advised that this was not an issue, and it turns out according to DJ that he lacks expertise with Afro Beats, Soco & Reggae.

We also asked for the love sign to be displayed as a backdrop in the Ballroom before the Wedding Ceremony commenced which was agreed upon by Chelmer Discos, however it arrived after 19.00.

When we tried to ascertain why the love sign was not delivered at the time agreed, and also, why the music was not mixed as appose to just playing tracks that we emailed to him.

In response we received a rude & threatening email from the in house DJ - Jimmy.

We both loved having our Wedding at The Darenth and all our guests have all commented on how brilliant it was & they loved Jason.

Regards. Mr & Mrs Hutton-Young

We celebrated our wedding day at the darenth on Thursday 25th may.
I can not fault our experience at all. From start to finish Jason/Kerry & the team made our day perfect.

Just had my wedding at The Darenth and what an amazing experience it was from start to finish. The staff are all fantastic they made me feel very special on my day. Thank you so much! We had such a great day. For us the best day of our lives so far!

I could not fault the hospitality of you and your staff. If something wasn‚Äôt there you guys were straight on it. Nothing was too much to ask. Maty really put our minds at ease. We cannot thank the spa hotel enough, they were so incredible and the whole process made us at ease throughout. Our guests were so impressed at the quality of service, food and drink. We are so happy that we chose to have our wedding day at the Spa Hotel! Right from the beginning, you were so fantastic - fielding questions, keeping us on schedule with jobs and always being a very lovely friendly face to speak to whenever we needed. We so, so appreciate you.

The wedding venue was so beautiful - the photographs have come out so well! The backdrop is absolutely stunning. I‚Äôve just forwarded you our wedding video tease and I‚Äôll send some photos separately. Please feel free to use on any social media.

We got married earlier this summer at The Spa Hotel and it was fabulous. Everybody there is so professional and are experts at what they do. Thank you to Tasha, David, Jake and the whole team for helping us on the way and delivering a perfect day (despite the weather) with superb and attentive service as well as everything we requested meeting and exceeding our expectations.

This venue gives 10/10 for everything. We had looked at four venues before this one. Right from the first appointment we knew the venue was gorgeous and it was the one for us! Since booking the staff were always so helpful over emails for any queries whilst I was planning! On the big day we had Lizzie look after us, she is truly the best at what she does!!

We got married on 17 May 2024 and planned a weekend of celebrations with our family and friends, including a 'We tied the knot' cocktail party in the Brasserie on the 18 May 2024. The hotel has a number of quirky and interesting spaces perfect for adding a different feel to parts of your celebration as well as different photo opportunities. It has a trendy and luxurious feel with lots of unique and modern touches. OWP is also a stones throw away from the historic Pantiles which whilst not only beautiful also had a selection of bars, restaurants and boutique shops to entertain our guests during down time. Many of our guests commented it was like being in Europe and again the surrounding areas are perfect for photos.

Not only is the venue beautiful, but the staff and service are absolutely incredible and I do not say this lightly, the service was second to none and everyone was welcoming and friendly creating a true home away from home experience. Karen our Wedding Co-ordinator was amazing and flexible to our different needs. One of the things that attracted us to OWP was our wedding was treated as an individual celebration something we had not found at other venues which had a fairly set itinerary. The food was amazing with a large choice of options, we opted for a deluxe choice menu and it did not disappoint. It was also great value for money which enabled us to carry out our celebrations over a long weekend whilst also focusing on our entertainment and creating the atmosphere we wanted.

If you want a venue that is modern, trendy, flexible and different from the traditional country house wedding then I highly recommend. We have a weekend of memories at One Warwick Park with our nearest and dearest that we will treasure forever and can't wait to return for our anniversary's.

Thank you to the whole One Warwick Park team! Sarah & Sam

All our bags were moved for us we didn't even need to touch anything which was a really nice touch for us.

Can't say a thank you big enough to Karen and her excellent team, we were chose Warwick on recommendation and we can boldly say we were not disappointed.

And will definitely recommend Warwick Park Hotel to anyone looking for a top of the range service and venue.

Days before our wedding I sent Karen a photo of some cocktails I liked, Karen worked with the food and beverage manager to bring my idea into reality. I was so happy ‚Äì thank you so much!

My emotions were high throughout the day and this didn‚Äôt phase you at all, your support was truly appreciated!

We could not be any more happier with the way our wedding day went. We had such amazing feedback from our guests on how gorgeous the venue and the hotel are. And How good the food was!

Thank you so much for everything Karen. You are great at what you do!!
Enjoy every moment of your own wedding very soon! We are sending you all our love!

Please pass our huge thanks to everyone who worked and helped us during our wedding.
It is so very much appreciated. xxxx

We will never be able to thank Karen and the whole One Warwick Park team enough. We always knew we wanted a boutique venue to suit our modest budget and the moment we saw OWP we fell in love with its chic and simple interior, perfect for putting our own spin on our special day. Karen and the OWP team were fantastic throughout the wedding planning process. No request was too big/ difficult for Karen and she was so attentive to our wants and needs. We had the most magical Christmas wedding and cannot be happier with how it all turned out! Thank you Karen and team for making our special day perfect!

We loved this wedding venue the first time we saw it. We wanted a Christmas wedding and the room with the beams, lights and Christmas tree looked amazing. Planning of the wedding was helped by Karen who gave fantastic recommendations. Nothing was too much trouble. We had the most amazing day. Big thank you.

Cannot thank Karen and the OWP staff enough for our magical day. From the moment we saw the venue we fell in love and everything was so simple and we wanted for nothing.

The venue has a modern class in an area of Old style beauty. The venue can comfortably hold either a large number or a smaller more intimate celebration and will still look magical.

When we first visited the hotel I knew it would make the perfect venue for our wedding. The function room was perfect, modern, perfect size, the bar was amazing. It just ticked all the boxes.

Karen was absolutely amazing, she was there every step of the way answering all my question and giving advice. She helped us organised our day and help us make an idea on paper turn into the most amazing day.

Before the wedding day we got to attend a wedding menu tasting session was great, every dish we tried was lovely and so happy with our choices everyone at the wedding said how amazing the food was.

On the day the help from all the staff was amazing from welcoming our guests and helping all our suppliers, made me feel so calm as the bride as I knew I didn‚Äôt have to worry about anything. From start to finish the wedding was perfect and it wouldn‚Äôt have happened without the help of Karen and everyone at the hotel - they turned around the rooms so quickly and the service from the bar staff was perfect.

I couldn‚Äôt recommend this venue enough they have everything you need and more for the perfect wedding.

Chapel House Estate and the team were absolutely amazing! We knew from the first time we saw the venue that it was the one - every single location is beautiful and provides stunning photo opportunities. Every person that we spoke to was so helpful, especially Georgia who was our fabulous on-the-day co-ordinator! We did have a few issues with music during dinner but these were promptly rectified by the staff (with the help of the Head Chef's phone!). The food was absolutely fabulous and I think everyone who came to our wedding was absolutely blown away from start to finish. Thank you so much for making our day everything we dreamed it would be!

The most amazing, stunningly beautiful wedding venue, catered for our micro wedding with as much care an attention as a big wedding, Jade our wedding co-ordinator was amazing! The food in the no 9 restaurant was as out of this world! Highly recommend!

We cannot recommend Chapel House Estate enough. From the very beginning the team here were so helpful and accommodating.

We‚Äôve been to weddings before that have felt a little disorganised and of course, things can happen out of anyone‚Äôs control, however, as soon as booked our wedding here we felt like we were in safe hands. Throughout the entire process, we felt so at ease, and that‚Äôs thanks for the team. Georgia and the team worked so hard for us and it really showed. The day ran so smoothly.

The grounds in the venue are truly stunning too and offered the perfect backdrop for our special day. In summary, you won‚Äôt regret getting married here. The venue is stunning, the team are fantastic and the food is to die for. Thank you so much Chapel House Estate.

We had our wedding here in the court yard this last Sunday and all I can say is wow - they exceeded our expectations and more . From the beautiful venue so well kept , to the staff who went above and beyond so attentive and provided a service more than we could have asked for , so organised and professional , now the food wow the chefs are amazing all of the food from the canap√©s to the main meal were exceptional. Every single one of our guests said the best wedding and venue they have ever attended.
They even accommodated our requests for a tattoo artist , our dog to attend nothing was too much . Thank you so much chapel house for making our day so special xx

My husband and I got married here in August and had the most magical day. All the team, particularly Georgia, Lori, Jade and Sam, were incredible in organising our day and ensuring the day went seamlessly.

Jack and Izzy xx

Whammy!!!!! If there was a secret way to click a sixth star for all...we would!!!!

From the first visit and being shown round to the morning after our wedding the below rings true
