Our wedding day couldn't have been as smooth as it was if it wasn't for Aimee and her staff they made everything so easy for us and she even held my umbrella and helped me across to the church in the morning.

Everything that the staff do is perfect - the food is superb and the whole venue flows nicely for guests. If you are thinking of getting married here look no further or even for a party - it's a fantastic venue and you won't be disappointed.

well what can I say!! an amazing venue with fantastic staff. From beginning to end we were given so much personal service from everyone at the castle but Aimee was amazing!!! from small little touches around the castle to making me and my now husband feel calm before the big moment...Aimee must have had a Mary Poppins bag as she had everything we needed on hand from sewing kits to mints, scissors and glue and we couldn't have asked for a better day. Thank you for making our day so special ...even to the last touch of a hug goodbye this morning .

Amazing venue for our wedding in the summer. Alicia and Sarah worked really hard to make sure we had the best day possible. Both the indoor and outdoor ceremony areas are beautiful and the main barn is a perfect setting for food and dancing. Couldn‚Äôt recommend highly enough.

Chafford Park is a beautiful hidden gem in the glorious English countryside. From the moment we visited, we felt welcomed and really put at ease by the team and the family. The grounds are stunning, with so many opportunities to explore and capture our favourite moments!
With of having use of the two spacious barns to use we were able to really bring our vision to life, and the day panned out perfectly. The venue hire includes the day before your wedding to set everything up, and we booked to stay in the onsite accommodation in the Long Barn (a must!), which really put my nerves at ease knowing that everything was taken care of before the day.

Sarah and the team were extremely helpful, ensuring we had everything we needed for the day. All of our suppliers went above and beyond, the waiting and bar team were super attentive and great fun!

We had so many of our guests commenting on the venue, the service and the day itself, we just couldn't have asked for more.

We honestly couldn't have imagined our day being any better, we are still on a high from the entire day and cannot recommend this venue highly enough. Thank you so much!!

We knew we wanted to hold our big day at Chafford Park as soon as we first visited the previous spring. We always wanted a venue which was a blank canvas that we could put our own stamp on and it was perfect for this, with the two beautiful barns for us to dress and decorate for the ceremony and wedding breakfast and free reign on our choice of cater, but with a emphasis on trying to keep it local which we liked. The journey for the bridal party from the house to the ceremony barn is beautiful too, passed the pond and through the trees.

As we both work in events we loved having the bell tents as the backdrop for our friends to stay in and having the fire pits and festoon at night time gave the outside area a real festival feel.
It was also a big plus that we could stay on site for two nights - we legally got married on the Friday with a small group of family and friends and then cooked a big meal in the house that night.

Alicia and Sarah were helpful and prompt with any queries in the lead up and we‚Äôre very grateful to Charlotte who made sure everything ran smoothly for us on the day itself too.

We hope to return one day for a glamping weekend and to reminisce.

We recently celebrated our wedding at Chafford Park, and it was an absolute dream!

The team's dedication to making our wedding unforgettable, from the initial planning stages to the last dance, the staff demonstrated a fabulous level of commitment. They took care of every detail, ensuring that our vision came to life seamlessly.

Our guests couldn't stop raving about the stunning venue. The charm of the barns, coupled with the picturesque surroundings, created a warm and romantic atmosphere that perfectly complemented our day. The natural beauty of Chafford Park added an extra layer of magic to our celebration, making the entire weekend feel like a fairytale. Waking up in the long barn was nothing short of glorious. The tranquillity of the setting and the connection with nature created a serene and peaceful atmosphere. It was the perfect way to start our journey as a married couple.

We loved having the use of two barns one for the ceremony and the other for our reception and the transition from one space to another was seamless, and it made the entire event flow effortlessly. We appreciated the thoughtfulness behind this arrangement, allowing us to savour every moment without any stress.

Our experience at Chafford Park was beyond our wildest dreams. If you're looking for a venue that combines natural beauty, thoughtful design, and a dedicated team, Chafford Park is the perfect choice.

Could not recommend Chafford Park more. It is such a beautiful venue and the team are constantly improving and adding extra touches to the venue.

I loved the ability to chose our own caterers - I was able to bring in my African heritage by choosing an African caterer and it really made the day feel unique and special to us.

The sound system is unusual but once you are underneath it, it is great. We worked with a recommend DJ and saxophonist from Mint DJs who were really great and got the party started.

The added touch of having rooms on site for the family really made it easier. We were able to have a lovely family dinner the night before and able to enjoy the farm for the full three days.

Really was our dream day and we are so grateful.

Where to start...what a beautiful wedding venue. So picturesque and relaxed. The grounds feel luxurious and private without losing the homely aspects we wanted for our special day. We knew when we looked at Chafford Park that it was the perfect place for our wedding. Sarah, Alicia and Catherine are an excellent team who have an eye for detail and really made sure we were looked after throughout the lead up and on the day. All questions are answered promptly and with care. The landscaped area around the stunning barns provide a perfect backdrop for photos and the barns made the most intimate space for our ceremony and reception. We are so grateful for the time and care to make our day so special. Highly recommend to go and view Chafford park and find out why it is just so special.

Even though we had torrential rain on the day, Catie and Sarah made the day flow really well. All staff were incredible and so friendly. The grounds are incredible too. We wanted a laid back wedding with a slight rustic vibe and this delivered! Thank you all, I just wish I could do it all again xx

By far the most beautiful wedding location I have been to. The estate owners and staff were so professional and truly went above and beyond to make my sisters wedding the most special day of her life. Thank you Sarah, Alicia and the team! X

Despite the stunning facade of this venue, its owners and managers are incredibly rude, making planning and having a wedding at Chafford Park an uncomfortable experience.

On our first visit before booking, we loved what the venue offered and how beautiful it was. Sarah the owner was pleasant and kind and we consequently booked a week later.
However after booking, there followed 12 months of terrible communication, pulling back on previous promises made and generally being very uncompromising with our plans.
We didn‚Äôt feel Sarah or her daughter Alicia were on our side at any point and felt that they were more concerned about keeping their venue pristine than helping people have a beautiful wedding.

We had such a magical wedding day, despite them. Our guests and vendors contributed to an incredible day and I didn‚Äôt feel stressed at all. But behind the scenes, our catering staff and wedding coordinator were having to deal with so much hostility from the managers. They came in, in the middle of service to tell the staff that the kitchen area was too messy!! So incredibly rude and completely unprofessional. And this was only one incident amongst many that I heard post wedding where they were rude and disrespectful towards vendors and guests alike.

You are also obliged to partner with Wild Box to serve the drinks when you book this venue - they work closely with Chafford Park so essentially are almost as hostile. There are many things that you can‚Äôt do - put up your own decorations, bring your own alcohol or have a campfire past midnight. We luckily found our way around all of this but they made the whole thing so difficult and uncomfortable.

I would encourage anyone to not be lured in by the beautiful surroundings and look elsewhere if you want a more friendly and compromising service.

We had the most amazing wedding at Chafford Park! It really is the most stunning venue, especially in June when everything is in full bloom. We really wanted as many of our friends to be able to stay with us across the whole weekend and this venue offered just that. The Glamping tents were a huge hit with our guests and the long barn where we stayed was beautiful (and perfect for getting all the girls glammed up on the big day!) Being able to access the venue from Friday morning until Sunday midday meant we could fully enjoy time with firends and family who had travelled so far to be with us.

Alicia and Sarah were so helpful, making sure everything was just as we wanted it and that the day ran smoothly. We couldn‚Äôt have pictured a more perfect place for our wedding and can‚Äôt wait to return for some more glamping in the years to come!

Where do we start with this review? Well, if you are looking for a venue that has practically everything this is it. The staff are fantastic, they were brilliant from the day we booked it and even after the event. They were helpful all the way through the journey and on the day the staff we great. Our guests had the most amazing time and all said it was one of the best weddings they had been too. Granted the weather helped, but a mild sunny day in April made it perfect. The food was 10 out of 10, really do recommend the upgrade on the menu choices and wine. The in house DJ was also excellent. In fact everything went to plan, there was nothing negative just the perfect magical day.

We got married at the Ferry House last Saturday and had the most amazing magical day and that was all down to the incredible team at The Ferry House.
Sam & Chloe were our wedding coordinators on the day and they were absolutely faultless, the day ran perfectly and that was all down to them both.
The food was incredible and every one of our guests commented on how amazing the food quality was.
The rooms were super comfortable.
The venue overall was just incredible, we would highly recommend anyone getting married to celebrate here.
Thank you all

This venue is a hidden gem, we didn't know about it until we were looking at Venues and we instantly knew this was the place for us. Relaxed, rustic, caring and everything in one place! The venue itself is so warm and inviting with the log burning fires, rustic bar, barn and amazing surroundings. The team go above and beyond to make your day extra special.
The food selection is amazing, we had the hog roast which everyone commented on!
Thank you to everyone at The Ferry House, our day was amazing!

Our winter wedding at The Ferry House was just perfect, and that is all thanks to the amazing team. The care and attention to detail they had to understanding our vibe and making our vision come to life was just second to none. We have so many amazing memories of the day and also the planning stages. The setting was beautiful, the food and drink were amazing, and the staff were all super friendly.
All of our guests loved everything about the day and are still talking about it now.
Thank you so much for making our wedding dreams come true, core memory made!

Our special day tailored to our exact requirements, staff professional from original viewing to the day, cannot thank them enough, what they always say about a good place is the staff make the venue, and they sure do at the ferry house. Beautiful venue in picturesque surroundings worth every penny

The Ferry house is an absolutely amazing , our wedding day was magical .
Our guests all said what a beautiful venue .
The food is outstanding and all the staff are very helpful. From the first planning meeting up to the day of the wedding .
Nothing was to much trouble if I had a query they was always at the end of email .
Myself and the bridal party stayed at the cottages the night before , this really added to the excitement of our wedding day .
The rooms at the Ferry house are decorated to a high standard and are very comfortable. The food is amazing.
We would highly recommend this venue . Our wedding day was perfect .

I don‚Äôt even know where to start - the Ferry House was the perfect venue for our big day. Nothing was too much trouble and they made the whole planning process so easy. I have worked at weddings myself and know how venues can sometimes be difficult and reluctant to help with certain things but not the Ferry House!
They decorated the venue with my diy decorations without any issues, they answered my constant emails (crazy quickly!) and even put up with me doing everything last minute!
The actual day itself, they were so helpful, excited for us and just made us feel amazing!
The venue is just absolutely gorgeous - nearly every guest came up to us on the day to tell us how amazing it was and they honestly felt it was the best wedding they had been to! All thanks to the Ferry House. If we could do it all again we would both choose the ferry house again in an instant.

We just wanted to say a huge thank you to the whole Ferry House team for all of their hard work, support, kindness and helpfulness in making our day so incredibly perfect. Our guests were so amazed, and keep telling us as much!

It wouldn't have been as wonderful without the team all part of it, and Josh was the best DJ! He played some absolute tunes. Owen took great care of everyone down by the firepit.

Chef and his team put out some absolutely incredible food, everyone has been raving about it since. The food was simply perfect, we're having roast dinner withdrawals at this point....

Katy took care of me and pampered me for six months in the run up to the wedding with the facials, definitely one of the best parts of wedding planning, she got rid of any worries in each session, I will definitely be continuing with those, I miss her already! They should be a must for every bride to be!

Maxine & Georgina, where can we start? They were both the most organised, reassuring, fantastic team, they were truly perfect, being the calming voices of reason, and helping move everything indoors in the morning.

We would write an essay about how amazing each and every one of the Ferry House team are. Every single one of the Ferry House team are truly one in a million, and TFH are very lucky to have them all.

Our son has just been married at The ferry house.
From start to finish the staff and wedding team have been incredible!
The attention to detail, care and kindness of all the staff is the best we have ever received. They were simply amazing.
The venue itself, is totally worth the journey .
It was absolutely stunning and took our breath away when we saw it decorated.
We stayed overnight and the rooms were beautiful, clean and really comfortable.
Our buffet breakfast in the morning was delicious, full of fresh produce.
The food did not disappoint, it was the best wedding breakfast meal we have had.
Congratulations on a top star venue and a brilliant team of staff from the washing up lady to the wedding planners (Maxine was especially brilliant and also our assigned host who never stopped smiling despite our requests for this and that).
Thank you one and all for making Harry & Dan‚Äôs day totally amazing! We couldn‚Äôt have asked for more .

The best team of people you could ask for! Every single person we spoke with was so helpful and lovely to deal with. They made our day so special and run seamlessly! We couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better team!
The food and drink is the best around, locally sourced making it all taste so much better! And the views, away from everything so you can really soak in the day with your loved ones with no distractions!
Couldn‚Äôt ask for more

I fell in love with Hayne House the second we went to our viewing and it only got better from there.
The pre-wedding process with the team at Hayne House was amazing, they were so accommodating and responsive and had answers to all the question that my Type A Bride brain threw at them. Throughout the planning process they were fabulous and it was so nice to find a venue where we could both get ready on site in the morning.
On the day, the Hayne House team (Beth) were absolutely fabulous. Beth kept me calm all morning and made me feel like we were in safe hands. We DIY-ed all our decor and Beth asked my input on the set up before the Groom turned up which really put me at ease. Beth also managed our ceremony music on a phone and it just made me feel so comfortable. Pre-aisle walk, Beth really helped me understand what would happen and really set my nerves at ease. The whole team were incredible and they made our day so so perfect.
We couldn't have asked for more. The venue is stunning and the team are amazing! I would recommend Hayne House to absolutely anyone! We also really loved the sustainability initiative, as we're both conscious of that, and that's what initially made us look at Hayne House. 100000% would recommend!

We were married at Hayne House in August 2024, it was one of only 2 venues we selected to view at relatively short notice (we decided to give ourselves only 6 months planning time and were lucky they had availability for our chosen weekend!) - Sam was the first person we met and so welcoming. She really helped us imagine, in the cold of winter, how our summer wedding could be. We absolutely fell in love with the orangery from seeing the photos, but the reality was even better. Our key criteria was a venue that felt like a summer garden party, and you really got a sense of the lovely grounds by being able to see out to them all around you, even from inside the venue.
Becky gave us some great guidance throughout the planning, and Ella and team made the day run very smoothly.
6 months later, our guests are still talking about the beautiful relaxing day - it was everything we imagined - and better!
Safe for the children to run around already beautiful so don't need to much decoration, staff couldn't of done any more on the day to help.

Hayne House was absolutely perfect.
The wedding Co ordinator Ella was so professional. She kept everyone calm and organised throughout the day. Would highly reccomend Hayne House as a wedding venue everything was fantastic!

Hayne House was just the most perfect setting for our wedding. It‚Äôs private and beautiful surroundings coupled with amazing staff, food and suppliers - we couldn‚Äôt have asked for more or had a better day.

We couldn‚Äôt have asked for a more superb venue and team! They made sure we had everything we needed on the day and we‚Äôre just so kind and helpful leading up to the wedding. They answered all our queries super quickly and the whole day just felt like a breeze!

Hayne House is a beautiful wedding venue with a amazing team of staff! They supported us every step of the way and made sure everything ran smoothly on the day. They go above and beyond to make sure everything is perfect. I would especially recommend Hayne House if you have children as they are free to play the entire day! We had so many comments from guests about how beautiful the venue is and how amazing the staff are.

The team have curated a flawless operation at Hayne House which is so clear. The team ensured the day ran seamlessly and were amazing throughout the day and also during the lead up to our wedding which made it so stress-free and easy for us! There was not one thing that we needed to worry about on the day, the team handled EVERYTHING!! We had the best day and we're so pleased we chose Hayne House for our wedding, it was perfect!

Had our wedding at Hayne House in June 2023- cannot fault a single thing with the team, services or facilities. Am so glad we chose Hayne House and would recommend to anyone wanting to get married stress free with a fantastic team who truly take the pressure off of wedding planning and are extremely flexible with requests and adjustments. Very good value for money and honestly all expectations were exceeded! Everything was well thought of and planned, there were no surprises and communication was excellent from the moment we made initial contact. Was such a special and memorable day due to the efforts and high quality of care and services at Hayne House.

As soon as we saw Hayne House we knew it was the perfect venue. The team are so welcoming and lovely. To the lead up to the big day they helped with everything. On the big day they may us feel at ease. I cannot recommend this venue enough, all of our guests said what a beautiful venue it is. They made our day so special, we enjoyed every little bit of it, thank you to all the team!

My son had his wedding at Bradbourne House, the venue was beautiful, the staff were so helpful from start to finish, food was absolutely amazing, the toastmaster was a credit to the venue making this a day him and his new wife will never forget I would thoroughly recommend Bradbourne House for a wedding venue.

We had our reception here from the moment we arrived we were looked after and our guests were well informed. Hannah was fantastic and made our evening run smoothly and nothing was too much for her, she even helped me with my dress before my first dance and always asked if I was okay. Lauren was our first point of contact and she is lovely as is Rebecca. Thank you all so much. I would definitely recommend Bradbourne house not just for its beauty and privacy but for its team too.

On Saturday 27th October 2018 Julie and I had our renewal of Vows celebration at Bradbourne house, from our initial contact with Lauren at the Wedding Fair to the tasting menu to the day itself was a professional and dedicated service.

Bradbourne House has understood our requirements and ensured that the delivery of these were met without fuss or bother.

The food delivered from the Head Chef from Canapes to Wedding Breakfast to the Hog roast in the evening was first class.

The day itself ran like clockwork and the staff were again professional in their duties to ensure that all our guests were looked after.

It was a 5 star experience and we are already booking for our milestone birthdays in the next year or so.

A special thanks to Lauren and Head Chef who went beyond the call of duty to make it that special.

To all the fabulous staff and Bradbourne House, thank you so very much for your wonderful wedding organisation, wine knowledge, kitchen and food skills and ability to put on a great day as a team. You are all fantastic and a real asset to your employers. We are so very glad that we chose you as our venue. A no hassle and pleasant experience from start to finish. Wonderful! Thank you!

From start to finish, Bradbourne House was wonderful in delivering the most perfect wedding reception for us. The house and gardens are absolutely beautiful and give you a great amount of space. What really made it was the staff. Everyone from the events team who worked with us for months beforehand, to the fantastic team on the day who thought of everything we hadn't and were there whenever we needed them. It meant we were free to enjoy the company of our guests and not worry about a thing. Perfect day and can't recommend it enough for a dream wedding venue.

To all at Bradbourne House.

Just a big thank you for making the Wedding of Paul and David such a memorable day. The venue was delightful and everything you did made it the most wonderful occasion. Everyone said it was the best wedding they had ever attended! The weather, the setting, the staff and the food was absolutely perfect.

So as the mother of Paul i thank you so much for a day to remember, it was absolutely flawless.
Thank you all again.
Just a little note to say a big thank you for making our day run so smoothly. It all went perfectly for us and everybody was so complimentary of Bradbourne House.

To all at Bradbourne... thanks so much for making it a super special day for me and Emma. Your whole team was superb, especially Charlotte, and made the day very easy for us. We had so many nice comments from guests about the venue, the food and the staff. A few pics as requested!

We just wanted to say a massive thank you to all of you and the fantastic team that helped make the day special!
The staff and service were all exceptional and nearly all the guests commented on the high standard of service and professionalism of your team. Food... Amazing!!

Thank you all so much. You took the pressure off before and during the wedding and delivered to us a day that no one will forget for a long time to come.

I attended Bradbourne House on Saturday 18th June for my cousin wedding.

I am unable to eat wheat/gluten so passed this on to the bride and groom beforehand.

I am just getting in touch to say how great your staff were at facilitating my needs! The food was delicious and they made sure it was gluten free for me. In the evening fish and chips and bacon sandwiches were being served. I was unable to have the fish as covered in wheat but a very kind gentleman brought me out two bacon sandwiches in gluten free rolls. This was very much appreciated. I was also advised the chips were gluten free!

Thank you for being so accommodating. It is much appreciated!

We cannot express how grateful and happy we were with Westerham Golf Club. All of the staff were amazing and our event managers made sure we were always kept up to date and incredibly quick to reply (even though we bombarded them with our silly questions!) They made us feel so at ease and took care of all the little details they we didn't even think of! The food was delicious and they ensured that everyone was catered for. If you want a beautiful, seamless wedding experience, Westerham Golf Club is the place to book!

Everything about this venue was just perfect. From our first visit up until our wedding date, the team at Westerham were so helpful and always on hand to answer any questions. On the day, the team had everything under control and the whole day went smoothly - not to mention the incredible views!

We honestly cannot recommend Westerham Golf Club enough as a wedding venue! From the moment we first reached out to inquire, the team made everything so easy and stress-free. The events manager and the coordinating team were absolute professionals, and they went above and beyond to ensure that our big day was flawless.

Everything about the day was incredibly well-organised. From the ceremony to the reception, everything flowed so seamlessly. We didn‚Äôt have to worry about a single thing as the team had every detail covered. It was amazing to be able to relax and enjoy the moment, knowing that the entire team had everything under control.

The venue itself is absolutely stunning, with beautiful views and a warm, welcoming atmosphere. The level of care and attention the staff gave us was exceptional. The events manager was always there to offer support and guidance, and they were just so kind and approachable. The entire team worked in perfect harmony, and their professionalism shone through at every step.

Our guests had an unforgettable time, and I‚Äôm so grateful to the team at Westerham Golf Club for making our wedding day so memorable. If you‚Äôre looking for a wedding venue that offers top-tier service, incredible organisation, and a beautiful setting, Westerham Golf Club is the perfect choice!

We visited many venues before deciding on Westerham. What stood out right away was how lovely and welcoming the staff were on that initial visit, they really made us feel like no question was too silly to ask. And of course the setting - we initially wanted an outdoors wedding but knew that there'd be the risk of bad weather, so it was important any outdoor venue would have a great indoor backup. With Westerham, you can't have an outdoor wedding, but the indoor setting, with wide open windows revealing the beautiful landscaped golf course in all directions, meant it was like an outdoor wedding anyway. And it was just as well because on the actual wedding day, there were quite high winds! The team there were so helpful and patient throughout the whole year of planning, and on the day itself. They really put our minds at ease and were really flexible with some of our requests. The reception rooms are great - the smaller one for the ceremony was just the perfect size for our 100 guests, and the larger room for the wedding breakfast and evening celebration was spacious with room to eat, to dance, and to sit to catch your breath. The golf course is a wonderful setting to go out and get your formal photos and some video shot. It's fun to take some of the golf carts up into the wooded area and a chance to have some private moments with your new spouse. It's such a beautiful setting, we would recommend if you can afford it to include some drone footage, for your wedding video because it allows such a great view of the course, the buildings and water features. The food was excellent, in particular the lamb shank, and such huge portions that we struggled to eat a lot later in the evening at the buffet supper. Well worth paying the small extra supplement to allow 2 menu choices plus a veggie/vegan option. They also managed a few tricky dietary requirements really well including Halal and some fairly unique food allergies. Our formal proceedings were capped off by a fireworks display out on the golf course which made for some amazing pictures and video and if you can afford it, we would recommend it. Many guests said it was their favourite part of the evening and a real surprise. We couldn't be happier with our decision to be married here and it's hard now to imagine us getting married at any of the other venues we looked at. You will have a wonderful day no matter what time of year or whatever your theme.
Amazing staff and amazing place. Loved every minute of my big day. They put in all the effort in to your big day. They made sure the day was perfect

Amazing experience from start to finish!
Fell in love with the venue the day we went and viewed it! It was all we imagined!
Gracie was Amazing the whole way through until the big day for us!
I honestly wish I could relive the day!

The day from start to finish is all we ever dreamed off! And I couldn‚Äôt recommend this venue enough and the team!

When we began our wedding venue search, our main criteria were:

- good proximity to airport for international guests
- ceremony and reception at the same place, without the need to exit / reset
- no preferred supplier limitations
- kitchen on site (no need to hire externally)
- natural materials, like wood and brick, barn aesthetic
- indoor space we'd be happy not to leave in bad weather
- can have live music with no formal noise limiter
- experienced & supportive team
- budget

Westerham Golf Club delivered all of this and so much more. As soon as we visited the venue for the first time and spoke to the team we were confident we found our venue.

We were assigned a contact person straight away who answered all of our questions by email and phone conversations and was always unbelievably helpful and quick to respond.

In the lead up to the day we met our wedding day coordinators who we were reassured were very on the ball. We had a lot of personal details and touches throughout the day and never felt that we had to remind any of the team about them, they all understood the vision and knew all the intricate details of the day. They delivered them all without fault.

The venue on the day looked absolutely stunning. The exposed brick and beams in the Valence Suite make this feel like a cozy but expansive barn conversion, but with the benefit of the adjoining rooms, wrap around balcony and excellent facilities of the golf club. The views are spectacular and the tree-lined drive up to the venue really sets a great tone.

Throughout the day everything ran like clockwork, guests commented that the food was incredible and all of our suppliers worked with ease with the staff and facilities.

The team set up all our personal and homemade things for us and packed them all away again for easy collection the next morning - we are so so grateful for this!

The flow of the space is fantastic, we had our ceremony in the Eleanor Suite, then did confetti outside before re-entering the main space where the drinks reception were laid out and musicians performing. The bar area, sofas, dance floor and balcony were perfect for the canapes and drinks reception. We had photos on the grounds as well as in the lovely rose garden at the front of the venue. The dinner set up was there from the morning and had a real wow factor when guests first saw it. While Eleanor Suite was empty the chairs were quickly cleared and this became a breakout space where we laid out board games and guests could relax if they didn't want to be dancing with the band.

We got married in November and had a lot of evening guests, so having a space with plenty of room, without anyone needing to go outside (in case of cold/rain) was key and the venue was perfect in this regard. In the end we had a lovely clear day and guests really enjoyed being on the balcony.

I hope this review is helpful in helping other couples choose their venue. For us it was a dream come true and we cannot thank the team enough for delivering a perfect day!

The lead up the wedding was great, Ella helped us with any little questions and made sure everything was sorted!

The day before we met the on the day manager Brad who talked us through the whole day and made sure we were happy with everything. Also when we walked in one of our suppliers hadn‚Äôt done what they were meant to - and the venue got on the phone to them right away to come back and sort it meaning the stress was off me!

The day came and it was a blur, but everything went smoothly, my guests couldn‚Äôt stop complimenting the venue and how gorgeous it was. Every detail was perfect and the food was amazing! The wine choices were a big hit and I couldn‚Äôt be more complimentary of the staff.

The only hiccup we had was when asking for a cup of tea for my Nan during the welcome drinks, and my brother was told they can‚Äôt do that by the bar, but my groom went up and it was sorted quickly.

Thanks westerham for a memorable day - that we will cherish always

Westerham is a beautiful venue. The backdrop of the luscious green golf course and the building itself is amazing. The rose garden is the perfect place for a drinks reception - even the drive into the venue is cool!

Now to come onto the staff. Every single one of them couldn‚Äôt do enough for us. The communication at every step was faultless, and they are extremely helpful regardless of who you deal with! They are professional and can accommodate a whole variety of things, for example we asked for halal meat and they sourced it without any issue, no extra costs or anything. Their recommended suppliers are great, and they really make you feel at ease throughout the whole process and on the day.

The food is also VERY good. All of our guests were complimentary of that, as well as the decoration and table layout which is rustic and picturesque.

Having the licensed ceremony room in the same venue was perfect, as your guests can simply walk through the door into the wedding breakfast and evening reception room! The bar is well stocked, the wine selection was well received by our guests too.

We really can‚Äôt recommend Westerham enough. A few of my friends who were there are now considering it for their wedding venue, it‚Äôs that good and I found beat all others on price too!

We made the best decision choosing Westerham Golf Club for our wedding venue. Id also recommend a Christmas wedding as the atmosphere is something else. Thanks again Eastwell Manor, Dawn and the team, you are amazing ü§© Love Mr & Mrs Smith (22.12.24) üéÑ xx

We got married at Eastwell Manor in May and honestly, it was the perfect day from start to finish! The venue is absolutely stunning ‚Äî the grounds, the house, everything just felt like a fairytale. The staff were incredible and made us feel so relaxed and looked after the entire time. They really went above and beyond to make sure everything ran smoothly. The food was amazing, the setup was beautiful, and all our guests were raving about the whole experience. We couldn‚Äôt have picked a better place to say ‚ÄúI do‚Äù. Massive thanks to everyone at Eastwell Manor ‚Äî you helped make our day so special and we‚Äôll treasure it forever!

We visited Eastwell Manor when looking for venues and instantly fell in love with it. The grounds are so impressive and the inside very homely and comfortable. The wedding team are extremely helpful and professional and helped make our day perfect. The rooms are all lovely, particularly in the manor house and all guests were very happy with them. Particular thanks to Helen, Dawn, Tracey and Chris for the lead up to our big day and for coordinating our day so well without any issues. The food tasting was amazing and had a real personal touch and the food was very well executed on the day with no delays and again our guests have been saying how much they enjoyed it. Our toastmaster Jim was fantastic and also ensured our day went perfectly. Thank you to all of those behind the scenes in the kitchen and the efficient staff who assisted with the wedding breakfast and bar in the evening. Would highly recommend this venue.

Really lovely venue, the whole day went really smoothly and big thanks to Jim who did an amazing job MCing and corralling the crowd when needed. Really made the day run smoothly, everyone had an awesome time.

After postponing our wedding and even losing our original venue due to Covid, we knew that finding an alternative that we loved just as much was going to be tough. Eastwell Manor is every bit as beautiful as the photos suggest, and after visiting, we knew we‚Äôd found the perfect place for us immediately.
The Maid‚Äôs Garden fit our dreams of an outdoor ceremony perfectly with its ivy-lined walls, manicured lawns, pond and Italian gazebo. The terrace with its views overlooking the endless grounds was the ideal space for our reception drinks and canap√©s, especially on a blue-skied day in June. The wood-panelled Rose Garden Room made the perfect setting for an intimate wedding breakfast with 80 of our closest friends and family. The room was transformed for the evening reception with fairy lights (put up very kindly, and at short notice, by the venue staff) candles and a DJ, with the neighbouring Chaucer Room serving as our bar and a slightly more relaxed setting for our guests. During the evening we also held a barbecue on the terrace as the sun went down with plenty of food for everyone to enjoy.
It‚Äôs worth adding that with so much accommodation available in the Manor House and Mews, it really had the feel of a destination wedding. Friends and family were able to stay on-site for a long weekend, giving us the chance to celebrate with them the night before and all enjoy the fabulous spa facilities the day after.
We can‚Äôt emphasise enough that all of this was made possible by the outstanding team at Eastwell Manor, who literally could not have done anything more to ensure that we had the best day of our lives. They really did go above and beyond and made us both feel as if the entire hotel was our home for the day. This extends far beyond the exceptional wedding and events team. From the bar and waiting staff always happy and willing to help, to the reception staff that were on-hand at all hours and the incredible chefs that served the best wedding food we have ever had (our guests still talk about the beef!). Helen and Jasmine were a dream to work with, being flexible with all of our requests and doing everything they could to make sure that all of our ideas were realised on the day. A special mention has to go to Chris - an absolute asset to the Eastwell team, he worked tirelessly to ensure everything went without a hitch on the day, and all while looking cool, calm and collected. You really are in excellent hands with this team!
We cannot thank the whole team at Eastwell Manor enough, they gave us our dream wedding day and we wholeheartedly recommend them to everyone!
Kat & Mikey

Thank you so much for such an amazing day, food was fabulous, over the moon with how things went

Wow!! As soon as I visited The Barn I knew it was the perfect venue for our wedding and I was right! Our day was absolutely perfect and everything went so smoothly thanks to every one at The Barn! Everyone made you feel so comfortable and nothing was ever too much for them! They set up the venue exactly how I had visioned it and all the guests loved the food! We love going back now for a drink or food and they are always so welcoming still!

Amy & I celebrated our marrage at the barn which couldn't have been better.

The staff were very friendly and extremely organised, going out of their way to make sure everything flowed effortlessly.

This put us both and our guests at ease to enjoy every moment.

I cannot thank everyone at The Barn enough for making our wedding day the best day of our lives. It's hard to put into words how perfect everything was. From start to finish every detail was well thought out, every change of plan and sudden request was catered for and throughout you knew you were in safe hands. The venue is beautiful, staff are incredibly friendly, polite and helpful. Food and drink is amazing. The list goes on and on. All I can say again, is Thank You. Cannot recommend highly enough!

We recently had our wedding at The Barn and from the moment we contacted Philippe we couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better experience. With only 4 months between booking and event it was great that communication and planning with Janet was easy, flexible, timely and supportive ‚Äì from our plans with various music playlists needed on different sound systems to arranging our rehearsal the day before, all the little details were accommodated.

The location of The Barn is really accessible being in the centre of town, with plenty of places for guests to stay nearby, yet it feels very private as it is set away from the main road down a private street with no passing traffic. It is a gorgeous venue, really intimate but with plenty of space for our 70 guests, and the team had done an excellent job of setting up and laying out our table decorations beautifully; it was a wonderful space for us to connect with our guests.

All the staff were professional, friendly and helpful throughout the event; many of our guests commented on how lovely they were, along with how fantastic the venue was.

The food was delicious, guests choose from 4 meals on each course, and every one of them looked amazing, we‚Äôve heard many compliments of every option. Service throughout the meal was excellent, a good level of attentive, efficient and unobtrusive, they served a large room at a good pace.

The whole running of the day was done smoothly, changing areas worked really well, we hardly noticed the hard work going on downstairs while we had our meal.

We can‚Äôt thank the team at The Barn enough for helping us have such a wonderful day and we highly recommend this wonderful venue!

There‚Äôs no words to describe the barn or their team. If you haven‚Äôt already booked a wedding with them, do it, and don‚Äôt think twice!

Philippe and Janet are amazing, from our initial emails and queries, through to the booking and the meeting to discuss our options etc. We were presented with a lovely folder containing all of the information, and some sample menus - given plenty of choices to give to guests (allowed up to 4 of each for adults, and 2 of each for children - loads more flexibility than a lot of other venues)

We dropped off our decorations the day before, and it‚Äôs lovely to see local businesses working together to support each other and the area (they supply discount codes for local hotels), and the Hotel were happy for us to leave a car in the car park overnight before.

When I arrived at the venue, the team had decorated it just how we wanted it, with all of our name places out, activity packs, favours etc.

Nothing was too much trouble, we had vegetarians, coeliacs and allergies - all the food was impeccable. Every single person commented on how great their sea bass was, or how tender (and huge!) the rack of lamb was, it‚Äôs safe to say they catered for everyone (gluten free ice cream, gluten free bread rolls etc). Even catered for a vegetarian child at short notice !

Their house DJ (Luke Swift) did a great job too, keeping the music flowing and people up on their feet - a real crowd pleaser.

The bar staff, were incredible - smiles all round, enjoying the day as much as we were - making it extra special.

The sweet cart, patisserie selection and cheese tower looked great too (even supplied gluten free crackers for that too)!

Philippe, Janet, Andrew, Jack & Toby (and the rest of the back of house team), thank you so much for making our day so memorable, every single one of our guests said how great they day was, and you‚Äôve even secured a few new restaurant customers (from as far as Greenwich) who are coming back as they want to taste the other food options üòÇ!!

We had our wedding here in November & ourselves & all of our guests had the best day. The staff were nothing short of amazing, so attentive & really couldn‚Äôt do enough for you. The food was brilliant, everyone said how they enjoyed every course & the evening buffet too! You got to choose out of a big list per course, so you could give your guests 4 options per course to choose from which is very very rare with wedding breakfasts! It really is such a beautiful & intimate venue with exceptional prices. They decorated it perfectly, exactly how we imagined. We dropped 5+ boxes off the night before & a description of how we‚Äôd like everything & the staff did it perfectly. Not one thing was wrong. We had outside suppliers for a couple of decor/sweet Cart items who failed to turn up, I found out as I was about to walk down the aisle so was upset and stressed. The Barn staff, especially Phillippe, sorted everything and to my surprise in the evening we had a stocked sweet table decorated downstairs for us & our guests, they really do go above & beyond for you. We have no complaints or reservations at all about this venue & would 100% recommend it to everyone. The ceremony room looked so pretty too, with the chairs covered & the pretty twig trees, we didn‚Äôt need any more decor in there than that, the orangery is such a pretty room on its own. As is the rest of the venue with gorgeous wooden beams, it can suit all sorts of wedding themes. Thank you to everyone at The Barn for making our special day, the best day ever!

Patrick and I had our wedding reception at the Barn on the 31st July 2022 and we could not have chosen a more perfect venue for our special day.
On viewing The Barn, we both instantly fell in love with this beautiful venue which is also in such a perfect location in the centre of Tunbridge Wells, so convenient for our guests, many of who would be staying in nearby hotels. Having a smaller wedding, we were also thrilled that we could have the exclusive use of the venue for the whole day which later proved to add to the relaxing atmosphere of the occasion.
Philippe was so friendly and helpful in guiding us with our choices which made everything so much easier and ensured all ran smoothly on the day.
Throughout the process, Janet was amazing too and always answered my questions promptly, nothing was too much trouble.
Like many couples who get married here, we had our photos taken in Calverley park, which is just across the road from the venue, again so convenient as we did not have to leave our guests for too long.
The food was delicious, and we had many compliments, it was also wonderful to be able to offer our guests individual menus from the various choices available, a feature I would not have previously thought was possible. The welcome canapes and the evening buffet were also very well received.
Luke Swift, the resident DJ, was great too and kept the dancers on their feet.
We are so pleased that we chose The Barn for our wedding and can not recommend this venue highly enough. We thoroughly enjoyed the day and all our guests had a fabulous time.
Dear Janet and Philippe, we so appreciate everything you did to make our day so special and one that we will always remember.
Thank you so much,
Christine & Patrick x

The best choice we made was having our wedding at the oak barn frame farm! Not only is the space gorgeous, but it's eco friendly, has lots of different options depending on preference and weather, and they have beautiful cottages for family and close friends to stay close and the option to spend the whole weekend at the farm! It was exactly what we were looking for! And the best part was the support! Chrystelle was amazing!! She helped us through the whole planning process and gave us the invaluable list of suppliers( who were all amazing!). She is such a professional and a wonderful person! She really went above and beyond making sure we had the best day (weekend) of our lives! Couldn't recommend this place more! If you're looking for a country wedding, you've found your place!

We had our wedding in October 2024 at the Oak Barn Frame Farm and we couldn‚Äôt have picked a more perfect venue! From the moment we looked around the barn, we both knew it was the place for us. Having 3 barns meant we were able to keep our 50 guests entertained and still have beautiful spaces. We weren‚Äôt sure what to expect with dry-hire, but the barn is so beautiful it could be kept minimal if you‚Äôre on a budget, but being able to personalise it to how we wanted it made it extra special for us. The open fields, waterfall and sheep meant we got some amazing photos (from our photographer Matt Birchall) as well as the best memories. Chrystelle couldn‚Äôt have been more helpful, from her communication in planning, to the materials provided in the run up to the wedding, and her excellent organisation on the day meaning our wedding ran seamlessly and we didn‚Äôt have to worry about anything. The list of trusted suppliers was great too, and we used quite a few who were also great. The accommodation on site was an added bonus for us and family, and all of our friends and family commented on what a perfect venue we‚Äôd chosen. Being environmentally focused was also a huge bonus for us, as it really aligned with our values. Thank you to all at the Oak Barn for giving us the happiest day!

It was an absolute joy to have our wedding at the oak barn - we had the most perfect day! The team were so responsive and helpful throughout the process - we loved working with Hayley and Chrystelle!

The spaces were all beautiful and a perfect balance of indoor and outdoor in case of rain! We had so many compliments on the venue throughout the day.

We loved how much we were able to personalise the venue - from setting up the wedding breakfast decorations from scratch to bottling up our own homemade cocktails to serve throughout the day. The onsite accommodation was spotless and felt so luxurious. It was fab for all our nearest and dearest to be so close and turned it from a day to a weekend of celebrations! Thank you so much to the oak barn for making it all so special!

We recently had our wedding at The Oak Barn and it was the perfect place. The barn and surroundings are absolutely beautiful, the fact you can spend the whole weekend there really makes the wedding feel special with plenty of time to set up and relax.
The team are amazing, really supportive in the run up and during the weekend and ready to help with whatever might arise!
Thank you for the best weekend ever.

I cannot thank Oak Barn enough - you made everything absolutely PERFECT!!!

Thank you for your constant eye to detail, for keeping us in line and for your creative flare.

You managed expertly to make us all so relaxed on every level. Throughout this entire process you have been so diligent, always going the extra mile and always suggesting the most fun ideas - you really made all my dreams come true.

With our greatest thanks,
Chris and Alice

I honestly cannot stress enough how beautiful this venue is and how amazing the staff are. From the day we went to view the venue (and fell in love the second we drive down the drive) to the moment we left the day after our wedding the staff were always on hand for anything we needed. It‚Äôs great having the cottages on site as well, being able to stay the night before our wedding and the night of made life so much easier for us meaning we could get everything done the day before the wedding and I didn‚Äôt spend the morning stressing if everything was right. This venue is truly stunning and has so many different places for gorgeous photos. Thank you again Tim and Deana for allowing us to get married at your amazing venue. Emma and Elliot

It was great being able to stay from Friday till Sunday which made us all feel way more relaxed than trying to do everything in a day!
The three barns are wonderful each with its own unique charm and thing to offer.
The cottages were beautifully set out and offered us and our wedding party top end accommodation.

From the first visit of the Oak Barn, I knew it was where I wanted to get married and it did not disappoint!
The booking process and the final details meeting run so smoothly, all of the staff are extremely helpful throughout they provide you with so much information to make your organising of the wedding so easy!
We booked Oak Barn for two nights along with Weavers Cottages, it was the best thing we did‚Ä¶ our guests were able to settle in the day before and we had everyone round for drinks and nibbles the night before making our wedding so much fun! The cottages are so comfortable with every detail thought of‚Ä¶ waking up to the sheep in the fields is just perfect!
Chrystelle was the best, she made sure we was happy at all times and made sure everything run so smoothly even appearing during my sons tantrum (toddler) in the middle of the ceremony with cookies to calm him down. After being awake in the middle of the night replanning our ceremony to be outside due to the fact I had both of my brothers giving me away and also how lucky we were with the fantastic weather!
Both members of staff who were there on the evenings to lock up the barns were so helpful and friendly and made it so easy for us!
The Oak Barn really is the most special venue, it is absolutely stunning down to every little touch! The memories we will have from the perfect wedding here will last forever for both us and our guests! Thank you to everyone at Oak Barn for making it so special!

From the moment we drove down the drive for the first time, until approximately six months later when we said I do, we knew this was the venue for us. We were blessed to have unexpectedly beautiful weather for April, the presence of the young lambs adding to the atmosphere and just the perfect day from start to finish.
We hired the venue for the weekend, to enable our wider family and guests to be part of our celebration and it really did take a huge amount of stress out of the actual day. The cottages are welcoming, of a high standard, and provide all that you need, although never did get to experience the copper bath!
The whole team are hugely supportive, encouraging, making you believe that anything is possible. Each wedding feels individual and personal, limited only by your imagination. We would whole heartedly recommend the Oak Barn and its recommended suppliers.

We made the ultimate mistake of visiting this venue first when starting to plan our big day - no where else compared.

The views (& sheep!), the beautiful barn & Byre (a choice of indoor or outdoor ceremonies), well furnished cottages for all to stay & just a the perfect feel for a wedding.

They provided a list of recommended suppliers who have worked (& are trusted) at their venue which gave us a great starting point although they were more than accommodating for anyone new.

Very helpful in the run up in the day with compiling a complete run through of the day - with floor layouts, supplier details (& got in contact with each supplier on our behalf to ensure they were equipped with all the info for the day). Even on the day, Tim was great at resolving any small hiccups that appeared.

Huge thank you to Tim, Deana, Chrystelle, Tembo & all the behind the scenes team for making our day so special.
N/A

We had the most amazing wedding at The Vines! I would 100% recommend this wedding venue. The food, service, running of the day etc was all exceptional. All of our guests commented on how amazing the venue was

We had the most amazing wedding day at The Vines of Rochester. The venue is absolutely beautiful, with so many gorgeous touches throughout.
The staff on the day and the build up were so helpful and accommodating, which meant the day ran so smoothly from start to finish.
We would definitely recommend anyone looking at The Vines as a potential wedding venue - we couldn't have wished for anything more!

Our special day was perfect, and this is credit to the wonderful Vines venue and the amazing team led by Becky and Holly.

The venue is beautiful. So much character and style. We loved getting married in the tippe, very intimate. The dining room did not need a lot of dressing and flowers, some simple styling and the space looked amazing. We loved that there were multiple spaces for our guests to use, the bar area was lively and great for chatting while the dining rooms transformed to a generous dance floor. Then our closest friends and family were able to stay at the venue with us, to enjoy a yummy breakfast the next day.
The location, venue and setting is just perfect.

The whole experience with the Vines team was very professional and well organised. Questions were answered super promptly, with confidence from the super friendly team.
The supper tasting night was great, we were able to sample multiple starters and desserts, although keep an eye out and book early.
The pre wedding appointment went through every detail. There was nothing that they hadn‚Äôt considered and care was taken to tailor to our preferences, nothing was a problem.

On the day Becky and Holly were amazing, so attentive, supportive, brilliant ladies, they absolutely made the day with lots of complements from our guests on the high quality of the team. The food was outstanding, thank you to the culinary team.
The DJ was great, tailored to our music preferences and refused any off piste guest requests! Well looked after by the evening team.

We can‚Äôt thank you all enough for such a wonderful day.

From the initial visit to The Vines, we knew it was the perfect venue for us. The staff team were always on hand to help with any queries or logistical issues we had, answering all of our questions and the online portal was so easy to use. The pricing is clearly laid out and there aren't any hidden or added on costs later on. We mainly dealt with Holly on the lead up to the wedding, and Becky and Will on the day. They were all so helpful and supportive. They took care of a last minute crisis when the lady bringing our dog to be the ring bearer ended up stuck in traffic. Without us even knowing, they sent someone to go and help bring them to the venue on time. Nothing was too much trouble for them. The drinks...good luck deciding what package you want as they are all so delicious. We opted for the festival wedding which was so laid back, but still organised. The food was so good and the evening buffet was lovely. The DJ included liaised with us on the lead up to the wedding and worked with us to put together an idea of what we wanted and what would get people dancing, which worked perfectly. The rooms....there are so many to choose from to be your wedding suite. We opted for a garden room. We gave the others to guests travelling to the wedding and all of the rooms are so beautiful in their own unique way. Becky and Will were on hand all of our wedding day for us and our guests and anything we needed was taken care of without a fuss. The morning after we all had breakfast with our guests that stayed over and that was such a lovely extra touch to add to the wedding. Even the timings that the planners work out mean there are non rushed transitions of moving your items out and the next wedding bringing items in; you barely notice. Being able to store items there a few days before is a huge help! Also in the lead up to the wedding they invited us to a supper evening where we got to enjoy some of the lovely food on offer. In the portal there is also a section for selling and buying wedding items which is very helpful and convenient.
Honestly we couldnt have been happier with our choice of venue and have recommended it to friends that have since gotten engaged. Amazing venue and team x

We instantly fell in love with The Vines, it was the perfect venue for us and we loved having a relaxed festival style wedding meaning we had more time to mingle with our guests. The wedding coordinators were friendly, accommodating and professional. We were in such good hands and were made to feel so special. It really was the best day. Thank you so much, Alex & Tom.

We were lucky enough to have held our wedding day at The Vines on 4th November 2023. From start to finish, the whole process was such a breeze. Their communication was always so speedy and thorough (which is what any bride wants). There were never too many small or big questions I could ask them, as they were always so happy to help. It was honestly such a stress free experience for us and they went above and beyond. I cannot thank them enough for everything. The venue, the rooms, the food, the staff‚Ä¶ all faultless! We chose the ‚Äòfestival‚Äô style wedding to suit us and our guests and we still have guests commenting now on what a fabulous day and experience it was. It was very different from any wedding we had attended, in the best way possible. If my husband would let me do it all again tomorrow, I would!

We had a wonderful day with our friends and family. The venue is beautiful. Such amazing photo opportunities at the venue but also in Rochester with the castle and cathedral. everyone said how lovely it is. All the wedding co-ordinaters were wonderful, any problem or question was always dealt with promptly and professionally. Our venue will always have brilliant memories of our day.

We had our wedding here recently and wow what a venue! It‚Äôs such a pretty venue and so many of our guests commented on how lovely it is. It has amazing locations for photos, in the sunshine and rain! And we had a mixture of both on our day. But the best thing about the Vines has to be the team that work there. They couldn‚Äôt do enough for you. They made everything seem effortless, they were so kind and accommodating and we are so pleased we chose the Vines as our wedding venue. From Becky our duty manager on the day - who was absolutely fabulous and couldn‚Äôt have done more for us - to the bar staff, waiting staff, DJ and just everyone we encountered - they were all fabulous. Thank you so much!

Venue is absolutely stunning.
Staff on the day were good & couldn‚Äôt do more.
Was sold on the basis we‚Äôd have a wedding portal to help us throughout - this is only for a traditional wedding. If having a festival wedding there is nothing.
Personally I felt alone & wasn‚Äôt confident until the meeting 8weeks before to go through plans for the day- I felt if anything was not ok it was late to make amendments.
As a second wedding I knew what I wanted but was chilled, however for some this may not be a good experience.

On the day - we had pre arranged a tab with conditions, thus didn‚Äôt seem to be adhered too. I had several decorations go missing & I got no response.

We received no contact after the wedding to ask for feedback or to ask if everything was ok

Solton Manor had everything that we dreamed of for our special day. The grounds are just beautiful, the Manor House is full of character and charm and the Dutch Barn definitely has the wow factor.
The team at Solton Manor deserve a special mention. From start to finish, Karen, Jackie and the team were professional, friendly, helpful, extremely hard working and nothing was ever too much trouble. They welcomed our sausage dog, Frankie who was a very important part of our day. A big 'woof' of thanks from him!!
Our guests loved staying in the Manor House and the pretty Dovecote Cottage. The facilities allowed us to make breakfast for our guests the day after which was an added bonus! The games room with a table tennis table was a real hit too!
Highly recommend this fantastic venue!

Our wedding was everything we wanted.
Karen and Jackie were there to help and had lots of ideas to make our dream come true.
We stayed in the Manor House and the Bridal Suite is stunning. The boys used the Games Room to get ready and the girls had the whole Dovecote to themselves.
Food was delicious too!
It was wonderful, thank you so much.
Lena and Christian

Solton Manor was the perfect setting for our special day in October 2023.
Karen and Jackie made us feel at ease and were super responsive with all the planning right from our very first contact.
The day itself was everything that we wanted it to be and would absolutely recommend this venue. Thank you, Abi and Josh

From the moment we arrived at Solton Manor, we knew it was the venue for us. We were met at the door of the historic Manor House and had a fabulous time hearing stories about the house, walking around the gorgeous gardens and visiting the wonderful Dutch Barn - we were already wedding planning!
Our Wedding was such a special weekend and we loved every minute of it.
The venue is magical and you have thought of everything to make it perfect.
Your attention to detail was incredible and your help was so supportive every step of the way.
It was as important to you as it was to us that the day was the day of our dreams and we just cannot believe how perfect it was. Thank you so much for everything. Mandy and Kevin
From the booking o the planning to the actual wedding was all so amazing! The team truly went out of their way to make my day the most perfect day ever!
From start to finish, the venue were brilliant. Always prompt to respond, ready with help and ideas, flexible and just perfect on our Special Day. What amazing memories we made that day
Shelley is so kind and helpful! The venue is stunning and I loved every minute of our wedding day there!

We had our wedding in Oct2021 & Solton Manor was the perfect setting for our special day. Shelly handled the whole process from start to finish in such a friendly, helpful & efficient manner. Our wedding was postponed by 1 year due to COVID but Shelly made the whole process stress-free and she was always super responsive. We would thoroughly recommend this wedding venue!

Our wedding experience was absolutely perfect! Everything was so well organised, and the staff went above and beyond to accommodate us. Communication throughout the entire process was excellent, making the day completely stress-free. Highly recommended!

I cannot recommend the Darenth more. The staff were absolutely incredible, we could not have wanted for more on our day. We were never without a drink, and nothing was too much of an ask. The staff were so friendly to our guests, and really created a relaxed environment. Leading up to the ceremony they made us feel so relaxed and they were very informative. Jason, Kerry, Sarah, Louise and everyone at the Darenth, thank you so much for making our day so special!

We found The Darenth when looking for a venue for our twilight wedding. We wanted our wedding to truly reflect us as a couple and where we could be flexible with how the day would go.

When we went to see The Darenth, not only was the venue stunningly beautiful, inside and out, there was a warmth to the place and the team were so friendly and very helpful. From the moment we contacted the team, Lucy was our main contact and couldn‚Äôt help us enough. Despite the number of weddings held here, we felt special throughout as if our special day was the main focus for them all. Lucy was great with all the details, understanding what we wanted and offering help and support without pushing anything.

On the day, Jason was amazing at managing the day - making sure we had time to ourselves but that the day ran exactly as we wanted. He was also very supportive and did a great job putting us at ease when we were nervous leading up to the ceremony. We had an amazing day, everything went exactly as we hoped and better. A massive part of that was down to The Darenth and their incredible team - we couldn‚Äôt recommend highly enough!

From the moment you walk into The Darenth we were made to feel comfortable. We were taken on a tour of the venue and booked there and then In October 2022 for September 2023. The staff were knowledgable and professional which is what made us book this venue.

The venue is amazedly clean and beautiful with views of the golf course. We was lucky even to get married outside and the outside area is amazing but the staff make this place and your day the best it could be.

We dealt with Kerrie and Jason mainly but everyone we had dealings with were great. The food was amazing and everyone commenting on how good the food was. We had 9 children and they even did a 3 course for them with milk or lemonade for the toast which was a lovely little touch and made the children part of the day.

The only thing I would have liked would be to have a dressing room on site for the wedding day rather than travelling from elsewhere but that‚Äôs my personal view.

Thank you to everyone involved in our day ‚ù§Ô∏è

We got married at this beautiful venue 11.08.23 and cannot recommend enough!! Everyone commented saying how perfect the day was, and every detail was covered by the amazing staff!! I couldn‚Äôt recommend this venue enough. From the day we walked into the darenth to view this venue we have always felt so welcomed and wanted. My Wife & I would firstly like to thank Jason for his professionalism, humour, and his skill in dealing with things in real time which put both of us at ease as well as all of our guests.

Another plus was the generous of food which all guests appreciated, from the Canopes, Wedding Breakfast & Evening Buffet.

The only issue we did have is that it was agreed that we would have Jallof Rice with the Curry Goat & Fried Fish, but ending up having Rice & Peas with the Curry Goat.

The Jallof Rice being an African dish & Curry Goat being Carribean would have been excellent as we had them at our planning meeting 5 weeks before the Wedding.

The big disappointment was the performance of the in house DJ (Chelmer Discos).

The fact that we could not select our own DJ made us nervous about the music, hence we kept confirming whether the DJ had experience of performing for a mainly Afro Caribbean crowd.

We were advised that this was not an issue, and it turns out according to DJ that he lacks expertise with Afro Beats, Soco & Reggae.

We also asked for the love sign to be displayed as a backdrop in the Ballroom before the Wedding Ceremony commenced which was agreed upon by Chelmer Discos, however it arrived after 19.00.

When we tried to ascertain why the love sign was not delivered at the time agreed, and also, why the music was not mixed as appose to just playing tracks that we emailed to him.

In response we received a rude & threatening email from the in house DJ - Jimmy.

We both loved having our Wedding at The Darenth and all our guests have all commented on how brilliant it was & they loved Jason.

Regards. Mr & Mrs Hutton-Young

We celebrated our wedding day at the darenth on Thursday 25th may.

We got married on 17 May 2024 and planned a weekend of celebrations with our family and friends, including a 'We tied the knot' cocktail party in the Brasserie on the 18 May 2024. The hotel has a number of quirky and interesting spaces perfect for adding a different feel to parts of your celebration as well as different photo opportunities. It has a trendy and luxurious feel with lots of unique and modern touches. OWP is also a stones throw away from the historic Pantiles which whilst not only beautiful also had a selection of bars, restaurants and boutique shops to entertain our guests during down time. Many of our guests commented it was like being in Europe and again the surrounding areas are perfect for photos.

Not only is the venue beautiful, but the staff and service are absolutely incredible and I do not say this lightly, the service was second to none and everyone was welcoming and friendly creating a true home away from home experience. One of the things that attracted us to OWP was our wedding was treated as an individual celebration something we had not found at other venues which had a fairly set itinerary. The food was amazing with a large choice of options, we opted for a deluxe choice menu and it did not disappoint. It was also great value for money which enabled us to carry out our celebrations over a long weekend whilst also focusing on our entertainment and creating the atmosphere we wanted.

If you want a venue that is modern, trendy, flexible and different from the traditional country house wedding then I highly recommend. We have a weekend of memories at One Warwick Park with our nearest and dearest that we will treasure forever and can't wait to return for our anniversary's.

Thank you to the whole One Warwick Park team! Sarah & Sam

We cannot recommend Chapel House Estate enough. From the very beginning the team here were so helpful and accommodating.

We‚Äôve been to weddings before that have felt a little disorganised and of course, things can happen out of anyone‚Äôs control, however, as soon as booked our wedding here we felt like we were in safe hands. The grounds in the venue are truly stunning too and offered the perfect backdrop for our special day. In summary, you won‚Äôt regret getting married here. The venue is stunning, the team are fantastic and the food is to die for. Thank you so much Chapel House Estate.

We had our wedding here in the court yard this last Sunday and all I can say is wow - they exceeded our expectations and more . From the beautiful venue so well kept , to the staff who went above and beyond so attentive and provided a service more than we could have asked for , so organised and professional , now the food wow the chefs are amazing all of the food from the canap√©s to the main meal were exceptional. Every single one of our guests said the best wedding and venue they have ever attended.
They even accommodated our requests for a tattoo artist , our dog to attend nothing was too much . Thank you so much chapel house for making our day so special xx

My husband and I got married here in August and had the most magical day. All the team, particularly Georgia, Lori, Jade and Sam, were incredible in organising our day and ensuring the day went seamlessly.
Every detail was perfect.

Jack and Izzy xx

Whammy!!!!! If there was a secret way to click a sixth star for all...we would!!!!

From the first visit and being shown round to the morning after our wedding the below rings true
