The Maid‚Äôs Garden fit our dreams of an outdoor ceremony perfectly with its ivy-lined walls, manicured lawns, pond and Italian gazebo. The terrace with its views overlooking the endless grounds was the ideal space for our reception drinks and canap√©s, especially on a blue-skied day in June. The wood-panelled Rose Garden Room made the perfect setting for an intimate wedding breakfast with 80 of our closest friends and family. The room was transformed for the evening reception with fairy lights (put up very kindly, and at short notice, by the venue staff) candles and a DJ, with the neighbouring Chaucer Room serving as our bar and a slightly more relaxed setting for our guests. During the evening we also held a barbecue on the terrace as the sun went down with plenty of food for everyone to enjoy.
It‚Äôs worth adding that with so much accommodation available in the Manor House and Mews, it really had the feel of a destination wedding. Friends and family were able to stay on-site for a long weekend, giving us the chance to celebrate with them the night before and all enjoy the fabulous spa facilities the day after.
We can‚Äôt emphasise enough that all of this was made possible by the outstanding team at Eastwell Manor, who literally could not have done anything more to ensure that we had the best day of our lives. A special mention has to go to Chris - an absolute asset to the Eastwell team, he worked tirelessly to ensure everything went without a hitch on the day, and all while looking cool, calm and collected. Thank you so much for such an amazing day, food was fabulous, over the moon with how things went

Wow!! As soon as I visited The Barn I knew it was the perfect venue for our wedding and I was right! Our day was absolutely perfect and everything went so smoothly thanks to every one at The Barn! Everyone made you feel so comfortable and nothing was ever too much for them! They set up the venue exactly how I had visioned it and all the guests loved the food! Amy & I celebrated our marrage at the barn which couldn't have been better.

I cannot thank everyone at The Barn enough for making our wedding day the best day of our lives. It's hard to put into words how perfect everything was. From start to finish every detail was well thought out, every change of plan and sudden request was catered for and throughout you knew you were in safe hands. The venue is beautiful, staff are incredibly friendly, polite and helpful. Food and drink is amazing. The list goes on and on. All I can say again, is Thank You. Cannot recommend highly enough!

We recently had our wedding at The Barn and from the moment we contacted Philippe we couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better experience. With only 4 months between booking and event it was great that communication and planning with Janet was easy, flexible, timely and supportive ‚Äì from our plans with various music playlists needed on different sound systems to arranging our rehearsal the day before, all the little details were accommodated.

The location of The Barn is really accessible being in the centre of town, with plenty of places for guests to stay nearby, yet it feels very private as it is set away from the main road down a private street with no passing traffic. It is a gorgeous venue, really intimate but with plenty of space for our 70 guests, and the team had done an excellent job of setting up and laying out our table decorations beautifully; it was a wonderful space for us to connect with our guests.

All the staff were professional, friendly and helpful throughout the event; many of our guests commented on how lovely they were, along with how fantastic the venue was.

The food was delicious, guests choose from 4 meals on each course, and every one of them looked amazing, we‚Äôve heard many compliments of every option. Service throughout the meal was excellent, a good level of attentive, efficient and unobtrusive, they served a large room at a good pace.

The whole running of the day was done smoothly, changing areas worked really well, we hardly noticed the hard work going on downstairs while we had our meal.

We can‚Äôt thank the team at The Barn enough for helping us have such a wonderful day and we highly recommend this wonderful venue!

There‚Äôs no words to describe the barn or their team. If you haven‚Äôt already booked a wedding with them, do it, and don‚Äôt think twice!

Philippe and Janet are amazing, from our initial emails and queries, through to the booking and the meeting to discuss our options etc. We were presented with a lovely folder containing all of the information, and some sample menus - given plenty of choices to give to guests (allowed up to 4 of each for adults, and 2 of each for children - loads more flexibility than a lot of other venues)

We dropped off our decorations the day before, and it‚Äôs lovely to see local businesses working together to support each other and the area (they supply discount codes for local hotels), and the Hotel were happy for us to leave a car in the car park overnight before.

When I arrived at the venue, the team had decorated it just how we wanted it, with all of our name places out, activity packs, favours etc.

Nothing was too much trouble, we had vegetarians, coeliacs and allergies - all the food was impeccable. Every single person commented on how great their sea bass was, or how tender (and huge!) the rack of lamb was, it‚Äôs safe to say they catered for everyone (gluten free ice cream, gluten free bread rolls etc). Even catered for a vegetarian child at short notice !

Their house DJ (Luke Swift) did a great job too, keeping the music flowing and people up on their feet - a real crowd pleaser.

The bar staff, were incredible - smiles all round, enjoying the day as much as we were - making it extra special.

The sweet cart, patisserie selection and cheese tower looked great too (even supplied gluten free crackers for that too)!

Philippe, Janet, Andrew, Jack & Toby (and the rest of the back of house team), thank you so much for making our day so memorable, every single one of our guests said how great they day was, and you‚Äôve even secured a few new restaurant customers (from as far as Greenwich) who are coming back as they want to taste the other food options üòÇ!!

We had our wedding here in November & ourselves & all of our guests had the best day. The staff were nothing short of amazing, so attentive & really couldn‚Äôt do enough for you. The food was brilliant, everyone said how they enjoyed every course & the evening buffet too! You got to choose out of a big list per course, so you could give your guests 4 options per course to choose from which is very very rare with wedding breakfasts! It really is such a beautiful & intimate venue with exceptional prices. They decorated it perfectly, exactly how we imagined. We dropped 5+ boxes off the night before & a description of how we‚Äôd like everything & the staff did it perfectly. Not one thing was wrong. We had outside suppliers for a couple of decor/sweet Cart items who failed to turn up, I found out as I was about to walk down the aisle so was upset and stressed. The Barn staff, especially Phillippe, sorted everything and to my surprise in the evening we had a stocked sweet table decorated downstairs for us & our guests, they really do go above & beyond for you. We have no complaints or reservations at all about this venue & would 100% recommend it to everyone. The ceremony room looked so pretty too, with the chairs covered & the pretty twig trees, we didn‚Äôt need any more decor in there than that, the orangery is such a pretty room on its own. As is the rest of the venue with gorgeous wooden beams, it can suit all sorts of wedding themes. Thank you to everyone at The Barn for making our special day, the best day ever!

Patrick and I had our wedding reception at the Barn on the 31st July 2022 and we could not have chosen a more perfect venue for our special day.
On viewing The Barn, we both instantly fell in love with this beautiful venue which is also in such a perfect location in the centre of Tunbridge Wells, so convenient for our guests, many of who would be staying in nearby hotels. Having a smaller wedding, we were also thrilled that we could have the exclusive use of the venue for the whole day which later proved to add to the relaxing atmosphere of the occasion.
Philippe was so friendly and helpful in guiding us with our choices which made everything so much easier and ensured all ran smoothly on the day.
Throughout the process, Janet was amazing too and always answered my questions promptly, nothing was too much trouble.
Like many couples who get married here, we had our photos taken in Calverley park, which is just across the road from the venue, again so convenient as we did not have to leave our guests for too long.
The food was delicious, and we had many compliments, it was also wonderful to be able to offer our guests individual menus from the various choices available, a feature I would not have previously thought was possible. The welcome canapes and the evening buffet were also very well received.
Luke Swift, the resident DJ, was great too and kept the dancers on their feet.
We are so pleased that we chose The Barn for our wedding and can not recommend this venue highly enough. We thoroughly enjoyed the day and all our guests had a fabulous time.
Dear Janet and Philippe, we so appreciate everything you did to make our day so special and one that we will always remember.
Thank you so much,
Christine & Patrick x

The best choice we made was having our wedding at the oak barn frame farm! Not only is the space gorgeous, but it's eco friendly, has lots of different options depending on preference and weather, and they have beautiful cottages for family and close friends to stay close and the option to spend the whole weekend at the farm! It was exactly what we were looking for! And the best part was the support! Chrystelle was amazing!! She helped us through the whole planning process and gave us the invaluable list of suppliers( who were all amazing!). She is such a professional and a wonderful person! She really went above and beyond making sure we had the best day (weekend) of our lives! Couldn't recommend this place more! If you're looking for a country wedding, you've found your place!

We had our wedding in October 2024 at the Oak Barn Frame Farm and we couldn‚Äôt have picked a more perfect venue! From the moment we looked around the barn, we both knew it was the place for us. Having 3 barns meant we were able to keep our 50 guests entertained and still have beautiful spaces. We weren‚Äôt sure what to expect with dry-hire, but the barn is so beautiful it could be kept minimal if you‚Äôre on a budget, but being able to personalise it to how we wanted it made it extra special for us. The open fields, waterfall and sheep meant we got some amazing photos (from our photographer Matt Birchall) as well as the best memories. Chrystelle couldn‚Äôt have been more helpful, from her communication in planning, to the materials provided in the run up to the wedding, and her excellent organisation on the day meaning our wedding ran seamlessly and we didn‚Äôt have to worry about anything. The list of trusted suppliers was great too, and we used quite a few who were also great. The accommodation on site was an added bonus for us and family, and all of our friends and family commented on what a perfect venue we‚Äôd chosen. Being environmentally focused was also a huge bonus for us, as it really aligned with our values. Thank you to all at the Oak Barn for giving us the happiest day!

It was an absolute joy to have our wedding at the oak barn - we had the most perfect day! The team were so responsive and helpful throughout the process - we loved working with Hayley and Chrystelle!

The spaces were all beautiful and a perfect balance of indoor and outdoor in case of rain! We had so many compliments on the venue throughout the day.

We loved how much we were able to personalise the venue - from setting up the wedding breakfast decorations from scratch to bottling up our own homemade cocktails to serve throughout the day. The onsite accommodation was spotless and felt so luxurious. It was fab for all our nearest and dearest to be so close and turned it from a day to a weekend of celebrations! Thank you so much to the oak barn for making it all so special!

We recently had our wedding at The Oak Barn and it was the perfect place. The barn and surroundings are absolutely beautiful, the fact you can spend the whole weekend there really makes the wedding feel special with plenty of time to set up and relax.
The team are amazing, really supportive in the run up and during the weekend and ready to help with whatever might arise!
Thank you for the best weekend ever.

I cannot thank Oak Barn enough - you made everything absolutely PERFECT!!!

Thank you for your constant eye to detail, for keeping us in line and for your creative flare.

You managed expertly to make us all so relaxed on every level. Throughout this entire process you have been so diligent, always going the extra mile and always suggesting the most fun ideas - you really made all my dreams come true.

With our greatest thanks,
Chris and Alice

I honestly cannot stress enough how beautiful this venue is and how amazing the staff are. From the day we went to view the venue (and fell in love the second we drive down the drive) to the moment we left the day after our wedding the staff were always on hand for anything we needed. It‚Äôs great having the cottages on site as well, being able to stay the night before our wedding and the night of made life so much easier for us meaning we could get everything done the day before the wedding and I didn‚Äôt spend the morning stressing if everything was right. This venue is truly stunning and has so many different places for gorgeous photos. Thank you again Tim and Deana for allowing us to get married at your amazing venue. Emma and Elliot

It was great being able to stay from Friday till Sunday which made us all feel way more relaxed than trying to do everything in a day!
The three barns are wonderful each with its own unique charm and thing to offer.
The cottages were beautifully set out and offered us and our wedding party top end accommodation.

From the first visit of the Oak Barn, I knew it was where I wanted to get married and it did not disappoint!
The booking process and the final details meeting run so smoothly, all of the staff are extremely helpful throughout they provide you with so much information to make your organising of the wedding so easy!
We booked Oak Barn for two nights along with Weavers Cottages, it was the best thing we did‚Ä¶ our guests were able to settle in the day before and we had everyone round for drinks and nibbles the night before making our wedding so much fun! The cottages are so comfortable with every detail thought of‚Ä¶ waking up to the sheep in the fields is just perfect!
Chrystelle was the best, she made sure we was happy at all times and made sure everything run so smoothly even appearing during my sons tantrum (toddler) in the middle of the ceremony with cookies to calm him down. After being awake in the middle of the night replanning our ceremony to be outside due to the fact I had both of my brothers giving me away and also how lucky we were with the fantastic weather!
Both members of staff who were there on the evenings to lock up the barns were so helpful and friendly and made it so easy for us!
The Oak Barn really is the most special venue, it is absolutely stunning down to every little touch! The memories we will have from the perfect wedding here will last forever for both us and our guests! Thank you to everyone at Oak Barn for making it so special!

From the moment we drove down the drive for the first time, until approximately six months later when we said I do, we knew this was the venue for us. We were blessed to have unexpectedly beautiful weather for April, the presence of the young lambs adding to the atmosphere and just the perfect day from start to finish.
We hired the venue for the weekend, to enable our wider family and guests to be part of our celebration and it really did take a huge amount of stress out of the actual day. The cottages are welcoming, of a high standard, and provide all that you need, although never did get to experience the copper bath!
The whole team are hugely supportive, encouraging, making you believe that anything is possible. Each wedding feels individual and personal, limited only by your imagination. We would whole heartedly recommend the Oak Barn and its recommended suppliers.

We made the ultimate mistake of visiting this venue first when starting to plan our big day - no where else compared.

The views (& sheep!), the beautiful barn & Byre (a choice of indoor or outdoor ceremonies), well furnished cottages for all to stay & just a the perfect feel for a wedding.

They provided a list of recommended suppliers who have worked (& are trusted) at their venue which gave us a great starting point although they were more than accommodating for anyone new.

Very helpful in the run up in the day with compiling a complete run through of the day - with floor layouts, supplier details (& got in contact with each supplier on our behalf to ensure they were equipped with all the info for the day). Even on the day, Tim was great at resolving any small hiccups that appeared.

Huge thank you to Tim, Deana, Chrystelle, Tembo & all the behind the scenes team for making our day so special.
N/A

We had the most amazing wedding at The Vines! I would 100% recommend this wedding venue. The food, service, running of the day etc was all exceptional. All of our guests commented on how amazing the venue was

We had the most amazing wedding day at The Vines of Rochester. The venue is absolutely beautiful, with so many gorgeous touches throughout.
The staff on the day and the build up were so helpful and accommodating, which meant the day ran so smoothly from start to finish.
We would definitely recommend anyone looking at The Vines as a potential wedding venue - we couldn't have wished for anything more!

Our special day was perfect, and this is credit to the wonderful Vines venue and the amazing team led by Becky and Holly.

The venue is beautiful. So much character and style. We loved getting married in the tippe, very intimate. The dining room did not need a lot of dressing and flowers, some simple styling and the space looked amazing. We loved that there were multiple spaces for our guests to use, the bar area was lively and great for chatting while the dining rooms transformed to a generous dance floor. Then our closest friends and family were able to stay at the venue with us, to enjoy a yummy breakfast the next day.
The location, venue and setting is just perfect.

The whole experience with the Vines team was very professional and well organised. Questions were answered super promptly, with confidence from the super friendly team.
The supper tasting night was great, we were able to sample multiple starters and desserts, although keep an eye out and book early.
The pre wedding appointment went through every detail. There was nothing that they hadn‚Äôt considered and care was taken to tailor to our preferences, nothing was a problem.

On the day Becky and Holly were amazing, so attentive, supportive, brilliant ladies, they absolutely made the day with lots of complements from our guests on the high quality of the team. The food was outstanding, thank you to the culinary team.
The DJ was great, tailored to our music preferences and refused any off piste guest requests! Well looked after by the evening team.

We can‚Äôt thank you all enough for such a wonderful day.

From the initial visit to The Vines, we knew it was the perfect venue for us. The staff team were always on hand to help with any queries or logistical issues we had, answering all of our questions and the online portal was so easy to use. The pricing is clearly laid out and there aren't any hidden or added on costs later on. We mainly dealt with Holly on the lead up to the wedding, and Becky and Will on the day. They were all so helpful and supportive. They took care of a last minute crisis when the lady bringing our dog to be the ring bearer ended up stuck in traffic. Without us even knowing, they sent someone to go and help bring them to the venue on time. Nothing was too much trouble for them. The drinks...good luck deciding what package you want as they are all so delicious. We opted for the festival wedding which was so laid back, but still organised. The food was so good and the evening buffet was lovely. The DJ included liaised with us on the lead up to the wedding and worked with us to put together an idea of what we wanted and what would get people dancing, which worked perfectly. The rooms....there are so many to choose from to be your wedding suite. We opted for a garden room. We gave the others to guests travelling to the wedding and all of the rooms are so beautiful in their own unique way. Becky and Will were on hand all of our wedding day for us and our guests and anything we needed was taken care of without a fuss. The morning after we all had breakfast with our guests that stayed over and that was such a lovely extra touch to add to the wedding. Even the timings that the planners work out mean there are non rushed transitions of moving your items out and the next wedding bringing items in; you barely notice. Being able to store items there a few days before is a huge help! Also in the lead up to the wedding they invited us to a supper evening where we got to enjoy some of the lovely food on offer. In the portal there is also a section for selling and buying wedding items which is very helpful and convenient.
Honestly we couldnt have been happier with our choice of venue and have recommended it to friends that have since gotten engaged. Amazing venue and team x

We instantly fell in love with The Vines, it was the perfect venue for us and we loved having a relaxed festival style wedding meaning we had more time to mingle with our guests. The wedding coordinators were friendly, accommodating and professional. We were in such good hands and were made to feel so special. It really was the best day. Thank you so much, Alex & Tom.

We were lucky enough to have held our wedding day at The Vines on 4th November 2023. From start to finish, the whole process was such a breeze. Their communication was always so speedy and thorough (which is what any bride wants). There were never too many small or big questions I could ask them, as they were always so happy to help. It was honestly such a stress free experience for us and they went above and beyond. I cannot thank them enough for everything. The venue, the rooms, the food, the staff‚Ä¶ all faultless! We chose the ‚Äòfestival‚Äô style wedding to suit us and our guests and we still have guests commenting now on what a fabulous day and experience it was. It was very different from any wedding we had attended, in the best way possible. If my husband would let me do it all again tomorrow, I would!

We had a wonderful day with our friends and family. The venue is beautiful. Such amazing photo opportunities at the venue but also in Rochester with the castle and cathedral. everyone said how lovely it is. All the wedding co-ordinaters were wonderful, any problem or question was always dealt with promptly and professionally. Our venue will always have brilliant memories of our day.

We had our wedding here recently and wow what a venue! It‚Äôs such a pretty venue and so many of our guests commented on how lovely it is. It has amazing locations for photos, in the sunshine and rain! And we had a mixture of both on our day. But the best thing about the Vines has to be the team that work there. They couldn‚Äôt do enough for you. They made everything seem effortless, they were so kind and accommodating and we are so pleased we chose the Vines as our wedding venue. From Becky our duty manager on the day - who was absolutely fabulous and couldn‚Äôt have done more for us - to the bar staff, waiting staff, DJ and just everyone we encountered - they were all fabulous. Thank you so much!

Venue is absolutely stunning.
Staff on the day were good & couldn‚Äôt do more.
Was sold on the basis we‚Äôd have a wedding portal to help us throughout - this is only for a traditional wedding. If having a festival wedding there is nothing.
Personally I felt alone & wasn‚Äôt confident until the meeting 8weeks before to go through plans for the day- I felt if anything was not ok it was late to make amendments.
As a second wedding I knew what I wanted but was chilled, however for some this may not be a good experience.

On the day - we had pre arranged a tab with conditions, thus didn‚Äôt seem to be adhered too. I had several decorations go missing & I got no response.

We received no contact after the wedding to ask for feedback or to ask if everything was ok

Solton Manor had everything that we dreamed of for our special day. The grounds are just beautiful, the Manor House is full of character and charm and the Dutch Barn definitely has the wow factor.
The team at Solton Manor deserve a special mention. From start to finish, Karen, Jackie and the team were professional, friendly, helpful, extremely hard working and nothing was ever too much trouble. They welcomed our sausage dog, Frankie who was a very important part of our day. A big 'woof' of thanks from him!!
Our guests loved staying in the Manor House and the pretty Dovecote Cottage. The facilities allowed us to make breakfast for our guests the day after which was an added bonus! The games room with a table tennis table was a real hit too!
Highly recommend this fantastic venue!

Our wedding was everything we wanted.
Karen and Jackie were there to help and had lots of ideas to make our dream come true.
We stayed in the Manor House and the Bridal Suite is stunning. The boys used the Games Room to get ready and the girls had the whole Dovecote to themselves.
Food was delicious too!
It was wonderful, thank you so much.
Lena and Christian

Solton Manor was the perfect setting for our special day in October 2023.
Karen and Jackie made us feel at ease and were super responsive with all the planning right from our very first contact.
The day itself was everything that we wanted it to be and would absolutely recommend this venue. Thank you, Abi and Josh

From the moment we arrived at Solton Manor, we knew it was the venue for us. We were met at the door of the historic Manor House and had a fabulous time hearing stories about the house, walking around the gorgeous gardens and visiting the wonderful Dutch Barn - we were already wedding planning!
Our Wedding was such a special weekend and we loved every minute of it.
The venue is magical and you have thought of everything to make it perfect.
Your attention to detail was incredible and your help was so supportive every step of the way.
It was as important to you as it was to us that the day was the day of our dreams and we just cannot believe how perfect it was. Thank you so much for everything. Mandy and Kevin
From the booking o the planning to the actual wedding was all so amazing! The team truly went out of their way to make my day the most perfect day ever!
From start to finish, the venue were brilliant. Always prompt to respond, ready with help and ideas, flexible and just perfect on our Special Day. What amazing memories we made that day
Shelley is so kind and helpful! The venue is stunning and I loved every minute of our wedding day there!

We had our wedding in Oct2021 & Solton Manor was the perfect setting for our special day. Shelly handled the whole process from start to finish in such a friendly, helpful & efficient manner. Our wedding was postponed by 1 year due to COVID but Shelly made the whole process stress-free and she was always super responsive. We would thoroughly recommend this wedding venue!

Our wedding experience was absolutely perfect! Everything was so well organised, and the staff went above and beyond to accommodate us. Communication throughout the entire process was excellent, making the day completely stress-free. Highly recommended!

I cannot recommend the Darenth more. The staff were absolutely incredible, we could not have wanted for more on our day. We were never without a drink, and nothing was too much of an ask. The staff were so friendly to our guests, and really created a relaxed environment. Leading up to the ceremony they made us feel so relaxed and they were very informative. Jason, Kerry, Sarah, Louise and everyone at the Darenth, thank you so much for making our day so special!

We found The Darenth when looking for a venue for our twilight wedding. We wanted our wedding to truly reflect us as a couple and where we could be flexible with how the day would go.

When we went to see The Darenth, not only was the venue stunningly beautiful, inside and out, there was a warmth to the place and the team were so friendly and very helpful. From the moment we contacted the team, Lucy was our main contact and couldn‚Äôt help us enough. Despite the number of weddings held here, we felt special throughout as if our special day was the main focus for them all. Lucy was great with all the details, understanding what we wanted and offering help and support without pushing anything.

On the day, Jason was amazing at managing the day - making sure we had time to ourselves but that the day ran exactly as we wanted. He was also very supportive and did a great job putting us at ease when we were nervous leading up to the ceremony. The whole team were thoughtful and looked after us all day, making sure we had food and drink and anything else we needed. All our guests commented on how wonderful the staff were and it allowed us to truly focus on enjoying our day. Leigh and Kerry were also fantastic on the day, couldn‚Äôt be more helpful.

We had an amazing day, everything went exactly as we hoped and better. A massive part of that was down to The Darenth and their incredible team - we couldn‚Äôt recommend highly enough!

From the moment you walk into The Darenth we were made to feel comfortable. We were taken on a tour of the venue and booked there and then In October 2022 for September 2023. The staff were knowledgable and professional which is what made us book this venue.

Communication was always good throughout, we visited several times with different family members and the staff were alway welcoming. As an older couple we wanted that relaxed but professional day and this is what we got.

The venue is amazedly clean and beautiful with views of the golf course. We was lucky even to get married outside and the outside area is amazing but the staff make this place and your day the best it could be.

We dealt with Kerrie and Jason mainly but everyone we had dealings with were great. Jason ran the day and he was brilliant, I love a bit of banter and he was excellent and even made it fun when I was so nervous üòä there was also a lady that run the evening (sorry I can‚Äôt remember her name) she was also really good making sure everything was ok and stayed until the last guest left. One thing they did do was made sure the bride and groom kept topped up with drinks all day and night again a nice touch, I didn‚Äôt visit the bar once üòÄ

The food was amazing and everyone commenting on how good the food was. We had 9 children and they even did a 3 course for them with milk or lemonade for the toast which was a lovely little touch and made the children part of the day.

The only thing I would have liked would be to have a dressing room on site for the wedding day rather than travelling from elsewhere but that‚Äôs my personal view.

Thank you to everyone involved in our day ‚ù§Ô∏è

We got married at this beautiful venue 11.08.23 and cannot recommend enough!! Everyone commented saying how perfect the day was, and every detail was covered by the amazing staff!! Nothing is ever too much to ask - we want to do it all over again!! Massive thanks especially to Jason, Kirsty & Kerry!! My go to people on the day and leading up to the wedding! But every member of staff were just amazing and on the ball with everything. Thank you from a very happy couple ü§ç

I couldn‚Äôt recommend this venue enough. From the day we walked into the darenth to view this venue we have always felt so welcomed and wanted. They couldn‚Äôt do anymore to help us as they went above and beyond. The venue is absolutely stunning from the outside to the inside üíï myself and my husband would like the thank each and everyone of the staff here at the darenth no words can explain how much you made our dream become a reality üíï we shall be booking to come back for our yearly anniversary. Highly recommend this venue*5

My Wife & I would firstly like to thank Jason for his professionalism, humour, and his skill in dealing with things in real time which put both of us at ease as well as all of our guests.

The catering staff on the day were magnificent and very caring towards us all.

Another plus was the generous of food which all guests appreciated, from the Canopes, Wedding Breakfast & Evening Buffet.

The only issue we did have is that it was agreed that we would have Jallof Rice with the Curry Goat & Fried Fish, but ending up having Rice & Peas with the Curry Goat.

The Jallof Rice being an African dish & Curry Goat being Carribean would have been excellent as we had them at our planning meeting 5 weeks before the Wedding.

The big disappointment was the performance of the in house DJ (Chelmer Discos).

The fact that we could not select our own DJ made us nervous about the music, hence we kept confirming whether the DJ had experience of performing for a mainly Afro Caribbean crowd.

We were advised that this was not an issue, and it turns out according to DJ that he lacks expertise with Afro Beats, Soco & Reggae.

We also asked for the love sign to be displayed as a backdrop in the Ballroom before the Wedding Ceremony commenced which was agreed upon by Chelmer Discos, however it arrived after 19.00.

When we tried to ascertain why the love sign was not delivered at the time agreed, and also, why the music was not mixed as appose to just playing tracks that we emailed to him.

In response we received a rude & threatening email from the in house DJ - Jimmy.

We both loved having our Wedding at The Darenth and all our guests have all commented on how brilliant it was & they loved Jason.

Regards. Mr & Mrs Hutton-Young

We celebrated our wedding day at the darenth on Thursday 25th may.
I can not fault our experience at all. From start to finish Jason/Kerry & the team made our day perfect.

Thank you so much! We had such a great day. For us the best day of our lives so far!

I could not fault the hospitality of you and your staff. If something wasn‚Äôt there you guys were straight on it. Nothing was too much to ask. Maty really put our minds at ease. We cannot thank the spa hotel enough, they were so incredible and the whole process made us at ease throughout. Our guests were so impressed at the quality of service, food and drink. We are so happy that we chose to have our wedding day at the Spa Hotel! Right from the beginning, you were so fantastic - fielding questions, keeping us on schedule with jobs and always being a very lovely friendly face to speak to whenever we needed. We so, so appreciate you.

The wedding venue was so beautiful - the photographs have come out so well! The backdrop is absolutely stunning. I‚Äôve just forwarded you our wedding video tease and I‚Äôll send some photos separately. Please feel free to use on any social media.

We got married earlier this summer at The Spa Hotel and it was fabulous. Everybody there is so professional and are experts at what they do. The day went without a hitch and was everything we dreamed of and more. Our guests had a great time and the food was incredible. I can't recommend The Spa Hotel as a wedding venue more!

After months of planning, discussions and decisions we were finally married at The Spa Hotel, Royal Tunbridge Wells on Saturday.

Thank you to Tasha, David, Jake and the whole team for helping us on the way and delivering a perfect day (despite the weather) with superb and attentive service as well as everything we requested meeting and exceeding our expectations.

This venue gives 10/10 for everything. We had looked at four venues before this one. We got married on 17 May 2024 and planned a weekend of celebrations with our family and friends, including a 'We tied the knot' cocktail party in the Brasserie on the 18 May 2024. The hotel has a number of quirky and interesting spaces perfect for adding a different feel to parts of your celebration as well as different photo opportunities. It has a trendy and luxurious feel with lots of unique and modern touches. OWP is also a stones throw away from the historic Pantiles which whilst not only beautiful also had a selection of bars, restaurants and boutique shops to entertain our guests during down time. Many of our guests commented it was like being in Europe and again the surrounding areas are perfect for photos.

Not only is the venue beautiful, but the staff and service are absolutely incredible and I do not say this lightly, the service was second to none and everyone was welcoming and friendly creating a true home away from home experience. Karen our Wedding Co-ordinator was amazing and flexible to our different needs. One of the things that attracted us to OWP was our wedding was treated as an individual celebration something we had not found at other venues which had a fairly set itinerary. The food was amazing with a large choice of options, we opted for a deluxe choice menu and it did not disappoint. It was also great value for money which enabled us to carry out our celebrations over a long weekend whilst also focusing on our entertainment and creating the atmosphere we wanted.

If you want a venue that is modern, trendy, flexible and different from the traditional country house wedding then I highly recommend. We have a weekend of memories at One Warwick Park with our nearest and dearest that we will treasure forever and can't wait to return for our anniversary's.

Thank you to the whole One Warwick Park team! Sarah & Sam

All our bags were moved for us we didn't even need to touch anything which was a really nice touch for us.
