If you're dreaming of a wedding that transports you to a faraway destination without leaving the shores of Kent, look no further than Chapel House Estate. This hidden gem is a testament to luxury, elegance, and the promise of an unforgettable wedding experience.

From the moment I stepped onto the grounds, I was whisked away to a Mediterranean haven. The outdoor waiting reception area exuded charm and sophistication, adorned with lush greenery, fragrant blooms, and tasteful decor. The soft rustling of leaves and the gentle breeze lent an air of serenity, setting the perfect tone for the day.

The outdoor wedding setup was nothing short of magical. With sweeping views that seemed to stretch endlessly, it felt as if I was watching the exchanging vows in a private paradise. The attention to detail in the decorations was impeccable, and the natural beauty of the surroundings only enhanced the atmosphere of romance and celebration.

The resort's reception area was a true showstopper. Elegant and opulent, it provided a stunning backdrop for speeches and the main course. The seamless blend of indoor and outdoor spaces allowed us to enjoy the best of both worlds. The expansive glass windows offered uninterrupted views of the picturesque surroundings, while the tasteful interior design added an element of grandeur to the celebration.

The culinary experience was nothing short of extraordinary. The menu showcased a fusion of flavours that left myself raving for more. From delectable appetisers to the exquisite main courses, every dish was a work of art washed down with the very best drop of Ros√©. The culinary team's attention to detail and dedication to creating a memorable dining experience was evident in every bite.

The staff at Chapel House Estate were outstanding with a special shout out to Katie for really going above and beyond. Their professionalism, warmth, and attentiveness ensured that every aspect of our special day ran seamlessly. They anticipated my needs before I even realised them, and their genuine smiles and willingness to go above and beyond left a lasting impression on myself and it seemed all guests. A huge kudos to Darren & the force on such an incredible team dynamic.

In conclusion, Chapel House Estate is a true gem in Kent, offering a wedding experience that rivals the most exotic destinations abroad. The combination of breathtaking outdoor spaces, luxurious indoor settings, world-class cuisine, and exceptional service creates a truly unforgettable celebration. If you're seeking a wedding venue that transcends the ordinary, Chapel House Estate is the perfect choice. My heart is filled with gratitude for the memories that were created in this enchanting oasis.

This venue is first class. All our guests said it was one of the best wedding venues that they have been to. Our day surpassed all of our expectations. The staff made sure the day was seamless. Food was great, service was amazing and the venue is stunning. Would highly recommend to anyone in a heartbeat. Special thank you to Jade and Georgia for ensuring the day was so special. X

A few weeks ago my partner and I had the complete pleasure of attending our dear friends‚Äô wedding at Chapel House Estate.
Of course it was lovely to attend and be part of their day. We had heard good things about the venue, but we were taken back with its fabulousness.
Close by to our home in Broadstairs, we felt we had arrived at a far away country estate far further away than we have travelled.
This set the perfect stage for the quintessential and stylish day of celebrations, which continued with partying and fun into the late evening.
The day was faultless.

Having worked in the wedding and events sector both in the UK and the Middle East, I have been lucky to have experienced many events, both as guest and a professional.
The wedding at CHE was up there with the best, from the F&B to the furnishings and staff.
In fact so good it even made me consider getting married again!

The team at Port Lympne were absolutely phenomenal. Months of planning and working with us to ensure our big day would go off without any issues, and it led to a really stress-free day for the both of us, allowing us to fully enjoy our wedding day.

There are far too many things to mention, it‚Äôs simply impossible to fully cover the scope of everything they have done for us as part of our wedding.

Guests were raving about pretty much every aspect of the day, and many said it was the best wedding they‚Äôd ever been to and probably will ever go to. Quite a few of the vendors made a point of communicating a similar sentiment to us as well!

Comminication is unparalleled, they will do everything they possible can to accommodate any request you may have, and worked tirelessly to provide us with an amazing experience.

We really did get to have a dream wedding, far beyond anything we could have ever imagined.

An immense thank you to everyone, the staff on-site, logistics team, event coordinators, etc‚Ä¶ everyone came together to put us first and make the day the most amazing day of our lives.

Port Lympne is an incredible venue, such a unique and special location for your special day. We had spent our first weekend away as a couple there so it was great to go back 6 years later to get married.
All of our guests loved the venue and the day, and they still talk about the safari and how incredible it was.
Sadly for us, we were let down by the operations team on the day which caused unnecessary stress. The event team were great in the build up, with a few minor issues due to limited flexibility on their end. We also had about 3 different main points of contact due to staff turnover and therefore the package we agreed to and had changed and led to tense discussions. The issues for us arose on the day where the event team handed over the wedding to the operations team who we hadn't met and it seemed to be the first time they had heard of our wedding. Despite handing them a detailed folder explaining how the tables should be laid out, seating plans and all the other essentials, they made numerous mistakes resulting in the wedding party having to fix many of these just before the bride arrived! A few of our suppliers commented how it felt like the venue mustn't have had many weddings due to some of the issues on the day.

However, despite all of these challenges, everything else was magical. The venue spaces are incredible and the food was exceptional. The safari was a real highlight for us and all the guests.

We couldn‚Äôt have chosen a more magical venue for our wedding than Port Lympne. The setting was absolutely breathtaking‚Äîour guests were in awe of the views and the atmosphere - and that was before the wedding started!

The team at Port Lympne went above and beyond to make sure every detail was perfect, allowing us to enjoy every moment without a worry. The pergola and the orangery looked phenomenal in sun!

provided such a charming space for our reception. The food was exceptional, tailored to our tastes, and so many of our guests commented on how delicious it was.

One of the highlights was incorporating the wildlife reserve into our day. After the meal all of our guests got on trucks for a guided safari, which they absolutely loved‚Äîit added such a unique and memorable touch to the whole experience.

We couldn‚Äôt recommend Port Lympne enough. It was truly the perfect venue, and we‚Äôll cherish the memories of our special day forever.

Port Lympne is an absolutely stunning venue, from the moment you arrive, you can feel how special and beautiful it is. The pergola has been designed so beautifully, with faux flowers intertwined all around it. It doesn't need any further decorating, it is stunning. What is great about this too is that the staff can put up Perspex glass over the windows if the weather isn't ideal, or can leave the windows open for a nice breeze if the day is good. The orangery is breath taking. As a bride, the worry about making either of these areas look pretty was a job already completed. Easily, the best and most beautiful venue.

The Wedding Team are incredible from start to finish. Nothing is too much trouble, they respond quickly to emails. I felt so cared for throughout the entire process, both myself and my husband were impressed by them. It is more expensive than other venues, but they are worth it. I'd hire them again in a heartbeat. We changed things close to the wedding day, the team easily accommodated, we asked for a different area for the reception drinks (we had to pay for this), but again, the team said yes and adjusted the scheduling in a thoughtful manner so we had more time by the southern terrace.

Food is amazing. We had lots of compliments about this. They catered for a number of vegetarian and vegan guests with ease. The evening buffet was so good. Plenty of good high quality food. I really was impressed.

We had the safari between the meal and evening reception - it was the best. Guests loved it, we loved it.

Honestly the best venue and staff. I want to attend a PL wedding as a guest now!!

Looking for a spectacular, unique venue with exceptional customer service? Look no further than Port Lympne! It's hard to find a better wedding venue. From the staff to the views, the facilities to the accommodation, and the food to the animals, everything is outstanding. Every member of staff goes above and beyond to make everyone feel welcome and to provide unforgettable experiences. Words like "unbelievable," "breathtaking," and "stunning" were frequently used by our guests, many of whom claimed it was the best wedding they had ever attended.

Special shout-outs go to‚Ä¶

Ceyda: Thank you for being our incredible wedding coordinator. Your responsiveness to countless emails and your dedication to making our big day exactly what we dreamed of were remarkable. Thank you for altering our function sheet so many times without question and for holding my drinks and fluffing my dress when needed!

Charlotte: Your calming presence and willingness to accommodate every request were invaluable. Thank you for keeping me calm in the morning and for your excellent communication throughout the day, ensuring everything ran seamlessly.

Our glorious toastmasters, Jonathan and Nikki: WOW, what a duo! Thank you for ensuring our day ran smoothly and for guiding our guests flawlessly. We (and our guests) loved both of your outfits, especially the park ranger uniforms.

Harry: Thank you for rescuing me and my bridesmaids when we locked ourselves out of Rhino Lodge.

Wedding breakfast serving staff: Your prompt, well-coordinated, and faultless delivery of our food was exceptional.

The chefs: Thank you for producing a mouthwatering three-course meal that was beautifully presented. Our guests couldn't believe the high standard of food and that all main courses were served hot. Thank you also for accommodating special requests and dietary requirements.

Evening bar staff: Your constant smiles and enthusiasm, especially joining in with the Macarena, added so much fun to our celebration.

Hotel staff: Thank you for assisting our overnight guests with check-in and ensuring their bags were taken to their rooms, allowing them to celebrate without interruption.

Our wedding at Port Lympne was a dream come true, thanks to the incredible team and the breathtaking venue. We highly recommend it to anyone looking for a truly magical wedding experience.

Venue
We opted for Port Lympne to start with as we were swept away with the beauty of the venue. It‚Äôs truly the most beautiful place we visited. The mansion house is a lovely reception area, the pergola and orangery are private so just your guests get to enjoy this section. The pergola is light and beautiful, and perfect backdrop for a ceremony. It‚Äôs really easy to dress up with flowers, as it‚Äôs already so beautiful it doesn‚Äôt take much.
The orangery is amazing, high ceilings, beautiful greenery & rose bushes surround the area. There‚Äôs lovely lawns which you have the option to play garden games on & have photos.
The Moroccan courtyard is perfect for photos, and again doesn‚Äôt need any extra dressing or decoration to make it look beautiful - it‚Äôs simply stunning everywhere!

The Wedding Team
First the venue sweeps you the way, then the staff do! They are extremely helpful, lovely and attentive. I emailed them a couple of times a week leading up to the big day and they replied within a few hours every time.
On the big day they weren‚Äôt overbearing, no request was too much & they were there whenever we needed them.
They do multiple walk throughs with you & introduce you to everyone who is working on your wedding so you know who to ask if there‚Äôs any additional requests.

Food & Drink
On the lead up, you get to try the wedding food. They also offer a choice of two for starters mains and desserts (in contrast to other venues we viewed which only allowed for one choice).
The food was incredible, rich and yummy (not dry at all which you sometimes find with wedding food).
The queue for the bar was quick all night (and we had over 100 guests who are all big drinkers). There was no draught beer which we were worried about, but it was fine on the day as this meant everyone was served quickly.
The wine they pair the food with was gorgeous - and again you get to try all this before the big day.
They were accommodating to vegetarians and multiple allergies. This was all planned before hand & we had no issues with this on our day.

Safari
We opted for safari and it was a really magical and memorable touch. All our guests loved it!
You also get to use the buggies the day after the wedding (up to 10am) which is a lovely way to recover from the wedding and a fun way to start your first day of marriage bliss!

There‚Äôs nothing more we could have asked for! Perfect for 100-150 guests.

Port Lympne was an outstanding venue the whole team amazing from the events team to the ground staff always welcoming and helpful up to the day and then the wedding itself.
Safari it‚Äôs a great added extra guests totally loved. The mansion house was a perfect venue that sold it for us on our first visit. Outstanding accommodation across the site and food across the day was perfect.
Thank you port lympne team.

Our October wedding at Port Lympne was stunning - we had our ceremony in the Pergola followed by a reception in The Orangery, and the day ran smoothly. The staff are friendly and accommodating, the venue itself is beautiful with very little additional decorations needed, the safari was a huge talking point and we've been told repeatedly that the food was the best anyone had at a wedding all year. We'd definitely recommend booking your wedding here, you won't regret it.

Port Lympne as it's no normal wedding venue, it's the Disneyland of Kent wedding venues. We would also like to say a big thank you to Stephanie who worked so hard to make sure the day was perfect. She made our dream weddings come true with Georgina, and Olivia, who handled every aspect of the day so well. All our guests were blown away and had the time of their lives. They keep telling us how perfect the venue was. It really does have it all: 5 star food, the most stunning spaces, water features, coastal views, and breathtaking grounds with animals from across the world (which all our guests got to see as part of our day). If you are looking for a venue that ticks all the boxes Port Lympne and the team can and will make this happen.The team managed everything so professionally, and they made our dream come true! Thank you from the bottom of our hearts.

We were married at Port Lympne on the August bank holiday 2023 and would thoroughly recommend the venue.

The Port Lympne team were incredibly helpful and responsive throughout. No question or detail was too much for Stephanie and Annie, who provided an excellent standard of service; they were straightforward to deal with and any concerns or queries were dealt with swiftly.
The wedding day itself ran smoothly and was truly memorable for both us and our guests. The combination of the pergola and the orangery provide for a stunning venue. There are also so many locations for beautiful photos!

A key reason we chose Port Lympne was the high-quality food we had experienced on previous visits to the garden room. For our wedding breakfast, we selected the sea bass with brown crab gnocchi, which was delicious and enjoyed by all guests. There is also an option to select a second/alternative main for those who preferred a non-fish dish.

In the evening we surprised our guests with the safari; it is a must-do and made the day truly memorable and unique.

We also had over 50 guests staying at the venue overnight and Stephanie and Annie efficiently co-ordinated the transport and accommodation elements.

Overall, we had a fantastic day and would highly recommend Port Lympne to couples seeking a unique and special wedding day.

I am so happy my (now) husband and I decided to have our wedding here! Everything about our big day was nothing short of perfect. From the moment we looked at this venue, I know it was everything we wanted.

Our day of coordinator, Leah, was absolutely lovely. Not only is she attentive, but she is kind, thoughtful, and incredibly detail-oriented, making every part of the process seamless and stress-free. I can‚Äôt be more grateful to have had her by my side.

The venue decorated for the holidays just days before our wedding, providing us with beautiful added decor and magic! My friends and family love the many rooms and areas to explore, including the museum, gardens, bar, terrace, etc.

We opted for afternoon tea for our wedding breakfast and pizza for late night bites and our guests absolutely loved it! They offered options for our friends with gf, veggie, etc dietary requirements, and people raved about their meals! They have options for everyone.

Between the beautiful venue, genuinely lovely staff, and delicious food and drink, I cannot be more grateful to Leah and everyone at Salomons. I got to live out my fairytale dream wedding here, and I am so excited for every couple who chooses to do the same. You will have the best day of your lives.

The venue is absolutely stunning which our guests also commented on, from the impressive driveway entrance to the beautiful decor inside. We had our ceremony in the Gold Room which had so much detail we did not need to decorate too much further. We then moved through to the Drawing Room for our Wedding Breakfast and Evening Reception. This was the perfect size for our wedding and we were able to decorate the whole area (including the bar and lounge area) creating an inviting atmosphere. The staff are absolutely amazing, from the initial enquiry to the planning to the actual day. The Events team were always on hand to answer any questions or emails and the bar staff on the day were so polite and professional. Even after the wedding, the following day, the staff were still happy and helpful. The food is amazing and so tasty, it was served quickly and hot , allergies were very easily accommodated and the prosecco was lovely. There was nothing that was too much trouble and our Wedding Planner Leah could not do enough to make sure everything went well.

Salomons will now hold a special place in our heart forever. Thankyou so much for everything. Erin our coordinator was incredible and I‚Äôm so pleased with her ethics, friendliness and experience. Thankyou!

We had a summer wedding at Salomons and were lucky enough to have an outdoor ceremony and cocktail hour. It was the perfect place to host our guests (we had 140 guests) and there was a lot of space for everyone to explore, sit and walk around.
We had many compliments about the quality of the food. Our suppliers even said it was the best meal they'd had while working! We did the Sharing Roast and having the guests in chef's hat to carve the roast was a very popular part of our day.
I can't compliment the events team at Salomon's enough. In the last month before the wedding, they were so responsive and went above and beyond. We had a few changes in staff on their side and changed our main coordinator but it had 0 impact to the quality of our day.
On the day, our coordinator Willow was exceptional - keeping the show running and making sure that everyone was well looked after.
We were beyond happy with our wedding and Salomon's will always hold a special place in our heart!

What can I say, this is a beautiful venue for start. We had Willow as our coordinator and she was beyond perfect! She made sure everything was on point and was excellent with communication! The staff on the day were so helpful and friendly, everyone was raving about them. It was just amazing! I wish we could do it again! Our wedding was three weeks ago, so we are still on cloud 9. The venue catered for all our guests dietaries & were amazing with accommodation!

Salomons Estate was more than I could have asked for. Erin, our coordinator, was so on top of things throughout the day and so helpful. We had to plan this whole thing from abroad and it was quite stressful but Erin was so calm throughout the process and there were no issues whatsoever. The venue was absolutely beautiful and such a great space for hold events - highly highly recommend! Also, the food was excellent!

I cannot recommend getting married at Salomons Estate enough.

The whole team are amazing to work with and when first visiting I felt so relaxed and at ease in their company - a lot of other venues felt very pushy in comparison looking back.

We absolutely loved that they had so many options in regards to food and drinks packages. We went for their bbq option which was perfect as we didn‚Äôt want a 3 course sit down, we wanted something a bit more relaxed. The food was delicious and everyone said they felt really full compared to some other weddings they‚Äôd been to!

The grounds themselves are stunning. We were so fortunate that we got married on the terrace, but the back up room inside was also beautiful if the weather hadn‚Äôt been on our side! We had our reception in the science theatre that is such a unique room and so beautiful.

Our wedding parties stayed the night before in the gatehouse and the bridal cottage, most of our wedding party also stayed the evening of the wedding in the hotel accommodation. This really extended our wedding celebration and I‚Äôm so grateful we could all stay on site in lovely accommodation.

I could go on and on for hours, but to summarise; the venue is not only stunning but is matched in amazing service.

Salomons was a beautiful location for a wedding! We had a winter wedding and chose it because we liked the indoor setup for our wedding for approximately 100 people, and also wanted on site accommodation. However, the grounds are beautiful and we got lucky with the weather and have had many pretty shots taken outside.

The events team helped us pull together our wedding plan and ensured matters ran smoothly on the day. We had a great time with the tasting in the lead up to our wedding. We also used a number of the recommended suppliers from Salomons and together they put together a truly amazing wedding. Erin helped coordinate our day and also chaueffered us around for our photos as the grounds were a bit wet!

The catering team did a top job on the day. Our guests were raving about how good the food was, and how generous the portions were too! Salomons offered a good selection of wines and their F&B team were flexible to try to source drinks that weren't readily available on the menu. If needed, we were able to supply our own bottles and pay corkage.

My father has some health issues, and the team did everything they could to make his experience on the day as comfortable as possible. I'm really grateful to Salomons for this.

In summary, I'd highly recommend Salomons Estate as a venue for anyone considering a wedding venue in Kent.

We knew instantly when we arrived to view the venue that this was where we wanted to get married. We were made to feel at home, and nothing felt like too much bother. The team were constantly on-hand to answer questions throughout the process, and catered to all of our requests. We had never really thought about an outside wedding, but the South Terrace took our breath away when we saw it in person!
Our wedding day was magical, and ran completely smoothly due to the hard work of the team throughout the day. Our guests commented on the service of the team - there was never a queue at the bar, there was always someone on-hand to help out, and our wedding planner (Fiona) had this magic ability of being everywhere at once! The food was outstanding, and our guests were well-fed and watered during the day. We honestly couldn‚Äôt have asked for more from the team!

We got married at Salomons Estate in June 2023 and it was incredible! We literally have zero negatives to write. Everything from Fiona and her team was brilliant. The care and attention to detail, the day went smoothly and perfect.
All of our guests commented on how delicious the canap√©s and food were.
We will 10000% be returning for our anniversary.
Thank you everyone at Salomons for ensuring we had the most perfect day.

We had our special day here in April 2024 and all we can say is incredible!

The booking process was easy and so personal, the online planning system was so easy to use and the Westenhanger team were always at the end of an email if we needed anything at all - nothing was too much trouble.
The day went perfectly to plan thanks to the wonderful wedding coordinators, the food was amazing, the DJ was brilliant - genuinely there was nothing we would have changed.

We can‚Äôt thank the Westenhanger team enough for everything that they have done in making sure that our wedding day was perfect.

We had an incredible day and are still getting so many compliments from our guests and suppliers on how beautiful the different parts of the castle and its grounds are. It was an unusual wedding (queer Jewish/Christian interfaith), but Jackie, Vicky and co helped to make sure that we had all the things that were important to us, from the vegan food and alcohol-free drinks to the gender neutral toilets to getting the dancing going before the meal had even started. The ceremony room was perfect (and a special thank you to the person who went up on a ladder to put a covering over the boar head that's mounted on the wall!), and we had some amazing photos and videos back from our photographers/videographer highlighting the beauty across the entire venue. We also really appreciate that the company running the venue sent many of the key staff members on trans awareness training so that we could have the most gender-affirming day possible. Thank you Westenhanger team!

This place is a gem and an absolutely stunning setting for special occasions. We had our daughter‚Äôs wedding there in June. The staff were attentive from the moment we first visited to look around, to the time we left having packed up everything the morning after the wedding. The food was delicious and generous portions the drinks were flowing. The castle is authentic and steeped in history which gives it a magical atmosphere.

I can honestly say hand on heart that a typical ‚ÄòWedding‚Äô was not a bit of me. However, there is nothing Typical about Westernhanger.

The magic is created as soon as you walk in and even more so on my day as we had snow!! Transported into a winter wonderland with the most beautiful atmosphere and decorations.

The staff were honestly so incredible and I cannot even begin to thank you for guiding me through my day. You took everything out of my hands and I trusted you all. Your professionalism and expertise ensured that our day ran smoothly. Every single guest commented on how amazing the dinner service was and so professional. Also the food was stunning.

The evening DJ was great and although I took a turn for the worst, due to a sickness bug I couldn‚Äôt help but get up and boogie. The evening guests shared that the buffet was incredible.

On behalf of my Husband and I we would like to thank you all for creating and being a part of the most magical day. And if you‚Äôre anything like me and do not do ‚ÄòTypical‚Äô this is the place for you. Westernhanger will always have a place in our hearts and we‚Äôve made our own history in this incredible historical place.

The team at Westenhanger were so warm and welcoming. We had travelled from up north to come down and looked at multiple venues. The castle was the only venue that we got emotional at. It is gorgeous. We had a huge numbers of friends and family travel down for the day, and many have said it's the best wedding they've ever been to. We did find that perhaps coordination was slightly lax for us, but that could be more of a criticism of ourselves. A really, really lovely team of people. Thank you!

Tania, Jackie and Bex are an absolutely amazing team. We had such a chill wedding day with everything running smoothly. The Castle grounds are beautiful and looked amazing in the October sunshine. The inside of the castle is perfect for the ceremony and the marquee is great for the reception. We really wanted photos in the dovecote and they turned out lovely.

Westenhanger Castle is an absolutely amazing wedding venue! From the moment we set foot on the grounds, we were blown away by its beauty and historical charm. The staff at Westenhanger Castle couldn't have been more helpful throughout the entire wedding planning process. They went above and beyond to ensure that our special day was perfect in every way.

The team at Westenhanger Castle was incredibly accommodating, helping us with every aspect of our wedding, from selecting the ideal ceremony location to assisting with catering and decorating decisions. Their professionalism and dedication to making our day unforgettable were truly remarkable.

Our guests were also captivated by the beauty of the venue and the warmth of the staff. We received numerous compliments about the exceptional service and the incredible ambiance throughout the day.

In conclusion, Westenhanger Castle is not just a wedding venue; it's a fairytale setting where dreams come true. We couldn't have asked for a better place to start our journey together, and we are immensely grateful for the exceptional support we received from the staff. If you're looking for a wedding venue that combines history, beauty, and exceptional service, Westenhanger Castle is the perfect choice

All the staff from start to Finnish and after are amazing. From enquiries to information and service. Spectacular venue. If you‚Äôre looking for honestly care love and so much more. This is the venue. No faults here. Food is wonderful. Would highly recommend!! Zach and jo

From our first meeting, the staff were so welcoming, knowledgeable and responsive to any queries we had throughout the planning process. We had a lot of guests with dietary requirements, so the choice of menus was important to us when choosing a venue. There was a great selection of meals to choice from and the chefs were accommodating where we needed to tweak things!

The venue itself is of course stunning and a real stand out feature is the space for both the bridal party and groomsmen to get ready for the big day! All the staff on the day made sure everything went smoothly and we were able to relax and enjoy the day!

We cannot recommend The Castle at Westenhanger enough. Quite simply the best. A totally professional team who made our day so special. Everyone and everything was perfect and far exceeded our expectations. On top of this, the team really did make us feel more like friends than customers and really did seem as excited as we were about the day. From day one of planning to clearing up our things the day after, we were met with smiles and hugs and made to feel genuinely special. If you want good old fashioned professional service wrapped in the friendliest of company at a venue that looks stunning, then you have found the perfect venue in Westenhanger.

We couldn't be happier with how our wedding turned out. The venue is just stunning - a beautiful castle, lovely grounds, and overlooking the sea. We had a very small wedding of 15 guests, and we were treated like royalty. We had access to the full castle and spent the day wandering between different sections, enjoying every single one. The food (we had a BBQ) was delicious, and the staff were wonderful. It was all coordinated by Joy who was a pleasure to work with. She spent the day seamlessly coordinating everything behind the scenes, whilst looking after and playing with our dog which was such an appreciated touch! We stayed at the cottages on the castle and they were fantastic. Not only big and full of character, but it also made logistics so much easier having our guests at the location. The new castle bistro (the Naughty Dog) also meant everyone had a place to meet, drink and eat inbetween wedding events.

The best thing about the castle is that it caters for all types of weather. So no matter what you get on the day, you'll still have an incredible experience.

Finals things: the photos you'll get will be outstanding. What a backdrop! And the prices are extremely reasonable. We highly highly recommend this venue.

Great venue, beautiful and so many amazing comments from our guests. The different rooms and spaces made it more and gave the variety we wanted

The team also worked very well to be flexible with last minute changes to make it work and I can‚Äôt thank them enough for that

The views are stunning

So we got married in the church (next door) and hired out one of the rooms in the castle for our reception.

I can‚Äôt fault the service. It was spectacular and really made our day special. I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôve ever had service like that where the staff are so professional, personable and just amazing all round. We were aware that we didn‚Äôt hire out the venue or anything like that specifically for our wedding - it was a room in the castle so we didn‚Äôt really expect much. But the staff made us feel like we did. They even roped in some of the gardeners to pull smoke bombs for one of our pictures! The staff made every effort. Laura and Mike were great and went beyond expectations. We just have no complaints at all with anything. It was an amazing day.

The castle itself is picture perfect and for us was the perfect setting. It‚Äôs rich in history and the attention to details is incredible. There‚Äôs multiple rooms of varying sizes. We had a small wedding so hired out one of the smaller rooms but it looks like they can cater to a wedding of any size. We also stayed in one of the cottages within the castle grounds along with the guests which were equally perfect.

Pretty much every wedding I‚Äôve been to the food has been mediocre at best. But the food here was great. Everybody really enjoyed the food. The kitchen obviously know what they‚Äôre doing so kudos to them.

This is honestly the best place to have your wedding. You‚Äôre in very safe hands with the staff here, the castle is gorgeous (and the views!) and the we couldn‚Äôt think of a better place to do it.

Thank you for the special day!

Our wedding day was absolutely faultless from start to finish! The wedding team were so helpful and knowledgable throughout the planning process and our coordinator Dan looked after us for our wedding day - thank you Dan!
Lympne Castle is such a beautiful venue, and we can't wait to visit again once the castle bedrooms are ready!
Love, Sarah & Tom

From start to finish, the staff at Lympne Castle were amazing. Professional, courteous, and incredibly helpful. We planned our own wedding, and although I feared it would become overwhelming, Kate made it so easy for us. The day came off without a hitch and everything was just beautiful, from the venue to the food. I am so grateful to all the wonderful staff, Kate and Mike, Joy, and all the sweet and charming servers. You made our wedding perfect!

Lympne Castle could not have made our wedding day more special, it was a beautiful and intimate occasion from start to finish. We got to decorate the chairs as we liked and having the rooms to get changed in made it very easy in the end. The food was good and the staff very helpful, especially Mike and Laura. Everything was thought about and all ideas welcomed and accommodated where possible. We had the best day and would repeat it in a heartbeat to soak it all up again. The castle was a little bit of history that made the start of our adventure even more magical. Thank you to everyone at Lympne Castle.

Lympne Castle was truly perfect in every way. The Bridal Suite is stunning and was such a great space to enjoy the morning with my bridal party. We were lucky enough to get married on the lawn outside, the view is unbelievable and our guests were wowed! Our wedding breakfast was held in the Great Hall and genuinely felt like something out of a fairytale. The food throughout the day was amazing and the staff were so attentive and accommodating - especially our wedding coordinator Kate (we can‚Äôt thank you enough!!). I‚Äôd recommend Lympne Castle in a heart beat and our guests still talk about how magical the venue was - can we do it again please?! Love, Mr & Mrs J

I could not imagine anywhere else more perfect for a wedding. It was our first and only venue viewing, we fell so in love with it that we booked a date there and then. We loved that our ceremony, reception and accommodation (we used the cottages) were all within the grounds plus the added bonus of the new bridal preparation room. We also had the benefit of Christmas trees and log fires which made our winter wedding particularly festive in the castle setting. The building and views are stunning - our guests were in awe! Aimee, our coordinator was first class in communications, expertise and ensuring the preparations and day ran to schedule. Nothing was too much trouble for her, even helping the grooms party with their buttonholes, a kind and personal touch. The staff were fabulous too and made us all smile with their lovely comments about our celebrations. The brilliant chefs offer an impressive menu, catering for all dietary choices and it is both delicious and beautifully presented. Lympne Castle had everything we could have wished for and more, it is a truly special venue, one of a kind.

Lympne Castle is the most perfect wedding venue. Not only is it absolutely stunning, has roaring fires, beautiful grounds and views but you get the whole venue exclusive which for us was a big bonus!

From the moment we booked it as a venue we were assigned a wedding coordinator - ours was Aimee and she was fantastic! Anything we needed she was super quick to reply and so helpful. We visited the castle lots and went to one of their dinner nights (which I highly recommend.) Our wedding day couldn't have been as smooth as it was if it wasn't for Aimee and her staff they made everything so easy for us and she even held my umbrella and helped me across to the church in the morning.

Everything that the staff do is perfect - the food is superb and the whole venue flows nicely for guests. If you are thinking of getting married here look no further or even for a party - it's a fantastic venue and you won't be disappointed.

well what can I say!! an amazing venue with fantastic staff. From beginning to end we were given so much personal service from everyone at the castle but Aimee was amazing!!! from small little touches around the castle to making me and my now husband feel calm before the big moment...Aimee must have had a Mary Poppins bag as she had everything we needed on hand from sewing kits to mints, scissors and glue and we couldn't have asked for a better day. Thank you for making our day so special ...even to the last touch of a hug goodbye this morning .

Amazing venue for our wedding in the summer. Alicia and Sarah worked really hard to make sure we had the best day possible. Both the indoor and outdoor ceremony areas are beautiful and the main barn is a perfect setting for food and dancing. Couldn‚Äôt recommend highly enough.

Chafford Park is a beautiful hidden gem in the glorious English countryside. From the moment we visited, we felt welcomed and really put at ease by the team and the family. The grounds are stunning, with so many opportunities to explore and capture our favourite moments!
With of having use of the two spacious barns to use we were able to really bring our vision to life, and the day panned out perfectly. The venue hire includes the day before your wedding to set everything up, and we booked to stay in the onsite accommodation in the Long Barn (a must!), which really put my nerves at ease knowing that everything was taken care of before the day.

Sarah and the team were extremely helpful, ensuring we had everything we needed for the day. All of our suppliers went above and beyond, the waiting and bar team were super attentive and great fun!

We had so many of our guests commenting on the venue, the service and the day itself, we just couldn't have asked for more.

We honestly couldn't have imagined our day being any better, we are still on a high from the entire day and cannot recommend this venue highly enough. Thank you so much!!

We knew we wanted to hold our big day at Chafford Park as soon as we first visited the previous spring. We always wanted a venue which was a blank canvas that we could put our own stamp on and it was perfect for this, with the two beautiful barns for us to dress and decorate for the ceremony and wedding breakfast and free reign on our choice of cater, but with a emphasis on trying to keep it local which we liked. The journey for the bridal party from the house to the ceremony barn is beautiful too, passed the pond and through the trees.

As we both work in events we loved having the bell tents as the backdrop for our friends to stay in and having the fire pits and festoon at night time gave the outside area a real festival feel.
It was also a big plus that we could stay on site for two nights - we legally got married on the Friday with a small group of family and friends and then cooked a big meal in the house that night.

Alicia and Sarah were helpful and prompt with any queries in the lead up and we‚Äôre very grateful to Charlotte who made sure everything ran smoothly for us on the day itself too.

We hope to return one day for a glamping weekend and to reminisce.

We recently celebrated our wedding at Chafford Park, and it was an absolute dream!

The team's dedication to making our wedding unforgettable, from the initial planning stages to the last dance, the staff demonstrated a fabulous level of commitment. They took care of every detail, ensuring that our vision came to life seamlessly.

Our guests couldn't stop raving about the stunning venue. The charm of the barns, coupled with the picturesque surroundings, created a warm and romantic atmosphere that perfectly complemented our day. The natural beauty of Chafford Park added an extra layer of magic to our celebration, making the entire weekend feel like a fairytale. Waking up in the long barn was nothing short of glorious. The tranquillity of the setting and the connection with nature created a serene and peaceful atmosphere. It was the perfect way to start our journey as a married couple.

We loved having the use of two barns one for the ceremony and the other for our reception and the transition from one space to another was seamless, and it made the entire event flow effortlessly. We appreciated the thoughtfulness behind this arrangement, allowing us to savour every moment without any stress.

Our experience at Chafford Park was beyond our wildest dreams. If you're looking for a venue that combines natural beauty, thoughtful design, and a dedicated team, Chafford Park is the perfect choice.

Could not recommend Chafford Park more. It is such a beautiful venue and the team are constantly improving and adding extra touches to the venue.

I loved the ability to chose our own caterers - I was able to bring in my African heritage by choosing an African caterer and it really made the day feel unique and special to us.

The sound system is unusual but once you are underneath it, it is great. We worked with a recommend DJ and saxophonist from Mint DJs who were really great and got the party started.

The added touch of having rooms on site for the family really made it easier. We were able to have a lovely family dinner the night before and able to enjoy the farm for the full three days.

Really was our dream day and we are so grateful.

Where to start...what a beautiful wedding venue. So picturesque and relaxed. The grounds feel luxurious and private without losing the homely aspects we wanted for our special day. We knew when we looked at Chafford Park that it was the perfect place for our wedding. Sarah, Alicia and Catherine are an excellent team who have an eye for detail and really made sure we were looked after throughout the lead up and on the day. All questions are answered promptly and with care. The landscaped area around the stunning barns provide a perfect backdrop for photos and the barns made the most intimate space for our ceremony and reception. We are so grateful for the time and care to make our day so special. Highly recommend to go and view Chafford park and find out why it is just so special.

Even though we had torrential rain on the day, Catie and Sarah made the day flow really well. All staff were incredible and so friendly. The grounds are incredible too. We wanted a laid back wedding with a slight rustic vibe and this delivered! Thank you all, I just wish I could do it all again xx

By far the most beautiful wedding location I have been to. The estate owners and staff were so professional and truly went above and beyond to make my sisters wedding the most special day of her life. Thank you Sarah, Alicia and the team! X

Despite the stunning facade of this venue, its owners and managers are incredibly rude, making planning and having a wedding at Chafford Park an uncomfortable experience.

On our first visit before booking, we loved what the venue offered and how beautiful it was. Sarah the owner was pleasant and kind and we consequently booked a week later.
However after booking, there followed 12 months of terrible communication, pulling back on previous promises made and generally being very uncompromising with our plans.
We didn‚Äôt feel Sarah or her daughter Alicia were on our side at any point and felt that they were more concerned about keeping their venue pristine than helping people have a beautiful wedding.

We had such a magical wedding day, despite them. Our guests and vendors contributed to an incredible day and I didn‚Äôt feel stressed at all. But behind the scenes, our catering staff and wedding coordinator were having to deal with so much hostility from the managers. They came in, in the middle of service to tell the staff that the kitchen area was too messy!! So incredibly rude and completely unprofessional. And this was only one incident amongst many that I heard post wedding where they were rude and disrespectful towards vendors and guests alike.

You are also obliged to partner with Wild Box to serve the drinks when you book this venue - they work closely with Chafford Park so essentially are almost as hostile. There are many things that you can‚Äôt do - put up your own decorations, bring your own alcohol or have a campfire past midnight. We luckily found our way around all of this but they made the whole thing so difficult and uncomfortable.

I would encourage anyone to not be lured in by the beautiful surroundings and look elsewhere if you want a more friendly and compromising service.

We had the most amazing wedding at Chafford Park! It really is the most stunning venue, especially in June when everything is in full bloom. We really wanted as many of our friends to be able to stay with us across the whole weekend and this venue offered just that. The Glamping tents were a huge hit with our guests and the long barn where we stayed was beautiful (and perfect for getting all the girls glammed up on the big day!) Being able to access the venue from Friday morning until Sunday midday meant we could fully enjoy time with firends and family who had travelled so far to be with us.

Alicia and Sarah were so helpful, making sure everything was just as we wanted it and that the day ran smoothly. We couldn‚Äôt have pictured a more perfect place for our wedding and can‚Äôt wait to return for some more glamping in the years to come!

Where do we start with this review? Well, if you are looking for a venue that has practically everything this is it. The staff are fantastic, they were brilliant from the day we booked it and even after the event. They were helpful all the way through the journey and on the day the staff we great. Our guests had the most amazing time and all said it was one of the best weddings they had been too. Granted the weather helped, but a mild sunny day in April made it perfect. The food was 10 out of 10, really do recommend the upgrade on the menu choices and wine. The in house DJ was also excellent. In fact everything went to plan, there was nothing negative just the perfect magical day.

We got married at the Ferry House last Saturday and had the most amazing magical day and that was all down to the incredible team at The Ferry House.
Sam & Chloe were our wedding coordinators on the day and they were absolutely faultless, the day ran perfectly and that was all down to them both.
The food was incredible and every one of our guests commented on how amazing the food quality was.
The rooms were super comfortable.
The venue overall was just incredible, we would highly recommend anyone getting married to celebrate here.
Thank you all

This venue is a hidden gem, we didn't know about it until we were looking at Venues and we instantly knew this was the place for us. Relaxed, rustic, caring and everything in one place! The venue itself is so warm and inviting with the log burning fires, rustic bar, barn and amazing surroundings. The team go above and beyond to make your day extra special.
The food selection is amazing, we had the hog roast which everyone commented on!
Thank you to everyone at The Ferry House, our day was amazing!

Our winter wedding at The Ferry House was just perfect, and that is all thanks to the amazing team. The care and attention to detail they had to understanding our vibe and making our vision come to life was just second to none. We have so many amazing memories of the day and also the planning stages. The setting was beautiful, the food and drink were amazing, and the staff were all super friendly.
All of our guests loved everything about the day and are still talking about it now.
Thank you so much for making our wedding dreams come true, core memory made!

Our special day tailored to our exact requirements, staff professional from original viewing to the day, cannot thank them enough, what they always say about a good place is the staff make the venue, and they sure do at the ferry house. Beautiful venue in picturesque surroundings worth every penny

The Ferry house is an absolutely amazing , our wedding day was magical .
Our guests all said what a beautiful venue .
The food is outstanding and all the staff are very helpful. From the first planning meeting up to the day of the wedding .
Nothing was to much trouble if I had a query they was always at the end of email .
Myself and the bridal party stayed at the cottages the night before , this really added to the excitement of our wedding day .
The rooms at the Ferry house are decorated to a high standard and are very comfortable. The food is amazing.
We would highly recommend this venue . Our wedding day was perfect .

I don‚Äôt even know where to start - the Ferry House was the perfect venue for our big day. Nothing was too much trouble and they made the whole planning process so easy. I have worked at weddings myself and know how venues can sometimes be difficult and reluctant to help with certain things but not the Ferry House!
They decorated the venue with my diy decorations without any issues, they answered my constant emails (crazy quickly!) and even put up with me doing everything last minute!
The actual day itself, they were so helpful, excited for us and just made us feel amazing!
The venue is just absolutely gorgeous - nearly every guest came up to us on the day to tell us how amazing it was and they honestly felt it was the best wedding they had been to! All thanks to the Ferry House. If we could do it all again we would both choose the ferry house again in an instant.

We just wanted to say a huge thank you to the whole Ferry House team for all of their hard work, support, kindness and helpfulness in making our day so incredibly perfect. Our guests were so amazed, and keep telling us as much!

It wouldn't have been as wonderful without the team all part of it, and Josh was the best DJ! He played some absolute tunes. Owen took great care of everyone down by the firepit.

Chef and his team put out some absolutely incredible food, everyone has been raving about it since. The food was simply perfect, we're having roast dinner withdrawals at this point....

Katy took care of me and pampered me for six months in the run up to the wedding with the facials, definitely one of the best parts of wedding planning, she got rid of any worries in each session, I will definitely be continuing with those, I miss her already! They should be a must for every bride to be!

Maxine & Georgina, where can we start? They were both the most organised, reassuring, fantastic team, they were truly perfect, being the calming voices of reason, and helping move everything indoors in the morning.

We would write an essay about how amazing each and every one of the Ferry House team are. Every single one of the Ferry House team are truly one in a million, and TFH are very lucky to have them all.

Our son has just been married at The ferry house.
From start to finish the staff and wedding team have been incredible!
The attention to detail, care and kindness of all the staff is the best we have ever received. They were simply amazing.
The venue itself, is totally worth the journey .
It was absolutely stunning and took our breath away when we saw it decorated.
We stayed overnight and the rooms were beautiful, clean and really comfortable.
Our buffet breakfast in the morning was delicious, full of fresh produce.
The food did not disappoint, it was the best wedding breakfast meal we have had.
Congratulations on a top star venue and a brilliant team of staff from the washing up lady to the wedding planners (Maxine was especially brilliant and also our assigned host who never stopped smiling despite our requests for this and that).
Thank you one and all for making Harry & Dan‚Äôs day totally amazing! We couldn‚Äôt have asked for more .

The best team of people you could ask for! Every single person we spoke with was so helpful and lovely to deal with. They made our day so special and run seamlessly! We couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better team!
The food and drink is the best around, locally sourced making it all taste so much better! And the views, away from everything so you can really soak in the day with your loved ones with no distractions!
Couldn‚Äôt ask for more

I fell in love with Hayne House the second we went to our viewing and it only got better from there.
The pre-wedding process with the team at Hayne House was amazing, they were so accommodating and responsive and had answers to all the question that my Type A Bride brain threw at them. Throughout the planning process they were fabulous and it was so nice to find a venue where we could both get ready on site in the morning.
On the day, the Hayne House team (Beth) were absolutely fabulous. Beth kept me calm all morning and made me feel like we were in safe hands. We DIY-ed all our decor and Beth asked my input on the set up before the Groom turned up which really put me at ease. Beth also managed our ceremony music on a phone and it just made me feel so comfortable. Pre-aisle walk, Beth really helped me understand what would happen and really set my nerves at ease. The whole team were incredible and they made our day so so perfect.
We couldn't have asked for more. The venue is stunning and the team are amazing! I would recommend Hayne House to absolutely anyone! We also really loved the sustainability initiative, as we're both conscious of that, and that's what initially made us look at Hayne House. 100000% would recommend!

We were married at Hayne House in August 2024, it was one of only 2 venues we selected to view at relatively short notice (we decided to give ourselves only 6 months planning time and were lucky they had availability for our chosen weekend!) - Sam was the first person we met and so welcoming. She really helped us imagine, in the cold of winter, how our summer wedding could be. We absolutely fell in love with the orangery from seeing the photos, but the reality was even better. Our key criteria was a venue that felt like a summer garden party, and you really got a sense of the lovely grounds by being able to see out to them all around you, even from inside the venue.
Becky gave us some great guidance throughout the planning, and Ella and team made the day run very smoothly.
6 months later, our guests are still talking about the beautiful relaxing day - it was everything we imagined - and better!
Safe for the children to run around already beautiful so don't need to much decoration, staff couldn't of done any more on the day to help.

Hayne House was absolutely perfect.
The wedding Co ordinator Ella was so professional. She kept everyone calm and organised throughout the day. Would highly reccomend Hayne House as a wedding venue everything was fantastic!

Hayne House was just the most perfect setting for our wedding. It‚Äôs private and beautiful surroundings coupled with amazing staff, food and suppliers - we couldn‚Äôt have asked for more or had a better day.

We couldn‚Äôt have asked for a more superb venue and team! They made sure we had everything we needed on the day and we‚Äôre just so kind and helpful leading up to the wedding. They answered all our queries super quickly and the whole day just felt like a breeze!

Hayne House is a beautiful wedding venue with a amazing team of staff! They supported us every step of the way and made sure everything ran smoothly on the day. They go above and beyond to make sure everything is perfect. I would especially recommend Hayne House if you have children as they are free to play the entire day! We had so many comments from guests about how beautiful the venue is and how amazing the staff are.

The team have curated a flawless operation at Hayne House which is so clear. The team ensured the day ran seamlessly and were amazing throughout the day and also during the lead up to our wedding which made it so stress-free and easy for us! There was not one thing that we needed to worry about on the day, the team handled EVERYTHING!! We had the best day and we're so pleased we chose Hayne House for our wedding, it was perfect!

Had our wedding at Hayne House in June 2023- cannot fault a single thing with the team, services or facilities. Am so glad we chose Hayne House and would recommend to anyone wanting to get married stress free with a fantastic team who truly take the pressure off of wedding planning and are extremely flexible with requests and adjustments. Very good value for money and honestly all expectations were exceeded! Everything was well thought of and planned, there were no surprises and communication was excellent from the moment we made initial contact. Was such a special and memorable day due to the efforts and high quality of care and services at Hayne House.

As soon as we saw Hayne House we knew it was the perfect venue. The team are so welcoming and lovely. To the lead up to the big day they helped with everything. On the big day they may us feel at ease. I cannot recommend this venue enough, all of our guests said what a beautiful venue it is. They made our day so special, we enjoyed every little bit of it, thank you to all the team!

My son had his wedding at Bradbourne House, the venue was beautiful, the staff were so helpful from start to finish, food was absolutely amazing, the toastmaster was a credit to the venue making this a day him and his new wife will never forget I would thoroughly recommend Bradbourne House for a wedding venue.

We had our reception here from the moment we arrived we were looked after and our guests were well informed. Hannah was fantastic and made our evening run smoothly and nothing was too much for her, she even helped me with my dress before my first dance and always asked if I was okay. Lauren was our first point of contact and she is lovely as is Rebecca. Thank you all so much. I would definitely recommend Bradbourne house not just for its beauty and privacy but for its team too.

On Saturday 27th October 2018 Julie and I had our renewal of Vows celebration at Bradbourne house, from our initial contact with Lauren at the Wedding Fair to the tasting menu to the day itself was a professional and dedicated service.

Bradbourne House has understood our requirements and ensured that the delivery of these were met without fuss or bother.

The food delivered from the Head Chef from Canapes to Wedding Breakfast to the Hog roast in the evening was first class.

The day itself ran like clockwork and the staff were again professional in their duties to ensure that all our guests were looked after.

It was a 5 star experience and we are already booking for our milestone birthdays in the next year or so.

A special thanks to Lauren and Head Chef who went beyond the call of duty to make it that special.

To all the fabulous staff and Bradbourne House, thank you so very much for your wonderful wedding organisation, wine knowledge, kitchen and food skills and ability to put on a great day as a team. You are all fantastic and a real asset to your employers. We are so very glad that we chose you as our venue. A no hassle and pleasant experience from start to finish. Wonderful! Thank you!

From start to finish, Bradbourne House was wonderful in delivering the most perfect wedding reception for us. The house and gardens are absolutely beautiful and give you a great amount of space. What really made it was the staff. Everyone from the events team who worked with us for months beforehand, to the fantastic team on the day who thought of everything we hadn't and were there whenever we needed them. It meant we were free to enjoy the company of our guests and not worry about a thing. Perfect day and can't recommend it enough for a dream wedding venue.

To all at Bradbourne House.

Just a big thank you for making the Wedding of Paul and David such a memorable day. The venue was delightful and everything you did made it the most wonderful occasion. Everyone said it was the best wedding they had ever attended! The weather, the setting, the staff and the food was absolutely perfect.

So as the mother of Paul i thank you so much for a day to remember, it was absolutely flawless.
Thank you all again.
Just a little note to say a big thank you for making our day run so smoothly. It all went perfectly for us and everybody was so complimentary of Bradbourne House.

To all at Bradbourne... thanks so much for making it a super special day for me and Emma. Your whole team was superb, especially Charlotte, and made the day very easy for us. We had so many nice comments from guests about the venue, the food and the staff. A few pics as requested!

We just wanted to say a massive thank you to all of you and the fantastic team that helped make the day special!
The staff and service were all exceptional and nearly all the guests commented on the high standard of service and professionalism of your team. Food... Amazing!!

Thank you all so much. You took the pressure off before and during the wedding and delivered to us a day that no one will forget for a long time to come.

I attended Bradbourne House on Saturday 18th June for my cousin wedding.

I am unable to eat wheat/gluten so passed this on to the bride and groom beforehand.

I am just getting in touch to say how great your staff were at facilitating my needs! The food was delicious and they made sure it was gluten free for me. In the evening fish and chips and bacon sandwiches were being served. I was unable to have the fish as covered in wheat but a very kind gentleman brought me out two bacon sandwiches in gluten free rolls. This was very much appreciated. I was also advised the chips were gluten free!

Thank you for being so accommodating. It is much appreciated!

We cannot express how grateful and happy we were with Westerham Golf Club. All of the staff were amazing and our event managers made sure we were always kept up to date and incredibly quick to reply (even though we bombarded them with our silly questions!) They made us feel so at ease and took care of all the little details they we didn't even think of! The food was delicious and they ensured that everyone was catered for. If you want a beautiful, seamless wedding experience, Westerham Golf Club is the place to book!

Everything about this venue was just perfect. From our first visit up until our wedding date, the team at Westerham were so helpful and always on hand to answer any questions. On the day, the team had everything under control and the whole day went smoothly - not to mention the incredible views!

We honestly cannot recommend Westerham Golf Club enough as a wedding venue! From the moment we first reached out to inquire, the team made everything so easy and stress-free. The events manager and the coordinating team were absolute professionals, and they went above and beyond to ensure that our big day was flawless.

Everything about the day was incredibly well-organised. From the ceremony to the reception, everything flowed so seamlessly. We didn‚Äôt have to worry about a single thing as the team had every detail covered. It was amazing to be able to relax and enjoy the moment, knowing that the entire team had everything under control.

The venue itself is absolutely stunning, with beautiful views and a warm, welcoming atmosphere. The level of care and attention the staff gave us was exceptional. The events manager was always there to offer support and guidance, and they were just so kind and approachable. The entire team worked in perfect harmony, and their professionalism shone through at every step.

Our guests had an unforgettable time, and I‚Äôm so grateful to the team at Westerham Golf Club for making our wedding day so memorable. If you‚Äôre looking for a wedding venue that offers top-tier service, incredible organisation, and a beautiful setting, Westerham Golf Club is the perfect choice!

We visited many venues before deciding on Westerham. What stood out right away was how lovely and welcoming the staff were on that initial visit, they really made us feel like no question was too silly to ask. And of course the setting - we initially wanted an outdoors wedding but knew that there'd be the risk of bad weather, so it was important any outdoor venue would have a great indoor backup. With Westerham, you can't have an outdoor wedding, but the indoor setting, with wide open windows revealing the beautiful landscaped golf course in all directions, meant it was like an outdoor wedding anyway. And it was just as well because on the actual wedding day, there were quite high winds! The team there were so helpful and patient throughout the whole year of planning, and on the day itself. They really put our minds at ease and were really flexible with some of our requests. The reception rooms are great - the smaller one for the ceremony was just the perfect size for our 100 guests, and the larger room for the wedding breakfast and evening celebration was spacious with room to eat, to dance, and to sit to catch your breath. The golf course is a wonderful setting to go out and get your formal photos and some video shot. It's fun to take some of the golf carts up into the wooded area and a chance to have some private moments with your new spouse. It's such a beautiful setting, we would recommend if you can afford it to include some drone footage, for your wedding video because it allows such a great view of the course, the buildings and water features. The food was excellent, in particular the lamb shank, and such huge portions that we struggled to eat a lot later in the evening at the buffet supper. Well worth paying the small extra supplement to allow 2 menu choices plus a veggie/vegan option. They also managed a few tricky dietary requirements really well including Halal and some fairly unique food allergies. Our formal proceedings were capped off by a fireworks display out on the golf course which made for some amazing pictures and video and if you can afford it, we would recommend it. Many guests said it was their favourite part of the evening and a real surprise. We couldn't be happier with our decision to be married here and it's hard now to imagine us getting married at any of the other venues we looked at. You will have a wonderful day no matter what time of year or whatever your theme.
Amazing staff and amazing place. Loved every minute of my big day. They put in all the effort in to your big day. They made sure the day was perfect

Amazing experience from start to finish!
Fell in love with the venue the day we went and viewed it! It was all we imagined!
Gracie was Amazing the whole way through until the big day for us!
I honestly wish I could relive the day!

The day from start to finish is all we ever dreamed off! And I couldn‚Äôt recommend this venue enough and the team!

When we began our wedding venue search, our main criteria were:

- good proximity to airport for international guests
- ceremony and reception at the same place, without the need to exit / reset
- no preferred supplier limitations
- kitchen on site (no need to hire externally)
- natural materials, like wood and brick, barn aesthetic
- indoor space we'd be happy not to leave in bad weather
- can have live music with no formal noise limiter
- experienced & supportive team
- budget

Westerham Golf Club delivered all of this and so much more. As soon as we visited the venue for the first time and spoke to the team we were confident we found our venue.

We were assigned a contact person straight away who answered all of our questions by email and phone conversations and was always unbelievably helpful and quick to respond.

In the lead up to the day we met our wedding day coordinators who we were reassured were very on the ball. We had a lot of personal details and touches throughout the day and never felt that we had to remind any of the team about them, they all understood the vision and knew all the intricate details of the day. They delivered them all without fault.

The venue on the day looked absolutely stunning. The exposed brick and beams in the Valence Suite make this feel like a cozy but expansive barn conversion, but with the benefit of the adjoining rooms, wrap around balcony and excellent facilities of the golf club. The views are spectacular and the tree-lined drive up to the venue really sets a great tone.

Throughout the day everything ran like clockwork, guests commented that the food was incredible and all of our suppliers worked with ease with the staff and facilities.

The team set up all our personal and homemade things for us and packed them all away again for easy collection the next morning - we are so so grateful for this!

The flow of the space is fantastic, we had our ceremony in the Eleanor Suite, then did confetti outside before re-entering the main space where the drinks reception were laid out and musicians performing. The bar area, sofas, dance floor and balcony were perfect for the canapes and drinks reception. We had photos on the grounds as well as in the lovely rose garden at the front of the venue. The dinner set up was there from the morning and had a real wow factor when guests first saw it. While Eleanor Suite was empty the chairs were quickly cleared and this became a breakout space where we laid out board games and guests could relax if they didn't want to be dancing with the band.

We got married in November and had a lot of evening guests, so having a space with plenty of room, without anyone needing to go outside (in case of cold/rain) was key and the venue was perfect in this regard. In the end we had a lovely clear day and guests really enjoyed being on the balcony.

I hope this review is helpful in helping other couples choose their venue. For us it was a dream come true and we cannot thank the team enough for delivering a perfect day!

The lead up the wedding was great, Ella helped us with any little questions and made sure everything was sorted!

The day before we met the on the day manager Brad who talked us through the whole day and made sure we were happy with everything. Also when we walked in one of our suppliers hadn‚Äôt done what they were meant to - and the venue got on the phone to them right away to come back and sort it meaning the stress was off me!

The day came and it was a blur, but everything went smoothly, my guests couldn‚Äôt stop complimenting the venue and how gorgeous it was. Every detail was perfect and the food was amazing! The wine choices were a big hit and I couldn‚Äôt be more complimentary of the staff.

The only hiccup we had was when asking for a cup of tea for my Nan during the welcome drinks, and my brother was told they can‚Äôt do that by the bar, but my groom went up and it was sorted quickly.

Thanks westerham for a memorable day - that we will cherish always

Westerham is a beautiful venue. The backdrop of the luscious green golf course and the building itself is amazing. The rose garden is the perfect place for a drinks reception - even the drive into the venue is cool!

Now to come onto the staff. Every single one of them couldn‚Äôt do enough for us. The communication at every step was faultless, and they are extremely helpful regardless of who you deal with! Their recommended suppliers are great, and they really make you feel at ease throughout the whole process and on the day.

The food is also VERY good. All of our guests were complimentary of that, as well as the decoration and table layout which is rustic and picturesque.

Having the licensed ceremony room in the same venue was perfect, as your guests can simply walk through the door into the wedding breakfast and evening reception room! The bar is well stocked, the wine selection was well received by our guests too.

We really can‚Äôt recommend Westerham enough. A few of my friends who were there are now considering it for their wedding venue, it‚Äôs that good and I found beat all others on price too!

We made the best decision choosing Westerham Golf Club for our wedding venue. I could not be happier than we chose to have our wedding at The Old Kent Barn. The care and attention to detail the entire team put into everything they do is unmatched. Myself and my husband married at the stunning Old Kent Barn in October and had the best day of our lives. Leez priory was the 1st and only venue we looked around when we started planning our wedding. The Maid‚Äôs Garden fit our dreams of an outdoor ceremony perfectly with its ivy-lined walls, manicured lawns, pond and Italian gazebo. It‚Äôs worth adding that with so much accommodation available in the Manor House and Mews, it really had the feel of a destination wedding. Amy & I celebrated our marrage at the barn which couldn't have been better.

I cannot thank everyone at The Barn enough for making our wedding day the best day of our lives. It's hard to put into words how perfect everything was.
