The venue is beautiful, staff are incredibly friendly, polite and helpful. Food and drink is amazing. The list goes on and on. All I can say again, is Thank You. Cannot recommend highly enough!

We recently had our wedding at The Barn and from the moment we contacted Philippe we couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better experience. With only 4 months between booking and event it was great that communication and planning with Janet was easy, flexible, timely and supportive ‚Äì from our plans with various music playlists needed on different sound systems to arranging our rehearsal the day before, all the little details were accommodated.

The location of The Barn is really accessible being in the centre of town, with plenty of places for guests to stay nearby, yet it feels very private as it is set away from the main road down a private street with no passing traffic. It is a gorgeous venue, really intimate but with plenty of space for our 70 guests, and the team had done an excellent job of setting up and laying out our table decorations beautifully; it was a wonderful space for us to connect with our guests.

All the staff were professional, friendly and helpful throughout the event; many of our guests commented on how lovely they were, along with how fantastic the venue was.

The food was delicious, guests choose from 4 meals on each course, and every one of them looked amazing, we‚Äôve heard many compliments of every option. Service throughout the meal was excellent, a good level of attentive, efficient and unobtrusive, they served a large room at a good pace.

The whole running of the day was done smoothly, changing areas worked really well, we hardly noticed the hard work going on downstairs while we had our meal.

We can‚Äôt thank the team at The Barn enough for helping us have such a wonderful day and we highly recommend this wonderful venue!

There‚Äôs no words to describe the barn or their team. If you haven‚Äôt already booked a wedding with them, do it, and don‚Äôt think twice!

Philippe and Janet are amazing, from our initial emails and queries, through to the booking and the meeting to discuss our options etc. We were presented with a lovely folder containing all of the information, and some sample menus - given plenty of choices to give to guests (allowed up to 4 of each for adults, and 2 of each for children - loads more flexibility than a lot of other venues)

We dropped off our decorations the day before, and it‚Äôs lovely to see local businesses working together to support each other and the area (they supply discount codes for local hotels), and the Hotel were happy for us to leave a car in the car park overnight before.

When I arrived at the venue, the team had decorated it just how we wanted it, with all of our name places out, activity packs, favours etc.

Nothing was too much trouble, we had vegetarians, coeliacs and allergies - all the food was impeccable. Every single person commented on how great their sea bass was, or how tender (and huge!) the rack of lamb was, it‚Äôs safe to say they catered for everyone (gluten free ice cream, gluten free bread rolls etc). Even catered for a vegetarian child at short notice !

Their house DJ (Luke Swift) did a great job too, keeping the music flowing and people up on their feet - a real crowd pleaser.

The bar staff, were incredible - smiles all round, enjoying the day as much as we were - making it extra special.

The sweet cart, patisserie selection and cheese tower looked great too (even supplied gluten free crackers for that too)!

Philippe, Janet, Andrew, Jack & Toby (and the rest of the back of house team), thank you so much for making our day so memorable, every single one of our guests said how great they day was, and you‚Äôve even secured a few new restaurant customers (from as far as Greenwich) who are coming back as they want to taste the other food options üòÇ!!

We had our wedding here in November & ourselves & all of our guests had the best day. The staff were nothing short of amazing, so attentive & really couldn‚Äôt do enough for you. The food was brilliant, everyone said how they enjoyed every course & the evening buffet too! You got to choose out of a big list per course, so you could give your guests 4 options per course to choose from which is very very rare with wedding breakfasts! It really is such a beautiful & intimate venue with exceptional prices. They decorated it perfectly, exactly how we imagined. We dropped 5+ boxes off the night before & a description of how we‚Äôd like everything & the staff did it perfectly. Not one thing was wrong. We had outside suppliers for a couple of decor/sweet Cart items who failed to turn up, I found out as I was about to walk down the aisle so was upset and stressed. The Barn staff, especially Phillippe, sorted everything and to my surprise in the evening we had a stocked sweet table decorated downstairs for us & our guests, they really do go above & beyond for you. We have no complaints or reservations at all about this venue & would 100% recommend it to everyone. The ceremony room looked so pretty too, with the chairs covered & the pretty twig trees, we didn‚Äôt need any more decor in there than that, the orangery is such a pretty room on its own. As is the rest of the venue with gorgeous wooden beams, it can suit all sorts of wedding themes. Thank you to everyone at The Barn for making our special day, the best day ever!

Patrick and I had our wedding reception at the Barn on the 31st July 2022 and we could not have chosen a more perfect venue for our special day.
On viewing The Barn, we both instantly fell in love with this beautiful venue which is also in such a perfect location in the centre of Tunbridge Wells, so convenient for our guests, many of who would be staying in nearby hotels. Having a smaller wedding, we were also thrilled that we could have the exclusive use of the venue for the whole day which later proved to add to the relaxing atmosphere of the occasion.
Philippe was so friendly and helpful in guiding us with our choices which made everything so much easier and ensured all ran smoothly on the day.
Throughout the process, Janet was amazing too and always answered my questions promptly, nothing was too much trouble.
Like many couples who get married here, we had our photos taken in Calverley park, which is just across the road from the venue, again so convenient as we did not have to leave our guests for too long.
The food was delicious, and we had many compliments, it was also wonderful to be able to offer our guests individual menus from the various choices available, a feature I would not have previously thought was possible. The welcome canapes and the evening buffet were also very well received.
Luke Swift, the resident DJ, was great too and kept the dancers on their feet.
We are so pleased that we chose The Barn for our wedding and can not recommend this venue highly enough. We thoroughly enjoyed the day and all our guests had a fabulous time.
Dear Janet and Philippe, we so appreciate everything you did to make our day so special and one that we will always remember.
Thank you so much,
Christine & Patrick x

The best choice we made was having our wedding at the oak barn frame farm! She really went above and beyond making sure we had the best day (weekend) of our lives! Couldn't recommend this place more! If you're looking for a country wedding, you've found your place!

We had our wedding in October 2024 at the Oak Barn Frame Farm and we couldn‚Äôt have picked a more perfect venue! From the moment we looked around the barn, we both knew it was the place for us. Having 3 barns meant we were able to keep our 50 guests entertained and still have beautiful spaces. We weren‚Äôt sure what to expect with dry-hire, but the barn is so beautiful it could be kept minimal if you‚Äôre on a budget, but being able to personalise it to how we wanted it made it extra special for us. The open fields, waterfall and sheep meant we got some amazing photos (from our photographer Matt Birchall) as well as the best memories. Chrystelle couldn‚Äôt have been more helpful, from her communication in planning, to the materials provided in the run up to the wedding, and her excellent organisation on the day meaning our wedding ran seamlessly and we didn‚Äôt have to worry about anything. The list of trusted suppliers was great too, and we used quite a few who were also great. The accommodation on site was an added bonus for us and family, and all of our friends and family commented on what a perfect venue we‚Äôd chosen. Being environmentally focused was also a huge bonus for us, as it really aligned with our values. Thank you to all at the Oak Barn for giving us the happiest day!

It was an absolute joy to have our wedding at the oak barn - we had the most perfect day! The team were so responsive and helpful throughout the process - we loved working with Hayley and Chrystelle!

The spaces were all beautiful and a perfect balance of indoor and outdoor in case of rain! We had so many compliments on the venue throughout the day.

We loved how much we were able to personalise the venue - from setting up the wedding breakfast decorations from scratch to bottling up our own homemade cocktails to serve throughout the day. The onsite accommodation was spotless and felt so luxurious. It was fab for all our nearest and dearest to be so close and turned it from a day to a weekend of celebrations! We recently had our wedding at The Oak Barn and it was the perfect place. The barn and surroundings are absolutely beautiful, the fact you can spend the whole weekend there really makes the wedding feel special with plenty of time to set up and relax.

I honestly cannot stress enough how beautiful this venue is and how amazing the staff are. It‚Äôs great having the cottages on site as well, being able to stay the night before our wedding and the night of made life so much easier for us meaning we could get everything done the day before the wedding and I didn‚Äôt spend the morning stressing if everything was right. From the first visit of the Oak Barn, I knew it was where I wanted to get married and it did not disappoint!

We booked Oak Barn for two nights along with Weavers Cottages, it was the best thing we did‚Ä¶ our guests were able to settle in the day before and we had everyone round for drinks and nibbles the night before making our wedding so much fun! I couldn't recommend this venue highly enough and can't thank everyone at Villiers for the most memorable day!

5 stars is not enough. We got married here on 22nd March 2025 and from the moment we booked the whole team were so responsive and helpful. The whole day went so smoothly thanks to the incredible team. A big thank you to you all for helping set the venue up exactly as we wanted and talking the time to ask questions where needed. The food was delicious and the portions were perfect, we received comments all day long from our guests saying how much they enjoyed all the food and drink on offer. The venue itself is absolutely stunning. Neither ourselves or our guests wanted for anything all day long as the service was outstanding. Truly thank you for helping us have one the best days of our lives.

We got married in Villiers Barn on November 7th 2024.

The minute we viewed the barn back in September 2022, we knew this is the place we were going to say ‚ÄòI do‚Äô.
Juliet, Jonathan and all of the team that work at Villiers are absolutely incredible!
2 years of constant communication, answering any questions we had and just checking in on us, this made our countdown even more exciting!

The BIG day arrived and we couldn‚Äôt have asked for anything more. The day ran smoothly and I would even say perfectly!
Jonathan was incredible, letting us have our time we needed, checking everything was okay and when we wanted to do certain timeline of events if we were busy talking to guests (or even dancing away), there was no pressure.

Not forgetting the Venue & grounds are stunning in itself & with the amazing team you‚Äôd be silly not to book to have your wedding here!

I‚Äôve told everyone it was the best day of our lives and it truly was! Thank you for making our day amazing, I will never forget the dedication of the team for making our day so special and personal to us. ü§ç

Shaun & Ellice
Mr & Mrs Baker

Villiers Barn is an absolutely stunning wedding venue with so much rustic charm! From the moment we booked, the team went above and beyond to make everything perfect, and Juliet in particular was incredible‚Äîso helpful, kind, and attentive throughout the whole process. The food was fantastic, fresh and beautifully presented every detail felt thoughtfully planned. If you're looking for a beautiful, welcoming venue with a brilliant team, Villers Barn is the perfect choice.

Wow where do we even begin?

We got married at Villiers Barn in December & it was truly our dream venue. After visiting a few venues in Essex & Suffolk (which hadn‚Äôt ticked all our boxes), Villiers was the last venue we visited & wow we did save the best until last! The venue itself is gorgeous and suitable for any wedding across the seasons. The venue has a mix of a classic/rustic feel but also really modern and elegant. We fell in love as soon as we saw it. Juliet showed us around initially & we fell in love with her too!! She is so passionate about what she does & cares so much about you, making you feel so welcome! She makes you feel so special and taken care of. We loved that Villiers is also a family run business & knew this was the venue for us.

We really can‚Äôt fault the Villiers Barn Team.‚Ä¶Jonathan was BRILLIANT at providing information and responding to all our questions over the two years we spent planning. His replies were always so quick and this was honestly so reassuring for us, and made us feel like we were in very safe hands. He arranged our taster evening for us (which we highly recommend) where we essentially had a private dinner date at the venue, tasting the food options. He also helped arrange any visits we wanted at the venue in the lead up.

Becky helped us to set up the day before our wedding & also co-ordinated the wedding day for us with Juliet. We can‚Äôt thank Becky enough for all the help, support & love she showed not only us but all our bridal party and guests. She went above and beyond to make sure everything ran seamlessly for us (along with the rest of the Villiers team we had on the day).

The day itself ran so smoothly, with all our guests complimenting us on how beautiful the venue was. Even in the storm, wind & rain, the venue is just beautiful. We also had such delicious food that came out piping hot - all our guests were raving about how good the food was throughout the day.

At the end of the wedding day, we stayed in the honeymoon lodge accommodation which was so convenient & so lovely waking up the next morning with breakfast already prepared for us.

We really had the best day and are so grateful to everyone at Villiers Barn! We can't thank you enough! We really hope we get to visit again as guests for a wedding in the future.

Lots of love from Mr & Mrs Stanway xx

Villiers barn wedding venue will always hold a special place in our hearts after our big day on 25th October 2024

Jonathan was so supportive, helpful and had so much knowledge whenever we needed guidance whilst planning our big day. We also met Jonathan‚Äôs mother, Wife and sister who were equally helpful if needed.

As soon as we see the venue we fell in love and knew we wanted villiers to host our special day. The venue has a really warm feel to it. The grounds and barn are spectacular and the attention to detail was out of this world

We cant thank everyone at villiers enough for helping make such a special memorable day. We loved every second.

From the moment we went and visited the venue, we were in awe of how beautiful it is.

Still, that means very little without a wonderful team, and Villier's Barn delivers in spades. Jonathan, Juliet, Becky, and everyone else we've dealt with were unbelievable.

From Jonathan answering our millions of questions as we approached the big day, to Juliet being so warm and helpful when dropping off our assorted decorations, to Becky literally putting on buttonholes right before the ceremony, we couldn't have asked for a better experience.

Everything ran smoothly, the staff were helpful throughout the day, and nothing was ever too much trouble. My wife and I are genuinely a little sad we can't do it all over again!

Villiers Barn was the first and only venue we viewed. It was absolutely breathtaking from the minute we viewed it. The staff were very warm and welcoming. We then booked it and throughout the whole process nothing was too much trouble for the Villiers Barn Team. They did an amazing job on the day of our wedding and met and went above and beyond our expectations and we are extremely grateful.
The biggest of thank you's to Juliet, Jonathan & Becky.
All our love Richard & Chanel x

Where do I begin? Villiers Barn was the only venue we viewed. To when my Fianc√© proposed and I found the venue through my photographer I knew I‚Äôd found the place I wanted to get married in.

From our viewing with Juliet, we signed on the dotted line there and then. Jonathan was then a constant communication path for my 1000s of questions over the next 3 years. If I could give 1000*s I would, Jonathan was our rock! He would answer every question, provide every detail, no request was to much trouble and I genuinely felt so calm throughout the whole process.

The family team at Villiers care about your wedding day as much as you do, you‚Äôre treated like royalty & your guests will have the most incredible day. Down to the morning of the wedding Becky was just amazing, making sure me and my bridesmaids had everything we needed. To the ceremony and day when Jonathan had everything coordinated. My glass was always topped up, food was served by the masses and was incredible. Our music played through out the day and the little moments we had in our honeymoons lodge for some time to ourselves was so special. Jonathan and his wonderful wife & partner made sure everything was packed for us to ferry away the following morning, they even arranged special gift we received while staying at the lifehouse spa after the wedding.

I want everyone I know to get married at Villiers so they can experience the most incredible day as we did.. and of course catch up with our Villiers family.

Thank you again for absolutely everything, words simply aren‚Äôt enough. All of our love always Samantha & Adam xxxxx

venue_name: The Essex Barn at the White Hart
review_text:
Amy, Vicky and Laura were absolutely amazing throughout the whole process of my wedding, the planning, the lead up and the day itself. Nothing was ever too much trouble and they were always very quick to respond to any queries we had.
The staff at The White Hart are amazing and made me feel very calm and comfortable while getting ready for our big day in the amazing bridal getting ready room, which was one of the highlights of the day as there is so much space for everyone with make-up artists and hair stylists etc meaning there was zero stress.
The food was great all round, we had a meal the night before, the wedding breakfast and breakfast the day after were all just amazing, cannot fault anything with it.
Honestly the best day of our lives, so glad we choose this venue to get married, we would highly recommend to all!!

venue_name: The Essex Barn at the White Hart
review_text:
From the moment we booked our wedding at The White Hart, Laura was nothing short of exceptional. She not only helped us arrange every detail but also provided us with fantastic recommendations for photographers, entertainment, transport options, and venue decorators. Her communication was always swift and thorough, and she answered every question we had, making the entire process seamless from start to finish.

On the wedding day, our heartfelt thanks go to the wedding coordinators, Vicky and Amy who ensured everything ran smoothly and took the time to review every minute final detail with us a week before the big day. They managed every aspect of the day from start to finish, making sure everything was perfect. They both, along with their staff assisted guests with check-ins and helped (early - considering a late finish) with breakfast the following morning‚Äîgoing above and beyond in every way.

Thank you also to Luke and Bradley, for their incredible support. Luke, in particular, made my wife feel like the most important person on the planet. His care and attention was extraordinary, making my wife feel like she was the only bride to have ever gotten married at The White Hart. For also, calming me on my walk up to the venue, thank you. The personal touch he added to the day for us both made it truly unforgettable.

I‚Äôd also like to offer a special thank you to Vicky, who provided me with much-needed emotional support on the morning of the wedding. She was there to reassure me, address my concerns, and help calm my nerves‚Äîexactly what I needed before greeting guests, sat anxiously waiting for my arrival followed by my Niamh's arrival.

As someone who was feeling a little anxious leading up to the day, I couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better team of professionals. With them running everything, we were in great hands. Our wedding day ran exactly how we envisioned it, and it was nothing short of perfect! From the management to the chefs and waitstaff, every detail was thoughtfully taken care of, and it was the most magical day of our lives.

A huge thank you to the entire team for making our day not only flawless but incredibly special. We truly couldn‚Äôt have asked for more & we will regularly visit for a the extraordinary food and drink on offer.

All our love & support,

Ryan & Niamh X

venue_name: The Essex Barn at the White Hart
review_text: We had our twighlight wedding on 19 October 24 and everything about it was perfect and magical. The staff were fantastic in terms of planning and on the day, nothing was too much trouble, particular mention for Laura, Vicki and Amy üòä

venue_name: The Essex Barn at the White Hart
review_text: We just had our wedding day at The White Hart and all I can say is EXCEPTIONAL! from the day we booked Laura was always on hand to help us and answer any questions we had about our day or the venue. So attentive she even worked late to help us secure a new DJ after issues with our original one. She went above and beyond through the whole planning process. She is a calming influence and incredibly organised and professional which is just what you need when planning a wedding. OUTSTANDING SERVICE! Additionally the front of house staff on the day were all incredible and made everything run seamlessly throughout the day and late into the night. Vicky and Amy, you two were amazing! We can‚Äôt thank you enough for making it even more perfect than either of us could have imagined. You are all superhero‚Äôs and I‚Äôm so impressed that even the tiniest of details and planning were followed exactly as I had asked. I can‚Äôt thank you all enough. If you are planning to get married and want the confidence of knowing your venue and it‚Äôs staff have your back and will make your day exactly how you picture it then look no further than The White Hart! Best venue ever! ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

venue_name: The Essex Barn at the White Hart
review_text:
Got Married in July 2024, from start to finish Laura our wedding day coordinator was amazing with fantastic attention to detail, our day went so smoothly with Amy and Viki as our wedding day managers, all of our guest raved about all three courses.
The grounds were absolutely stunning for our photos along with there five star accommodation,

Well done white hart team for making our day so special , we can‚Äôt wait to celebrate our anniversary with you!
‚≠êÔ∏è ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

venue_name: The Essex Barn at the White Hart
review_text: Our wedding was brought together with the expertise of Abbi, Laura & the whole white Hart team. The day ran so smoothly and everything was on point like clockwork! They helped answering any questions we had and went the extra mile when needed. If we could we would get married here all over again-fab venue and value for money!

venue_name: The Essex Barn at the White Hart
review_text:
The Barn at the White Hart is amazing, a beautiful setting and welcoming environment. The process was easy and they were patient with me and my many questions. The meetings were eye opening for details we had never even thought about, but so worth it!

The wedding itself was more than we could have ever dreamed of, everything ran so smoothly! This meant that we could enjoy ourselves and not worry about anything, the team had everything we needed and were so accommodating.

Everyone commented on how much they enjoyed themselves and all were amazed by the food, it was as good as it always is.

We cannot thank everyone at the White Hart enough!

venue_name: The Essex Barn at the White Hart
review_text:
There wasn't a moment during our planning with the White Hart, or the day itself where we didn't feel cared for. Originally, we chose to view it as thank to its website we knew it welcomed LGBT couples. From our first meeting. we were made welcome and everything was done to make sure neither one of us were sacrificing just because there were two brides!
The barn was perfect and the suggested DJ is phenomenal and great at reading a room. Even though it rained, there was no impact on the day. The staff were flexible, attentive and (most importantly as two ex-service workers!) everyone seemed to really like being there. We had complex dietary requirements with some guests and these were addressed brilliantly, with these guests getting personalised menus. There were also perfect vegetarian and vegan options. The guests in question went out of their way to thank us for their lovely menu, and none of them were treated any differently.

The biggest thank you to Laura and Abby for planning and managing the day. You were fantastic. An extra shout out to Josephine, who was a delight the whole time we were there and was the friendliest face as I walked over to meet the registrars.

venue_name: The Essex Barn at the White Hart
review_text: Lovely place, just perfect with lovely Barn an pub on the side, accommodation on site was just superb. Laura and Abi made all planing so easy and helped us to have perfect day

venue_name: The Essex Barn at the White Hart
review_text:
I could not recommend the White Hart more as a venue.
Laura and her team were professional and attentive throughout the entire wedding planning process, and will be as involved as you want or need them to be. Nothing is too much trouble for them.

The venue itself is beautiful, in a peaceful country setting, we loved it from our first visit. The mezzanine floor was something I'd never seen before at a venue, and I really felt it added something different and alternative to the venue, plus meant that if the weather took a turn for the worse, (which we were lucky to avoid on our day!) you or your guests won't get wet moving from ceremony to reception!

The bridal preparation suite is also beautiful and spacious enough for all you need in the morning, plus a view out over the front of the Inn where you can see your guests arriving!

Our guests have all commented on how lovely the venue is, as well as the gorgeous accommodation and amazing food. We are looking forward to returning for dinner or even to stay in one of the beautiful rooms.

We highly recommend the White Hart, the service is second to none, and the Wedding package prices are really competitive, we didn't have a huge budget but still managed to afford all we needed and wanted.

We had a really beautiful wedding day at The Lawn. The experienced team were very helpful with the planning and professional throughout, taking any potential stress out of the day so that we could relax and fully enjoy our special day. Everything went as planned, including the weather allowing us to get married outside in the very pretty gazebo (there was a great back-up plan in case of rain so we didn't have to worry!). Our 60 day guests enjoyed a three course meal which was of great quality; we had many compliments about the food and service, including the evening buffet for 110 guests. The Lawn is a fantastic setting for a wedding, coupled with great service, that we would thoroughly recommend.

I cannot express the gratitude I have for The Lawn. We had our day on the 25th May 2024 and from start to finish the staff were amazing.

The food was stunning! The venue itself is absolutely breathtaking. Thank you so much for making our day what it was‚Ä¶ perfect. I could not recommend this venue enough.

Where to start? From beginning to end, The Lawn were the perfect venue choice! Not just because of the stunning house and gardens, but because David and the team made every step as stress-free and enjoyable as possible (even with all the questions we kept pinging them). We knew before we visited that The Lawn was the venue for us, to the point we booked then and there! We had absolutely no worries leading up to the day about how things were going to run and throughout the day there was always someone on hand (and with a smile). Honestly, words cannot express how wonderful our day was - utterly perfect! Thank you for everything!

We were married in September 2023 and had our reception at the lawn. As it was an African-British wedding, we had many requests which the team at the Lawn really helped with. As we had exclusive use, the bridal party could get dressed at the Lawn before heading to Church and the parking was great for our guests travelling from long distances. Guests loved the horses and grounds. They particularly commented on being well catered for. It was a perfect day!

The team at The Lawn helped us to host the perfect wedding. The amount of effort, thought and care that went into supporting us and everything we needed to make the day a success is amazing, this is possibly the first family event we‚Äôve hosted where we have not felt the need to stress over a severe anaphylactic reaction.

From the minute we met we both felt at ease and confident our day would run smoothly, no question or request was too large.
They went above and beyond for us and it was truly appreciated, everyone has commented on the beauty of the venue as well as how smoothly and effortless the day ran.

We would honestly recommend the lawn for anyone looking for a venue to host a celebration - the venue is beautiful and the staff are absolutely amazing.

The best day ever!!! Couldn‚Äôt of been any better thank you so much!! All the staff were fab and so so helpful nothing was ever to much hassle. Felt like one big family will be forever grateful!! Love chelsea and sam xx

Where do I start, we cannot thank you enough for hosting our wedding on Saturday. Your staff were fantastic and the whole day could not have gone any better.
I always knew I wanted to get married at the lawn as my own parents married here 24 years ago, I was 12 years old. 4 years later Matt and I got together and finally after 20 years we had our own special day at the lawn.

Everything from the planning beforehand, adapting the menus so everyone could eat the same including anyone with dietary requirements to how everything kept to schedule.
I was an emotional wreck most of the morning getting ready but you made sure I did not have to worry about anything downstairs and when I finally got to see everything I was blown away.

A special thank you to David, Michael and Lizzie. You are brilliant at what you do.

The caterers and waiting staff were amazing. The food came out all at the same time, was hot and extremely tasty. The staff serving were so kind and accommodating.

This day was long overdue but we were lucky our children got to share it with us like I got to with my parents and you all made it the best day which we will never ever forget. My parents said the high standards you set on Saturday was exactly the same when they got married and it really is the best place to get married so anyone looking for a place to have their wedding and reception book in quick you will not be disappointed.

Thank you again
Jade and Matthew.
Finally Mr & Mrs Judge xxx
Wow! What can we say? A perfect day was had at the Lawn, with superb organisation, friendly staff and a beutiful building!

We would just like to say a massive thank you for making our twilight
wedding such a magical experience for both of us.

From your patience in answering all our questions leading up to the day to
your almost fanatical weather watching all afternoon (who knew there were so
many apps?! ) and then your ability to switch everything to outside at the
eleventh hour to ensure we could have the service in your beautiful gazebo
just made the perfect start to an amazing evening and the start of our
married life.

Thank you again so much and we send our warmest wishes to you all

The whole team did everything to make our day so special. Unfortunately the English weather didn't play ball with us, but it didn't affect the day at all. Everyone was so helpful and the day ran so smoothly. We just wish we could do it all again! Would recommend as a wedding venue!

I never imagined my wedding would be somewhere as stunning as Gosfield hall but from the minute we saw this venue we knew it was the one for us and didn't bother viewing anymore venues as we had already made our minds up about having our wedding here! We were absolutely blown away with the natural beauty of Gosfield hall and so booked two years in advance of our wedding day! The professionalism and advice we received from Linda was super helpful and informative on the run up to our wedding as there is soo much to think about! We loved that we could have our day and evening all in one place aswell as the option weather permitting to have our wedding ceremony outside. I'm pleased to say the weather was absolutely perfect on our wedding day and we got to have our fairytale wedding outside! The package we paid for was well worth the money! Our guests were absolutely spoilt on our day and have all said it was the best wedding they've ever been too! It was amazing to have our guests stay over aswell! Jocie our wedding planner was absolutely amazing! She was sooo friendly and super accommodating and went above and beyond on our day to make it absolutely perfect with no hiccups! She even helped dress me on the day as she knew how to do up a corset dress and my mother didn't have a clue lol she made all my wedding details and decorations come to life and done such a stunning job decorating our dream venue aswell as being super supportive towards me my family and guests! The honeymoon suite is the best we've ever seen and completely took ours and our guests breaths away! Mind blowing! The food,venue,grounds,accomodation and night before accomodation were absolutely stunning and we want to thank everyone at Gosfield hall for making our day soo incredible and special and a day we and our guests will never forget! We can't wait to return to Gosfield! Thank you everyone at Gosfield what an amazing place!

We had previously experienced Gosfield Hall as a guest before deciding on it for our anniversary.

Our day was beautiful and went according to plan. Our guests all had great feedback about the day.

The only thing we would have changed would have been more diverse menu for the main meals.

Gosfield hall is a beautiful location for a wedding and their packages cover all the important stuff! We didn‚Äôt have to worry about caterers, wedding coordinator or a DJ - all included! Great service, lovely food and everyone really enjoyed the day! Our coordinator Jocie was fab on the day, getting everything organised and fetching anything we needed. Couldn‚Äôt have asked for better, she knew the time line and the day flowed really smoothly!

We got married at Gosfield Hall and everything about it was perfect from when we arrive to view it, booking, the communication and Faye Carter our wedding Coordinator! If you want the best wedding day with no hassle, Gosfield is your place!!

Myself and my Wife have just got married at Gosfield Hall,
Our expensive started when we viewed the venue and we first met Linda sales manager, she welcome us in & made us feel at home, we wasn‚Äôt sure how, but she made us feel calm like this was where we was meant to be.
Once we looked around at all the venue has to offer we had already made a decision as this is such a stunning location and instantly new this was what we wanted! It was just right for us.

We did not get made to feel pressured to make any decisions immediately however we did end up booking our big say within the next few days after our visit.

Our next contact was with Ellie our wedding planner, she was very helpful and nothing was ever to much, we enjoyed the food tasting at the venue and was very impressed with the experience, it was out of this world.
Ellie helped us through all of our problems and made sure all of our plans come to life.

Now on our big day, what can I say? The staff were amazing, Ellie couldn‚Äôt have done enough every time you wanted to ask a question she was next to us any time we needed something. She was there all the way through the day/ night & even the next morning, Ellie made our day Run seamlessly.
We‚Äôve been to many weddings before but never have we had food as amazing as we did here.
Every guest was amazed at the food quality and commented on how delicious it was!
Just to sum up if you‚Äôre thinking about booking your wedding at Gosfield Hall don‚Äôt question it just book it. You will be amazed.

The venue is stunning and was the perfect setting for our winter wedding (so much natural light even in January). Jocie Golbourn was our assigned wedding planning specialist and she is so kind, sweet, patient and professional. All our guests loved the venue but many actually commented on how flawless and seamless the day was organised and rooms decorated and prepared from each section of the wedding and we only have Jocie and venue staff to thank for their meticulous planning and preparations. The food and drinks were delicious. Couldn‚Äôt recommend this venue enough- we actually booked the venue on a whim and were SO happy when we visited for an open day. There‚Äôs no false advertisements- it‚Äôs stunning.

Everything, from start to finish, was exactly what we wanted and more. The preparation was helped by our wonderful personal manager, Tara, and accommodated each and every one of our requests and needs. The venue is gorgeous, food delicious, and atmosphere felt special. Our friends and family all told us that this was such a spectacular wedding for them that it was the best they've ever been to. We felt completely taken care of, kept us calm and happy throughout the day, and kept all of our suppliers in place and to standard. It felt glamourous and unique. We wish we could relive the day over and over. It really was our dream wedding.

We got married in Gosfield Hall in May and had the most amazing wedding day that any couple could ask for. The whole experience from the arrival the night before to leaving the day after was seamlessly managed by the team at the venue.
The house and the grounds looked absolutely stunning and Ellie and the team did a brilliant job at keeping the day running smoothly without making anyone feel rushed. Everyone there was immensely friendly and helpful and we really felt that everyone who worked there was invested in making our day feel special.
We fell in love with the venue when we booked it but the whole experience exceeded out expectations so much that we wish we could do it all again!

I wanted to take a moment to commend and state our appreciation for Jocie. She truly was phenomenal, approachable and no task was too big.
We had 5 months to plan our wedding and we loved every moment. With us both working in the service industry it was great to have someone who was so switched on and would be an asset to have on any team.

Having just got married at Gosfield Hall I can honestly say it was the most beautiful venue and the most perfect day. The staff were so attentive and professional. The food was outstanding and the drinks and cocktails were fabulous. They couldn‚Äôt do enough to make sure our day was everything we‚Äôd dreamt of. I have to say a special thanks to Ellie - one of the wedding coordinators on site - she went above and beyond to help us plan our day and was there from the very moment I woke up delivering fresh pastries for breakfast to the moment she made me a cup of tea to go to bed with. I can‚Äôt thank you enough Ellie, you are an absolute credit to Gosfield Hall.
N/A

I never in my life thought I would get married in a place like Leez priory! The whole experience from start to finish was just fantastic. The price breakdown was manageable and there was no pressure to take any upgrades offered. The things we got in our package were phenomenal and having a wedding planner was tremendous - our lady (Leanne) was an absolute god send!
They catered to all our needs and we were made to feel so comfortable and nothing was a problem! I‚Äôd highly suggest going to an event there before hand, just to get a feel of what it‚Äôs like full of people and enjoy their delicious food. We actually enjoyed their entertainer ( singer) so much we hired him for our wedding ‚ò∫Ô∏è
Lee priory is just so beautiful. I can‚Äôt speak highly enough x

We got married at Leez Priory on the 7th of September 2024. Considering how long they have been a wedding venue, they were pretty flexible with some of the ideas we had for the venue styling that turned out amazingly!

The staff really made the day something special and couldn't have done enough for us. Special mention must be made for Leanne, our wedding planner, who was amazing!

Highly recommend the venue and the incredible team that helped to make our day so special!

We got married at Leez Priory in October 2024. This venue is stunning both inside and out with immaculately kept grounds and interior. The hospitality in the lead up to and on the day of the wedding was fantastic. The food was also brilliant. Another great perk of this venue is the amount of on site accommodation.

A couple of drawbacks / experiences during our wedding. There are only a few toilets in the main building which kept blocking and overflowing throughout the evening which led to us taking some guests to the dressing room or honeymoon cottage to use the facilities. You are also restricted by the venue on any external food or drink suppliers and the venues optional extras for this are quite expensive for what they are.

That asaide, we had the best day and evening at Leez Priory and would certainly recommend it!

We got married at Leez Priory in August 2024- great venue and experience from initial viewing to leaving the morning after the wedding. Leanne acted as our wedding planner and was friendly, professional and helpful throughout. We opted for the classic package and the food was amazing quality with everyone commenting how full they were!
The venue is beautiful with several options for ceremony both inside and out. Accommodation was great too. The whole day ran smoothly with perfect weather - we will have very happy memories of our day!
Perfect venue and very attentive staff, lovely food and great communication from start to finish
Stunning venue. Fantastic Team. Very accommodating toward our unique "surprise" strategy. Our guests were truly surprised. Thank you.

Leez priory was the 1st and only venue we looked around when we started planning our wedding. From the moment we stepped on the premises, everything just looked so perfect and exactly what we wanted from a wedding venue. When we got assigned our wedding co-ordinator Rachel, she was just absolutely spot on with everything we asked for and nothing was too big an ask for her. She made sure the day ran as smoothly as possible and took care of any issue that arose without me knowing (which I am forever grateful for!!)
The rest of the staff were amazing and very helpful.

The venue itself is just absolutely stunning and we loved that it has the pub area as well as the dance floor so it catered to all of our guests.

All of the rooms were lovely and it was so nice being able to stay in the fisherman‚Äôs lodge onsite the night before the wedding.

We genuinely cannot recommend this venue enough and it was 100% worth the money! 10/10!

We got married on a Tuesday in October to maximise the value of what we could get for our money; and honestly, we got everything we wanted and more. Leanne, our Wedding Manager was perfect at bringing an attention to detail and seamless organisation to the big day, and in the lead up. There wasn't one moment of the day where we felt stressed, as Leanne had it covered. In one particular instance, our flowers for the bridal party's hair hadn't arrived. Within five minutes of telling Leanne that we needed this, the flowers were with our hair and make-up suppliers to add the finishing touches.

Leez Priory as a venue is the most stunning setting, and offers an incredible range of areas in which the ceremony and reception can take place. There is also the opportunity for the bridal party to make use of the Fisherman's Cottage the night before the wedding, and for people to stay in the on-site accommodation on the evening of the wedding, making it the perfect venue for people also travelling from further afield.

Leez Priory were very accommodating, welcoming and were happy to work with us to make our day as perfect as possible. The food was incredible, and a total hit with all of our guests, and so many people have commented on how incredible the day was as a whole. You wouldn't be disappointed to choose Leez Priory.

They catered to our every need. To when we would ask for things they hadn‚Äôt been done before they still made sure it went smoothly. Leanne was amazing she made me feel so comfortable from the start. The whole day was stunning. Beautiful venue please go view it as you will not be disappointed

We got married on the 26 May 2024. This venue was absolutely brilliant! They catered for every need and made sure there was no stress on the day. Leanne was kind and level headed throughout and was always one step ahead! Do not hesitate to book- do it now!

Best day of our lives!

The Roslin wedding experience was absolutely flawless from the first meeting we had to the day after our most special wedding day!

Amy and Evan were so supportive and understanding throughout the whole planning experience. They both made us feel so special.

Stefan was exceptional on our wedding day, keeping the day running smoothly and meaning that we could both enjoy the day ourselves without having to worry.

We have had so many people say it was the best wedding they have ever been to. The food was just perfect.

Garry, the DJ was a really nice guy and the dance floor was full all night. Thank you so much Garry!

The bridal suite is absolutely perfect. So many beautiful little touches. The stay was wonderful for all of our guests and the breakfast was outstanding. Even the ladies on the checkout desk made us feel special.

Thank you so much to everyone at the Roslin for making our wedding day so perfect and run so smoothly!

Lots of love,
Mr & Mrs Pope x

Thank you so much for all you have done to make our wedding so perfect.
From the very beginning the team have been communicative and friendly. Very quick replies to emails and quick to answer questions with helpful advice and tips.
On the day the team ensured that everything ran as smoothly as possible. The food was incredible and we have received many compliments regarding the catering team.
The team were both professional and friendly and nothing was too much trouble.
Our stay overnight was in a gorgeous room with a beautiful view.
Breakfast in the morning was delicious.
Thank you again.

Well, Amy and the team - what can we say?? Our day was absolute perfection. Here are some things we would like to comment on to demonstrate just how amazing the day was:
Ceremony - complete attention to detail - we were not going to have a signing table as we had legally married the day before - Amy was honest and said the room would look bare and she was absolutely right - so glad we decided to listen to Amy's advice. The room was decorated stunningly - there was such attention to detail - extras of our flowers were placed tastefully in vases around the room, there were lanterns and candles that we had not asked for but made the room look more finished. There were extra centre pieces we had provided - these were placed in different areas to compliment the theme.
Bridal party arrival - upon arrival there was a complimentary bottle of prosecco for the party in the bridal suite. The suite was beautiful and our bouquets were laid out so nicely for us. We asked for some more champagne flutes and straight away, within 2 mins there were some at our door.
En route to the ceremony I was worried about the song and when everyone had to walk in - why I was worried I do not know as Amy had listened to it numerous times and knew exactly when to send everyone in. Amy and Evan even sorted out my dress so it looked beautiful walking down the aisle.
Throughout the ceremony the team had tidied the bridal suite room and put chocolates and petals on the bed. When I went to show my husband the suite, I had warned him that it had been a bit of a mess - but no - Amy and the team had ensured it looked almost as if noone had been there!
Drinks reception - we went for photos on the beach and whilst this was happening there was canapes and prosecco - at previous weddings people had commented that they (as bride and groom) had not had the opportunity to try their canapes as they had been doing photos - but the team had thought of this and Tate brought us out our own little plate with 2 of each canapes each.
The change over was swift and the room looked fabulous for dinner thanks for Evan and her guidance - Amy had suggested having a smaller number of tables and more people on each otherwise the tables would look bare - again absolutely the right decision. We had some elderly guests and while the change over was happening they were given chairs to sit on which was no drama whatsoever for the staff.
The meal - everyone raved about the food - it was sublime - presented so tastefully and portions were generous. It was a really lovely touch that Tate went around and asked every single table, not just the top table, how their food was. This was great as I have never seen this at a wedding before.
Again, turnaround for the evening was flawless and the ballroom looked beautiful.
Other things that made our day extra special - everyone who was part of the wedding party received room upgrades free of charge which really made everyone feel special; we didnt have time to try our cake, but the team had realised this would be the case and on arrival to the bridal suite after the evening there was two slices of cake presented beautifully with some of the left over flowers, as well as our gifts and cards and the left over drinks from dinner service. Nothing went to waste as the bottles of wine that were not used at dinner were left on the bar for guests to enjoy in the evening too.
We cannot fault the service or staff at the Roslin at all.
A few special mentions -
Nicky behind the bar - you are a wonderful woman and made sure nothing was too much - you made drinks with love and were a real hit with the guests, everyone said how wonderful you were. Thank you for being great.
Tate - wow - you were so calm and collected - if we wanted 5 mins to ourselves that was not an issue - nothing was too much to ask. You ensured the day ran smoothly (we were always on time throughout the day) and you ensured that everyone was well looked after. Thank you - you are fantastic at your job.
Evan - You ensured the turn around of the room was done quickly but with class and flawlessly finished. Thank you.
Amy - what can we say - your team are an absolute credit to you, and it is because of you that we had a wedding that was more than we ever could have dreamed of. Your operations runs like a well-oiled machine but at the same time ensures the authenticity and personalism of every single wedding, to ensure it retains it individuality. Some weddings have felt like 'conveyer belts' but every single person spoke so highly of you, the team and the venue. Thank you endlessly for your love and dedication to what you do. It is very evident.
One small thing - oh... who are we kidding! The day was the most perfect experience. We will treasure The Roslin and our treatment as bride and groom forever. You are wonderful people, great value for money as a venue and you will always hold a special place in our heart. Thank you. Mr and Mrs Lee

Where to begin‚Ä¶. If anyone is thinking of having a wedding here, DO IT! The most stress free and lovable venue we could have asked for, Special thanks to Evan and Amy were incredible leading up to and on the day! The venue is stunning, the food was sooo goood, and the staff were fantastic!
Magical!!

Thank you so much to all management and staff for making my daughter and son-in-law's wedding day so special on 1st June. All your hard work and dedication showed through on the day. Thank you once again!

we had a summer wedding July 2022. we had a garden ceremony.

the groom and i got ready separately in different areas of the hotel. i had a bridal team of 10 as did he, the wivenhoe team, were there continuously helping assisting and asking if we needed anything,

Thank you so much for all your help in arranging our beautiful wedding reception. Everybody loved the day and we‚Äôre very impressed with your staff. They were attentive and approachable. My husband and I got married here on the 30th June. We honestly couldn't have picked a better venue. We first visited this venue on a wedding open evening that they had, and it was incredibly busy. Yet, there was a member of staff on hand that could help and attend any questions/queries that we had. I'd spent a year planning our wedding, mainly with Katie Ballard. Her help and knowledge of wedding planning really was second to none. I'd never planned a wedding before so all of her help and guidance was very much appreciated. I had many visits to WHH throughout the year and each member of staff honestly couldn't do more for you. We did a menu tasting for our wedding day and was assisted by Ellie in the Brasserie. Her knowledge on all of the food options available was very impressive. The food was outstanding, we had 3 courses and 4 different dishes and each one was cooked and served to perfection. It's safe to say that Our wedding day was more than I could ever had imagined. It truly was perfect in every way and ran incredibly smoothly. Our guests also found the staff to be incredibly helpful and attentive, as they were helped with luggage, and allowing a few guests into their rooms a little earlier. I honestly couldn't recommend this venue enough. The house and grounds are breathtaking. And the staff are truly what make it the most wonderful, memorable experience.

We booked Wivenhoe house bout a year before the wedding, we had amazing service from start to finish! Louise was responsive to all emails and incredibly helpful in sorting out all of the final details.

The day ran incredibly smoothly, all of the staff were fantastic.

We fell in love when we saw the venue for the very first time. It's beautiful and you can really go to town with decorations or keep it as simple as you like. The venue looked even better than I had pictured on my wedding day. We got so many compliments about the canap√©s and food at the wedding day as well. The only disappointing thing I found was that we couldn't access the bridal suite to get ready until 11am which is in the courtyard and where you can get amazing pictures. This venue was everything we had ever dreamed of and more. The venue is stunning and the space perfect. From start to finish, everyone was great. Eleanor Pitts was our event planner, she went above and beyond at every opportunity. It's versatility, the size, the use of both outdoor and indoor space and the decor (of both the venue plus the stunning Great Blunts House accommodation). We would just like to say a massive thank you. From the minute we met you, we knew you had got this! From the bottom of our hearts it was truly the best day of our lives! Beautiful day, thank you to the whole team for everything. Stunning venue and the staff were amazing. Everything ran smoothly and the whole wedding was better than we could have ever dreamt of. Thanks a million, it was a great day that we will remember for the rest of our lives.

I just wanted to express my deepest gratitude to you both, and your amazing team of staff. From the moment we first stepped foot into Hutton Hall we knew it was our dream venue! We truly had the wedding of our dreams.

Hutton Hall had everything we were looking for from a venue its stunning and has the wow factor plus for me with the beautiful village church based just at the back of the grounds, over the little wooden bridge it couldn't have been more perfect for a church wedding and then reception location!
We hired the bridal suite and bedrooms the night before the wedding so we had access to the light, bright and lovely preparation room for myself, mum and bridesmaids to get ready with an early start on the day.

The marquee set up for the wedding breakfast was beautiful overlooking the grounds and the fountains and with the sides up as it was a nice day was just perfect.

I was initially a little worried about the space as we had 100 guests in the day time, and 30+ in the evening, but I shouldn't have been concerned as it worked brilliantly and never felt overcrowded. The dancefloor even though it's a separate room was constantly busy all night and the courtyard and main hall and bars were perfect for people to mingle!

We had so many compliments from friends and family about what a great venue and day it was and we were honestly thrilled.

The Georgian Manor house with its high ceilings and beautiful features was ideal as we wanted light and airy, with a feeling of glamour / grandeur. I have to say it had all this, while also feeling intimate.
We fell in love with Hutton Hall straight away, and booked very quickly after our first viewing. Francesca and Paula are brilliant and answered all my many questions and worked with us to coordinate the day. I cannot recommend Hutton Hall enough, and if you have any doubts over the suppliers included in the packages, we can confirm Limeberry catering provided a slick service the food was delicious, hot and well presented with a lovely team of waiting staff and DJ AJ (Paul G) was fantastic keeping the dancefloor busy all night too. They have such a great team on board here, which makes life so much easier as a bride, if I'd have known how great it was going to be, i wouldn't have wasted less time worrying about the little things!

Thank you so much for the best day of our lives.

Seamless day in the most beautiful venue. From the moment I viewed Hutton Halls website i knew it would be our venue. The whole building is stunning - from the blue room to the bridal prep room to the grounds.

If you‚Äôre thinking of holding your wedding here it‚Äôll be the best choice you‚Äôve made. It was a fairytale day
Paola was a great host when showing me and my fiance around the venue. I can't wait to visit here again and get married here next year! Thanks

Down Hall was our chosen venue for our wedding day in August - we had a wonderful day and the team did a great job looking after us and our guests.
We worked with Zoe as our wedding coordinator who was fantastic and responsive to our requests and communication as we planned the wedding in a short space of time in 5 months!
The chef was great and modified the menu to suit our special fusion wedding. The results were amazing with all our guests commenting on how wonderful the food was (my worst nightmare averted of guests feeling hungry or having a poor food experience!).
The whole experience with Down Hall was great. The hotel was very busy for the weekend over the summer which did not affect our wedding day itself as had a team dedicated to us. We also had a family afternoon tea arranged the day before instead of a rehearsal dinner which was also amazing with great service in our private room.
We hope to return for our first anniversary!

The summary I would give our wedding is that the venue is stunning however the wedding coordinators and bar staff failed on several occasions to deliver the wedding we had planned or paid for.

I really did not want to micro-mange my own wedding but this meant things didn‚Äôt go to plan. Luckily as we had evidence in writing we did receive compensation for this however that doesn‚Äôt change what happened on the day.


Here‚Äôs what happened ‚Ä¶


Planning Issues

We emailed our final planning information 2 days prior to our final wedding planning meeting. We then had our final planning meeting with Tracy who said everything was okay and on-track. 10 days later she then admitted she had not read the documents at the time of the final planning meeting and had now found a problem. There was a problem, which was my misunderstanding, and we resolved this however this is a great example of the level of service that we received.

We had asked (thankfully via email) if we could have a musician outside during reception drinks and were told we were so we booked one. When we then visited Down Hall we were told we were not allowed a musician. As we could provide the email from them saying we could have a musician they allowed us to have one but I would recommend to any potential couples to get all communication in writing as you may need to provide what you have been told!

These are just two of several fustrating interactions we had during planning!


Time Management

The time management of the wedding coordinators is terrible. We were left waiting on every occasion that we met with them, sometimes up to 45minutes with no idea what was going on. On our wedding day we were left waiting in the reception room for 20minutes wondering again how long we would be waiting with many things to do!


Wedding Ceremony Music

We provided a detailed run-though of the wedding ceremony and when music was meant to be played (nothing complicated, pre-wedding, entrance, signing and exit songs).

- The pre-wedding ceremony music was not setup by the wedding coordinator as promised and was playing through the ipad and not speakers when the Groom arrived.
- Tracy then proceeded mid-way through the ceremony to randomly start playing the second signing music song before realising she was drowning out proceedings and switching it off.
- The Ceremony came to an end and everyone was asked to stand and out their hands together (this took quite a while as my Grandpa is disabled) despite this delay and being given a script in advance Tracy then totally missed starting the exit music until we were 3/4 of the way down the aisle.

The team did offer us compensation for this.


Horsebox Bar

We had paid ¬£500 to reserve the terrace and horsebox bar. When we asked the Food & Beverage team to open the horsebox bar back up after the meal they had to apologise and say that there was a mix up and no staff had been booked and this was not possible.

After the wedding we then complained to the Revenue Manager who claimed that this was agreed with us and this was reflected on the function sheet which we received prior to the wedding ‚Ä¶ this was a totally untrue!

We then (rather embarrassingly for them) sent them their own function sheet and highlighted the line which said ‚Äúhorsebox bar and terrace after meal service‚Äù. After agreeing that both the contract and function sheet said this should be open they offered us compensation. Once again showing the importance of getting everything confirmed in writing.


Prosecco

We brought our own drink and did corkage. During the post wedding drinks I went to the horsebox bar to get a Prosecco to then be told that was the last glass. I was surprised given how much we had brought. I found two bottles in the dining room and took them to the horsebox bar. These were drunk and then guests started buying their own drinks as a result of being told this was finished.

I was then very disappointed to be handed back 8 bottles of Prosecco when we checked out. When I complained about this the Revenue Manger said the guests were drinking G&T which does not answer the complaint at all and again reflects the level of service we received.


Summary

In summary, the venue is stunning however from reading previous reviews it appears that a completely new wedding team are at Down Hall. I would only recommend this as a place to get married if you are going to micro-manage your wedding coordinator, get everything in writing, and don‚Äôt trust the function sheet as this is not guarantee things will happen.

My Husband and l absolutely fell in love with this wedding venue the 1st time we visited there. Its a stunning venue and truly is a hidden gem and brings happy emotions every time I see it. Wow !!!! Everything was absolutely gorgeous the grounds , the bridal cottage, the exquisite Manor House. Every expectation was met by Claire, Michelle And of course John Paul . The venue met all our requirements, canap√© and champagne reception, 3 course served meal and event buffet for our guests. The food and service was outstanding.

Myself and my Husband chose this venue for our wedding last week and we can‚Äôt sing The Manor‚Äôs praises enough. Cannot put into words just how perfect this was. 2 night stay plus wedding ceremony, reception and evening. The attention to detail was fantastic. Venue stunningly beautiful. Food was lovely and service very good. Wedding coordinator was excellent. It really was just perfect

Perfect venue for a perfect wedding.

Chris and i would just like to say a huge thank you to you and all the staff involved in making our wedding the best day of our lives.
